kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tre/ lanagasum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das ni de'i bar du yang rgyal po gzugs can snying
po dang thabs gcig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam kun dasprod par mdzad do// yang de'i nub phyogs legs kyi thogs cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'danas/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyad 'dus ba de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lta dang ldan par gnas pa snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes
[ ]bya ba yod de// sangs rgyas kyizhing sApo'i rgyal mtshan de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogapa'i sangs u0fb1sa ye shes dpal btsugs rgyal po zhes
ts+tsu bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyibasam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ son sa can rnams la chos kyang ston to// 'khor de na yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba' sAng po dpal zhes bya ba chos ma 3ra pa phyir 'dus du 'dug par gyur to// des kyang gyen du rnam par bltas so// des
rdzo steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa nub phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas/ shar phyogs su 'gro ba dag mthong ngo//
des gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dong ba'i shar phyog la rnam par bltas te/ des der snang ba chen po mthong na// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegrwa rgya' po la

yodasu zhus zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa la brtse gang rgyal po des// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba snyade po'i depal la 'di skyed ces bka' stsal te//zhes bya ba'i bar dang
rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi phyogs che sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'du nas sas rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bya sA ran// ba sa[> ]6 na
gnas pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te//
'tsho zhong gnyis la chos kyang ston to// zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de'i tshe de na dusapa 'bo yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos kyi tshul dang/ dkon chog gsum
gyi gdung ring du gnas par ma dzad pa'i phyir dang/ chos kyis gnas pa nyide rgyun ma gtsang po'i phyir dang/ bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i phyir dang/ chos kyi
rgyal mtshan bsgrung bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to// der de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad gshegs nas rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad nas kyang de dag gshigs par mdzad do// yang do bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus pa mdzad do// der so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi/
dung ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang/ tshangs pa' gnas pa dag bstan kyang/ da dung 'khor sadas rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzad sa dang/ nam mkha'i
lam thams cad ma 'dres par gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba/ shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pas ngoms pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar dza ltar star
blo gsungs pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhu ba'i phyir/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar spron/ der nyi ma'i
snying po' chos kyis gnas pa// klu'ael rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la sa dad pa sbyin par
mdzad do// der smon pa med pa dang/ rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa mthu stobs che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i ded chags thoms cad kun tu zad par byad pa//
gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad nga ra byed pa/ nga rgyal dang/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang/
nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ zad pa shes pa spyod pa'i bar byed pa/ ma skye ba shes pa rtogs par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i/
ba[z ]phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa// sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do// tad+ya thA/ shan sha ba/ ma sha na sha ba/ a ba kA/
sha ba/ chu klu ta sha bo/ tsa khyu ga ba/ sho dra ga ba/ g+ha na go ba/ dza hA shu ba/ kA ya sha ba/ ma na sha ba/ rma b+ha ba d+ha/ tsaklu srid chu bo lta ba/ gti
A/ ba k+Sha bro/ g+han ta dza ka ba/ dza hA bAyu lta bu/ kAya kra ma klu bya/ ma na o dza k+kha ba/ A lo ka dzA ya k+Sha ba/ bA dzasang kra ma k+Sha byu/ Ang ga ra kha rgyu
kAsh+tsa/ saA ro pa bya ya k+Sha b+ha/ sha ma kAn k+Sha b+ha/ kAyA ka ras k+Sha ma/ shAnata bya sgra sha b+han/ donI tI ta to na A tsa na nan to na/ na g+ha ba na yaM na ton/
a ba a bAn Dong kha su swA hA/ rigs kyi bu smon pa med ba dang/ rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags de ni 'ad yin te/ mthu stobs che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod
pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed nga/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor
bar byed pa'i bar yin no// long la ma mdzad kyi 'dzag rtenagyi khams su song zhig/ nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang
tha/ @#// ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus/ de la 'di skad du nub phyogs kyi phyogs chen/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs
largyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyad 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis so//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing snying po' rgyal mtshan de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs
te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'bor bzhu po rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang bdag de nas 'dar/
bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du btang ba lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rtsa lhung ba mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung ngam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal
ba ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa chung ma/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags sam/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin du chos dang ldan ba lags sam/ chos de la
nan tan snying por bgyid pa lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pa dang ldan par gnas lags sam/ khyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bdud kyi yul dang/ ku' yul bcom
lags sam/ sangs rgyas gcig gi yul lags sam/ 'dir khyod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa ma mchas bar bskor bar mdzad lags sam/ gang la la sangs rgyas
kyi yul 'dir chos ma lags pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba de'i sladadu yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des/
nyi ma'i snying po' chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'dzage par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang/ sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dag pa
gsol bar mdzad tsang/ de nas yang smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu
zad par byed pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa 'di des bskur lags so
zhes bya ba'i bar gsol rug ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i stong pa dbal des 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das smon pa med pa dang/ rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags kyi phan yon bdag gis bzung lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
zhad mo mdzad der mchi ba la 'jigs pa 'ba' zhig mchis lags so// daci'i slad du zhe na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon du thos
shing/ mngon du yongs su bzung lags te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad dan/ sems can rnams mchog tu lta ba mi bzad pas sdug bsngal thob bar gyur pa/
zlu mchog tu 'dod chags kyi shas che ba/ dmus long dang 'dra ba dag lags te zhes bya ba nas/ bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thums cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dung
yud tsam kho nas mnar med par mchi bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po
des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i 'i dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lan thob cig/ lan thob cig/ 'o na khyod kyis
zhag dgu la gling bzhi pa bar ma'i sengs rgyas kyi zhing mamader/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi che byad kyis/ rgya mtsho chen por klu bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'jigs par/
kun tu bstan pa'i rkyen gyis/ skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la rnam par ma bkod dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du ma bcug gam/ des
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// ji skad gsungs ba de lta lags te/ bdag gis klu bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi pa de dag 'jige/
par kun tu bstan pa'i rgyan gyis byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod lags so/ rigs kyi bu 'o na khyod kyis gling bzhi pa bar ma don gang nachar pa med pa der gang bstan pa las de
na gas pa'i klu thams cad 'khrugs par gyur rung/ de dag 'khrugs nas kyang zhag bdun du char pa mngon par rab tu 'bebs par byed pa glang po che' klo chen po dag
dang/ rta' klu chen po dag dang/ sbrul gyi klu chen po dag ma bstan tam/ rdos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ sngon gyi smon
las kyi bye brag gos lags so// bcom ldan 'dus des bka' stsal pa/ ngas khyod der mngags nadi ji ltar khyod dngang bar byed/ byang chub sems dpa' des 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ napo che'i gter chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/ de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la der mchis/
nas/ sen mo dag gis sgo bar bgyiden/ de ji lta ji ltar sen mo dag gis rko bar bgyid pa de lta de ltar rin po che'i phung po chen po ches mang du rnyed par 'gyur ro// btsun
dpa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin du mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter yang tshig de lta bu dag gis ji lta ji ltar byung ba de lta de ltar/ de nas chos ni
po che ran thang ma mchis pa ches phal cher thob par 'gyur lags pas/ der sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi phyag rgya gang gis/ de bzhin gsheg
pa'i stobs bskyed pas/ der bdag gis sems can ches mang po yos su smin par bgyid pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ches mang du de bzhin gshegs pa las bdag yongs su tshol/
bar bgyide lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la/
di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ngas lung bstan pa rin po che rig sngags kyi rten ces bya ba khyod la sbyin par mdzad do/// 'phags/
pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde/ 3ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mde/ bam po bzhi pa// tad+ya thA/ sa tAr Nag ma/ sa mung thAn sha ma/ a ban
sha ma/ sgo rang gi sha ma/ sang yo ga sha ma/ ban d+ha na sha ma/ sa ma ba sa ra sha ma/ bA tAnasha mi sa mA kro ma/ a bde byA sha ma/ sang skar sha ma/ bde
dz+han sha ma/ na mA rU pa sha ma/ sha zla ya ta na sha ma/ sba ra sha ma/ ba da nAg ma/ tu ShA sha ma/ su pA dA sha ma/ b+hub sha ma/ dzA tig ma/
dza rAm ra Na sha ma/ ya bad sarnyan khyu sha ma/ ya bad sarba tra d+ha tu ka sang sgra sha ma A rA pA ra ka ma/ 'di niroge sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po yin te//
lung bstan pa des na der sems can rnams kyis thos pa tsam gyis/ sred pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ rab dang/ srid pa'i rgyu nyon mongs pa rnams rab tuzhi
bar 'gyur zhing/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srod pa'i rgyubyed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin no// nyon mongs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma
snyad kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba ltar lus dang/ ngag dang// yid kyi nyis par sbyod pa sngon chad byas pa 'bras bu mthar ma phyin pa dang/ ma sbyangs pa thams
cad kyang ldog par 'gyur ro// rig sngags rten lung ston pa 'du gang gis ras 'thun par sems rtsa gcage pas mnyan nas nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan ma byed par chos 'di
rnam par sgom par byed na/ dge ba'i phyogs thams calas yongs su nyams par byed pa dang/ bgegs byed pa dang/ nor yongs su nyams
par byed pa dang/ snyan pa'i dengos po dang bral bar byed pa dang/ lus la kun tu gnod par byed pa dang/ sems kun tu 'khrug par byed pa dang/ dag
ba ba thams cad la mngon par ma dga' bar byed pa dang/ mi dge ba thams cad la mngon bar dga' bar byed pa'i sdig pa'i las de dag thams cad ma lus par 'bras bu ma sgrub par
zla zad par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba na ma gtogs so//
de dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu kun tu spyod par byed de/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu rtson par byed na/ de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur ro//
byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rgyan gyi rgyal ba dang/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur ro// de khyim longs spyod zad ma shes par yang 'gyur
re zhes bya ba nas sngar gsungs pa bzhin/ tshul khrims dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bzod pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms
par byed na/ lha dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mo rdzi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang zhes bya ba nas/ ma'i
dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin/ dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang/ mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang/ mchod
pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang/ rab tu bsrung ba'i bar gyi 'os su gyur pa yin no// de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu kun tu
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag skyong bar mdzad cing/ de la 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa dag
'ongs pa legs so// tshur ded kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gnas par byos shig/ der ded kyis khyod sa bcudag la bzhag par mdzad do zhes kyang gsung
bar 'gyur ro// de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang/ dud pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye
bar 'gyur te/ de der yang sa bcu thob par byed cing/ ring po ma thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs
kyi bu rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzad de na sems can rnams na nges par 'byed pa'i rma dang
mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dgan phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
las thams cad nas bor ba dag yin zhing/ mtshams med pa byed pa dag dang/ dam pa'i chos slong ba dag dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag dang/ ltung ba'i
rtsa ba byung ba dag yin pa'i phyir ro// de dag thams cad kyis ngan song gsum du yun ring por sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu drag po rab tu rtsub po nyams su myong ngo//
de dag ngan song gsum las yongs su thar pa dang/ yongs dag pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sngon
gyi smon lam gyi rgyus de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma nyide rnyed ba thob go/ gong de dag gi sngon gyi dad pa'i dbang po nas/ shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar dang/ sbyin pa/
dang ldan pa la goms pa nas/ shes rab dang ldan pa la goms pa'i bar dang/ smon lam la goms pa dang/ 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba la goms pa dang/ byang
grol gyi bde ba la goms pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnab bsgom pa la doms pa sngon chad byas par gyur pa de thams cad ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba la goms pas ma ni
lus par brjod do// ma lus par brjod nas kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes te/ da dung yang nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyus de dag gzugs ma sdug/
ba dag dang/ tshul du ma shis pa dag dang/ yan lag dang bral ba dag dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ gos dang/ mal cha dang/ rgyan dang bral ba dag/
tu gyur to// de dag der yang tshe thung ba dag dang/ yod gzhungs pa chung ba dag dang/ blo chung ba dag dang/ las spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag dang/
dge ba'i rtsa ba rlung ba dag dang/ bsod nams chung ba dag dang/ grub pa chung ba dag dang/ bya ba chung ba dag dang/ bya ba ngan pa la zhugs pa dag dang/ lta ba
ngan pas zin pa dag dang/ bstan chos ngan pa la dad pa dag dang/ smon lam ngan pa dang ldan pa dag/ nad mang ba dgu yon/ rnam par g.yong ba mang ba dag yin/
'jug pa la sbyor ba mang ba dag dang/ nyes par spyod pa gsum mang ba dag dang/ ltad mo dang/ ltas mang ba dag dang/ gzu lums can dag dang/ rtsub pa
dug dang/ zhi sdang dang ldan pa dag dang/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag dang/ dkon mchog gsum 'gog par byed pa dag in rta/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
de nasems can naphal cher ngan song gsum du 'gro ba dag yin no// rigs kyi bu der rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di de dag gis thos pa
tsam gyi mod la de dag nges par 'byed pa'i che dang mthun pa'i dge ba dag gi kun tu sbyor bas/ ngan song gi lem dag las sgrol bar byed do// de dag sngon byas pa'i ded pa'i/
ts+tsha dbang po la goms pas dga' bar 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar la goms pas draga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang/ smon lam dang/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang
tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom ba goms pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba yin no// thos pa tsam gyis de dag gi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad med pa 'phel ba dang/ longs spyod dang//
nye bar spyod pa 'phel ba dang/ dge ba bya ba 'phel ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa 'phel ba dang/ shes rab 'phel ba dang/ byams pa 'phal ba nas/
btang snyoms kyi bar 'phel ba dang/ legs par byas pa'i las 'phel ba mchog tu 'gyur ro// smyos pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad yang dag paT lta ba dang ldan par
'gyur ro// gang dag rig sngag kyi rten lung bstan pa chen po 'dabakur stir byas te nyan par byed cing/ nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan ma byed par sems rtse gcige pas
tshes 'di dag rnam par sgom par byed pa'i sems can de dag na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag dang/ gas par spyod pa gsum dang ldan pa dag dang/ dkon
mchog gsum la skyabs dang smon lam gyi shugs la mngon par dga' ba dug dang/ chos kyis gnas pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gsal bar byed pa dag tu sem
can gang dag tu der sngon gyi skye gnas myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa byed pa nas/ ltung ba'i rtse ba byang ba'i bar dag na me gtogs so// de nas yag 'phos nas kyang
sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzod 'dir skyas shing skye bar 'gyur ba dag yin te/ gang dag gi sdig pa'i las rab tu chen po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sngon chad yongs su ma spyad pa'i
sems can de dag gis rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di thos na yang yon tan de lta bu de dag thob par 'gyur ro// thos pa tsam gyi mod la yang de dag gi las kyi sgrib
pa dpag tu med pa ma lus par yongs su u0f74 zang par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gis kyang der chos kyi rnam grang 'du mtha' dag bri bar bya'o// yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bdunuyang bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rten thos chos kyise gnas pa rnams kyi kun dga'i ra
ba yang bya'o// der sbyin pa dag kyang rab tu gzhag par bya'o/ dus dus su gso sbyong gi sdom pa la yang mngon par brtson nga ra bya'o// chos mnyan ]
par bya'o// der sems can gang dag dkon mchog gsum la dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po de lta bu 'thob pa'i gnas de yod de/ de dag gis gang/
bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phra mang por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal drag po rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de yang rigs mthun par 'di nyid la mi 'dod pa'i 'bras
bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// kha cig la na yun ring du nad byung ste/ des de'i sngon gyi ma dge ba'i las 'phangs pa dug kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig
gi na yan lag bcad pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha tsagenor zad pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig ga na 'khor zhag pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro//
kha tsug gi na longs spyod pa dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas// yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi na 'khor dang/ bran dang/ lus la gnod pa byed pa dang/
btsan rar bzhag pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig ga ni mo snyan pa dang/ nyes par smra ba'i tshog thos pas yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs mthun pa la de
dag gis ma dge ba'i las ston byas pa rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi gzhi lung ston pa chen po 'di na de ltar don che ba yin no// tad+ya thA/
kha ga pa rwa ts+tshe de/ gargyu k+Sha sa/ gcu re bad rgyu/ pra b+ha ga ke/ ka ba yo ga/ pra tahA re/ a ma na sa ko sh+tsa/ sa ma ma g+ha dzu/ a kA ya ta tA/ kA b+ha
ba rje/ nin da na tshug/ sum ka tshun/ a b+hu sha a tshul/ bi bra ba tshub// na lta tshu she/ sa t+yA dza ba tshu9/ sa'i skye ba dzA// sa la le gu ha dz+ha
sa la gu rgya bya klu pa Na kog/ saM d+han ko no/ sa ba d+ha nan // bI tu pra brid te/ upa kr-i ma Nathe/ a natso bya bra khe/ pra ti kra ma NaM/ sa kha theg/ so
la tsa na ba ma/ kro d+hi d+hA ri kAshas sha/ A sha kha g+ho/ naya kun dze de ba bya ba ni/ klu na bze/ a b+ha ba na/ sa ma ma ka re/ sha ra e ba na/ mo g+ha dz+han/
hrar kon/ bo nA ya na mu kho/ sA ra k+Sha ka la/ nArA ya nu tshu kha/ in dra ba sa ne/ o a/ a ba pa// a ra ba ha/ dza ra/ a ra ba sa ma ga du kho na ste ra Ni
ni dzA ta pAhA/ rigs kyi bu roge sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni yon tan che ba/ phan yon che ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ khrus byed pa//
snang bar byed pa/ dran par byed pa/ nye bar zhi bar byed ba yin te/ de la gang dag sems rtse gcig pas nyan bar byed cade/ ji ltar bstan pa
bya bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis pan gyis rlabs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' segs dang ba chen po thams cad
(dang/kyin kyi rgyal ba thams cad dung/ dgra bcom ba thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad na lha'i dbang po nas/ mi'i dbang po'i
bar gyis bsan pa dang/ dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang/ mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin no// shin tu bsrung bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur
@#pa yin no// sems can de dag ni phyi ma'i dus na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la phyogs bcu kun nas mdun na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamase mthong
bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang/ nge pa phyag skyong bar mdzad cing/ 'ad skad du kyeyon tan gyis phyug pa dag tshur shog/ nged kyi sangs rgyas
cazhing yongs su dag par gnas par gyis shog/ der nged kyis (u0f7a da sa bcu dag la gzhag par bya'o zhes kyang gsung bar mdzad do// de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga'
ba ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dad pa 'phags pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyizhing stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing/ de der yangs
bcu dag 'thob par 'gyur zhing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di
na sems can rnams kyi las zad par bya ba dang/ rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba dang/ byang grol gyi bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de ltar don che ba dang/ phan yon che
ba yan gyis/ long la ma mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig/ nga' bkas de bzhinagshegs pa shAkya thub pa layang zhus shig/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyang ba'i snying po dpal des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lags so// yang de'i 'khor der byang chub
su mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas kyang tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bstan bkur bgyi ba dang/ 'dus pa chen po de yang blta ba dang/ nyi ma'i snying pa'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul
rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las bas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags thos bar 'tshal te// bdag cag kyang/
dang de 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring po ma lags/ snga ma yang kun phyin lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jige rten gyi khams ma mdzed der bdag cag/
kyang mchibar gnang bar mdzad par gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yegs dpal brtsegs rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag/
khyed cag thams cad lhan cage mthun par sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang/ rtags dang/ gzugs dang/ dbyibs dang/ spyod lam dang/ rmo byad kyis khyed ngeng
zhage/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lags so zhes kyang gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal byang chub sems dpA
sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu srang mad kyi bu'i mdog dang/ rtags dang/ gzugs drang/ dbyibs dang/ spyod lam dang/ cha byad du bdag
nyide mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal btsogs rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ti/ lan gsum bskor ba byas
nas/ de nas chas te/ ud tsam gtsage gas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad der phyin to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mo mdzad 'dare de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing
ma mdzad thams cad du/ bcom ldan 'jus la mchod pa'i les bya ba'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phab bo// de dag gling bzhi pa bar/
ma 'du ga la ba dang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i zhing ga la ba de logs su dong ste/ dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
gcig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das ni de dung yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs gtsug chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang phyogs/
na sangs rgyas kyi zhong gang+ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal ma tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
[']zhang gzhis la chos kyang ston to/ 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' snyade pos/ stong gi nam mkha' la bltas so// des kyang der nam mkha' la byang
sa chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dupag tu med pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas/ lho phyogs su 'dong ba mthong bar gyur to// des lho phyogs su rnam
par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas/ dus de nga nyin gshegs pa dpal ma tog gi snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyor ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol
to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus bdag ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring po ma lags te/ bdag gis ni steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa'i
sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchase/ dpag tum mchis pa byang phyogs kyi phyogA mnas/ lho phyogs su mche ba dag mthong lags so/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ snang ba chen po mthong nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la rgyu ni gang lags snyam lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpalam
bdagi snying po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs kyi phyog
chanas nigs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzod ces bya ba yod do// 'di ltar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na//
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'dus pa chen po la chos kyi tshul yun
ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi chos kyis gnas pa rgyun ma gcad par bya ba'i phyir/ de ltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gtan la dbab pa/
bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzad der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa dang/ dri ma med par mdzad pa'i phyir dang/ chos kyi
rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i phyir dang/ chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhug pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur to// der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis rin po che'i tog gi gzungs sngags gsungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyad nas gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par sgrub par mdzad de/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par ldan
pa mige gsum pa'i tshengs pa'i gnas pa bstan kyang/ de na da dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzod sa dung nam mkha' gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba'i chos bstan pas tshim par ma gyur to// mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa de yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang/ ma'i snying po'i chos
kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jog par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par byed pa'i gzungs sngogs bshad par bzhed do// de bzhin
gshegs pa de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung
tso ba zhes bya ba nas/ gang dag sride pa tha ma pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la ma mkhas pa dag de'i tshe/
sangs rgyas kyizhing ma mdzad du 'dzag par gyur cig/ 'dir 'khor nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan dag gis gnas par gyur cige/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas
kyis zhing 'dir sa chen po lhag par mthu dang ldan pa dang/ bcud dang ldan pa dang/ yon tan dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cige/ 'di ltar 'diresangs rgyas kyi zhinge gzhan bzhin du
mtha'/thams cad dran pa dang ldan pa dag dang/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag dang/ gtong ba dang ldan pa dag dang shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig/ de'i tshe byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag phyogs bcu sengs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzod 'di'i nang du chud par gyur cige/ de
nyid du 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la stobs ji lta ba dang/ ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du 'khod nas/ bsam gtan byed par gyur cage sAm dgongs so// bsam
gtan byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu dper na/ 'bru mar gyi mar me lta bu byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu dbaran/ zla ba dang/
nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po'i 'od lta bur byung ngo zhes bya ba'i ber du sbyar ro// de na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
mi mdzad de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de ltar gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snyoms par zhugs par gyur la/ sngon chad der phyin pa nam yin
pa'i byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dgan/ da ltar ting de 'dzan las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad dor chas so// der phyin nas kyang de
de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'dusal chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags de yang thos par 'gyur ro// skyil mo
krung du 'dug nas// rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis skyel par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzan las langs kyis/
tshe rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mu mdzod der 'gro bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyizhing ma mdzad de na/ yang sems can dag mchog tu tsho byung ba dag
yon 8 nad mang ba dag yan/ blo chung ba dag yan/ dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa chung ba dag yin/ bsod nams chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtse ba'i bya ba tshol ba chung
ba dag yon/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag yan/ longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag yani/ 'dod pa la 'chums pa dag yaMne/ ma dge ba spyod
pa dag yani/ phrag dog dang ldan pa dag yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa spangs pa dag yin te/ de dag phal cher mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs
pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na gang dag 'dren mar spyod pa'i sems can yod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ de nyid du sdig pa byed pa'i
mawa/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ sdig pa byed pa'i lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar dag tu skyo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ lus srul po zhes bya ba'i
bar de dag kyang/ der sa'i bcud kyi mdangs phrogs nas yongs su spyod par byed do// 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ro rnams
kyi mdangs phyogs nas kyang yongs su spyod par byed do// de nas stobs dang ldan pa dag yin no// der de dag mngal na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdangs dag 'phrog par byed
de ma rnams skyes pa tsam gyi med dag la myur du mdangs dka'aphrog par byed do// 'o ma'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do// bza' ba dang/ btung ba'i mdangs
dag kyang 'phrog par byed do// der de dag gis mi mngal du zhugs pa'i mdangs 'phrogs shing/ skyes pa tsam gyi mod la mdangs phrogs pas de dag kyang mdangs la ma reg
rung/ bza' ba dang btung ba nyams pa/ yongs su spyad zin pa la yongs su spyod par byed de/ rgyudos den mo rnams mchog tu na ba drug dang/ tsho thung ba dag dang/
dran pa nyamams pa dag dang/ dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang/ bsod nams dang bral ba dag dang/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par pa lta ba
ma @#// dag dang/ longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa dang bral ba dag dang/ 'dod pa la 'arkums pa dag dang/ kun spyod pa mi gtsang ba dag yin zhes
bya ba nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blas pas/ ngan song du 'gro ba dgayin no/ zhes bya ba'i bar yin no/ rigs kyi bu ston pa byang chub
sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam 'di lta bur gyur te/ 'di ltar nga bya ba la brtson pa dang/ spro ba dang brtul ba brtan par gyur to// sngon gyi yeng dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa ngas bsnyen bkur byas so// ngas thabs gang dag gis bud med sbrum me bsrung bar nus pa yang yongs su zhus so// dra'i brtson 'grus gang gis
ma bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ mngal nayod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba yang yongs su zhus so// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ nam mkha'
lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ grul bum mam/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ srol po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ mdangs 'phrog pa/
'am/ brjed byed dag/ rims nya gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ ro langs gang yang dug gam/ sngags
ba kyi sbyor ba 'am/ sman gyi sbyor bas lus dang sems la gnod par bya bar mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gas kyang ma 'am/ mngal na yod pa dang/ skyes ma thag/
pa dang/ 'o ma 'thung ba dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba yongs su spyod pa la gnod par bya ba ma nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ lus
dkrug pa 'am/ khams dkrug par bya ba ma nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag tha mal par mngal na gnas pa yongs su zhus so// lus dang sems la
rnam par mtho ma btsams par bde bar ma'i mngal nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar 'o ma 'thung ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar bza'
ba dang btung ba yongs su spyad pa yongasu zhus so// gnod pa chung ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bladra
pa'i bar dang/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag kyang yongs su zhusaso//
ngas gsang sngags gang dag dang/ smanagang dag gis sems can de lta bu dag yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa'i gsang sngags de dag ni gang yon/ sman de dag ni gang
yin zhe na/ gzungs sngags gang gis ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa/
drug la bkod pa/ rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs sngags lung bstan pa chen po 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gas kyang
tsho nga la bstan par gyur to// rtag tu brtsona'agrus dang brtul ba brtan ba des rtag par rgyun tu tshe rabs de dang/ de dag tu mngal na bu yod pa'i bud med la rig pa yod pa'i sbyathA/
[@]zha ba gzungs sngags gsang sngags kyi gzhi rogi sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas so// bud medu de mngal na bu yod pa dang bcas te/ skyabs gsum la rnam par gzhag go/ phyon/
chad kyang lha 'am zhes bya ba nas/ bdud dam/ brjod byed dam/ ma deng ma ma tshan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis/ ma'i mepal na bu yod pa dang bcas te/ rnam par mtho
tsaN+Da pa 'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so// lha dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
la 'jig rten gyibar gyis kyang mdang 'phrog pa 'am/ smanadang sngags kyi sbyor ba bya bar ma nus so// de dag gis mal na bu yod pa'i ma rnam par mtho ma btsams na/ ma rnam pa/
mtho ma btsams pa dang/ mngal na bu gnas pa yang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// nying mtshams sbyor ba'i lus kyis dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/
gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dag dang/ shin tu blo dang ldan pa dag bde legs su ma'i lte nas byung zhing brjod nges pa med/
pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to// de dag skyes pa tsam gyi mod la yang lha stobs dang ldan/ dbang che bar grags pa re re la yang 'khor brgya stong yod pa dag srung ba dang/
rjes su sba bar byed par kun tu gnas so//de dag ma deng mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang gang gis kyang rnam par mtho btsas pa 'am/ rnam par gtso ba 'am/ lus dkrug pa
'am/ khams dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so// mdangs blang bar yang ma nus so// gsang sngags dang sman gyis kyang rnam par mtho btsams par
ma nus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag mchog tu gzugs dang ldan pa dang/ tshe rabs dran pa dang/ 'dzag rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang/ byams pa'i
sems dang ldan pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang/ gtong ba dang ldan pa dang/ tshul khrims la rjes su dga' ba dang/ bzod pa dang/ yon tan dang/
brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang/ dben pa la dga' zhing bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba dag/
dang/ de thob par byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad bar 'gro ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dag tugyur to// sems can nye bar zhi bal
gnas pa nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu de dag la/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim gror bya bar brtson pa dag yin te/ ma de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba
la skyon du lta ba dang/ byang krol gyi bde ba 'dod pa dag tu gyur to// de dag gis gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de dag ris
mthun pa de nyid kyis myur du byang chub kyi sems ma brjed par byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// ji ste rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa la sems bskyed
na/ de dag myurang skya ba dang/ 'dzags pa dang/ rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// dza ste sems can de dag kyang nyan thos kyi thog pa la sems skyod par
byed na/ sems can de dag ris mthun pa nyid kyis/ bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par byed do// sems can de dag thams cad kyang ngan song gsum
dang bral ba dang/ mtho ris su 'gro ba dag tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu sa thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul bdes sems can dag yongs su smin par byas shang/ bya
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i pa sbyabs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di na de ltar don che ba
yanano// rigs kyi bu ngas sems can nad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag la rage pa yod pa'i spubs zhu be lung bstan pa chen po 'dase smyan sing ha k+Shar la brabru
nas nad pa la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gang na sman sing wA NAr med par yang/ ngas de'i mdun du bza' ba dang btung ba gang yin pa la rig pa yod pa'i/
sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pas brabs nas nad pa la phyin nand thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gal tade yang med par gyuran/ ngas sman bkus te bor ba la rig pa yod/
pa'i sbubs zhi ba' gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag gis brangs nas nad pa la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la
brtul ba des/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so// gang na shing ljon
pa dag me tog dang 'bras bu mi skye ba der yang ngas rige pa yod pa'i spubasazhi bgasang sngags kyi gzhi chen po dag gis char pa che la brabs nas/ shangadag la/
btab na/ shing de dag lo mang por chu mod kyang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dag dang ldan par gyur to// de bzhin du bu ram shing dang/ rgun 'brem dag dang/ 'bru dang/
'a sman dag gi bar dag la yang byas so// gang na char mi 'bab cing chu mod pa der yang ngas rus sbal gyi snying la rig pa yod pa'i sbubasazhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis brabs nas/
shing tsam pa ka'i 'dab mas dkris te/ klu rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bzhag na/ char chen po dang/ chu chen po'i tshogs 'byung bar gyur to// der chu chen po byung bas sems can
rnams kyi khyim dang/ zhing dang/ kun dgau' ra ba'i bar chud za bar gyur na/ der yang ngas sprul gyi rgyal po'i nor bu la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhu ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis
brabs nas/ klu'i gnas su bzhag na char chu rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gang na dus ma yin par rlung dang/ nyim dang/ dus ma yin par sprin dang/ mun pa dang/ rdul gyi char pa
dang/ grang ba dang/ dro ba dang/ dus phyin ci log tu 'byung ba'i bar dang/ dmag tshogs dang/ zla ba dang/ nyim dang/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba
wa 0 phyed pa dang/ dus tshigs dang/ lo rnams yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i bar la ngas snying rjes sems can rnams kyi ched du zhag bdunapa gtsug gi nyin mtshan du khrus byas nas/
'o ma dang 'bras chan gyi kha zas za shang tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas/ rig pa yod pa'i sbyabs zhi ba lung bstan pa 'di las gzhan mi byed par
brjod de/ nyin bdunang la gal te yul yongs su ma sbyangs na/ der nga'i mdun rang gi dam bcas pas mi gnas pa yon no// der yang ngas rtsi lcam pa sbrul gyi snying dang bcas
pa la jig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba 'u nga bstan pa chen po 'dis brabs shing/ skyug smanam da na'i 'bras bu dag dang bsres te lha rten sa ra bzhag pas/ deradusaM ma yin pa'i rlung
dang 'am dang/ spron dang/ mun pa dang rdul gyi cha ba dag dang/ grang ba dang/ dro ba thams cad zhi bar gyur to// yang dag pa'i dus tshigs dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/
gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ lo yang dag par byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu des na gang na sems can dge mtshan ngang/ bkra shis dang/
so sor ldan pa dag dang/ lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag la ngos rig pa yod pa'i spubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di'i chos bstan to// gang dag gang
du sems can rnams kyis thos pa de dang de yang nyonamos pa chung du dag tu gyur to// dge mtshan dang/ bkra shas dang/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad spangs te/
de phyin chad dge ba'i las dang yang dag par ldan pa/ legs cha ra byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ smon lam dag mang ba nges pa'i phung po dag tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du
dus skabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor nga la brtul ba des/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar sems can rnams la
gces spras byed pa yin no// de ltar phan yon mang ba yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhu bar byed pa/ bud med sbrum ma
thams cad srung bar byed pa/ rab tu thar par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang/ phung po dang/ khams thams cad yongs su shes par byed pa/
chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa/ thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su rtogs pa byed pa/ sems can thams
cad rab tu dad par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi bde bar byed pa la 'jug par byed pa/ bdud dang/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par byed pa/
bdud kyi la thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa yon no// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbyabs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di na ngadud rnams tshar gcod par byed cing//
nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed pa yin te/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa/ gnod sbyin rnams yong dag par mgu bar byed pa/ lha ma yon rnams rnam par 'dzom par byed pa//
nam mkha' lding rnams dngang bar byang pa/ mi 'am ci rnams med par byed pa/ lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ mu ge
dang// 'chi ba dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ char pa dang/ nad thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa// grang ba dang//
dro ba dang/ kha ba dang/ tshab dang/ rtsa ba pa dang/ rgyud rgyud po dang/ reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar
bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa/
zad pa shes pa skyed par byed pa/ ma skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sdug
bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed ba yin no// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhu ba lung bstan pa chen po ni 'od yon te/ tad+ya thA/ mnASh+Tha/ a bA k+Sha/ glu sA k+Sha/ dzanak+Sha//
'tshe marman ka/ skra bo ka/ man d+hA k+Sha/ nATA k+ka/ na da ra shu/ ba sa Na Ta/ khe gnA Da/ a Ta nA Ta/ ku mA rnga/ pa ri ku nA Ta/ nA TonA Ta/ pa ri ka na Ta/ ud
Ta ra nA Ta/ ba nA Ta/ kun dza nA tra/ tsa bAm b+hi ran Ta/ kha ga ma b+ha ba de rnga/ pu sha ran 3/ sing haru tran rta/ sa mA la nA Ta/ shir ku sa ko na twA/ ta'e A ru Ta/
kha te h+phu klu/ ba ti rak+Sha dA ma ra dzA/ bAha na bu ti/ sa nA tu ran dza ba/ a mo hor ga dza la a tra nA/ a nA/ rab a tInAk+Sha/ a ba/ marga sprin k+kha/ e du
a bAn to du kha s+ya pUhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa na/ 'khor der srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu ni rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// dkrig
pa phrag drug cu dag kyang skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i spubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di/ nge bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la ngas
khyod kyi lag nas bskar// de yang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa// klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u/ sems can rnams kyi las zad
par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad de// rig pa yod pa'i spubs zhi ba 'di long la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der song zhig/ nga'i bkas de
bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhus shog/ 'di skad du byang phyogs na sangs rgyas/
kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyizhing sogs mi lnga dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa
zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du/ bdagu mngags pa lags na/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba dag ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa dge chung
lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/
chos kyis gnas pa dag gis gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang/ ku'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas
kyi yul gtsag pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis pas/ 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sam/ gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/
b+hU pa de dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'dare nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'a ga par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems/
can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags la dad pa stsol bar mdzad cing/ de nas rig pa chen po yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba/ panayon che ba 'di
bskur lags te/ sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas/ sdug
bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba'i bar rige pa yod pa'i spubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di lags so zhus kyang gsol cig/ de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
ngo mtshar thob cing/ rmad du byung ba thob nas 'ad skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad la ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang/ gzigs/
pa ni ngomatshar to// mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de lta lags pas/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sngon ma thos pa 'di ltar zab pa/ rig pa yodapa'i sbubs
zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa 'di kho na bstan to// gang laon tan 'di lta bu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mchis pa de la mkhas pa byang chub
tshol bar byed pa su zhig mngon par brtson par ma bgyid/ de nabyang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can gang su dag 'khor bas skag/
tsang 8 byang grol gyi bde ba mngon par 'tshal ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang/ rige pa mchase pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi mang yongasasu
bsgrags pa na/ dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba drang/ gus pas sems can rnams kyi red pa chen po dang/ dge ba'i phyogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags so//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ma rtog gi snying pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs gyi bu de de bzhin no// khyod kyis dza seng smas pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu nga byang chub
srams dpar gyur te/ brtson pa 'das slad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam 'di lta bu btab bo// bdag byang chub thob nas sems can gang su dag phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ sbyin pa la brtson pa'i bsam ba can zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i bar dag gis bdag gi
blo ming sgrogs par byed cing/ sems can thams cad kyis sems par byed na/ de gal te de dag la lca dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ sems can la
la pha rol tu phyin ba de dang de dag gi bar chad byed par nus pa zhig yod na/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba brgya stong du mar gyur tsage sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i
rgyunan ma gtogs so// bdag kyang re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang bud med bu la mngon par
dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ bu'i khur gyis skyo ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ gang bud med sbrum pa zhes bya ba'i bar bdag la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing/ sems can thams cad kyis
dga' ba dang/ gus pa dang/ dad pas bdag gi mang yongs su sgrogs par byed la/ gal te ma 'am/ mngal na yod pa de la ma 'am/ mi ma yin pa sdang ba'i sems
kyis rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed dam/ sman dang/ gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas kyang rung ste lus kun tu 'khrug par byed dus/ sems kun tu 'khrug par byed dam zhes bya ba nas/
btsas pa tsam gyi bar la yang tha na yud tsam cig tsam yang rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed na/ bdag re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar ma gyur cig ces sngonang byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab bo// de bzhin du da ltar yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ sdug
bsngal de lta bu s gzare ba dag kyang zhes bya ba nas/ ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin/ sums can thoms cad kyis dga' ba dang/ gus pa dang/ dad pas bdag ga mang
yongs su sgrogs par byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no// sbyangs pa ma yone na/ sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu nam
gtogs so/// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snyang nga zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa// des 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhang mi mdzod ni ngo mtshar lags te/ de na sems can rnams mchog tu snang ba gzu lums can/ rtsub pa/ phrag
dog dang ldan pa/ snying brtse ba ma mas pa/ bgyis pa mi gzo ba/ tshig rtsub por stsa kha/ log par lta ba dag lags pas/ der kha cag gis
bdag la rnam par mtho btsams ba mi rung ste bdag mchis pas ci yang m sman lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnam yin zhing go
zlo skabs med de// sus dmages pa med pa'i tshengs pa'i gnas pa lags par bsgoms shing/ legs par yid la byas par gyur pa de la bdud bye bas kyang rnam par mthobatsan
pa 'am/ bar chad byed par nus pa 'di na gnas mad do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yun ring po nas dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa shin tu bsgoms shing legs par
tho yade la byas zin kyis ma 'dzags shage/ rigs kyi bu khyod la gsang sngags gang dag gis snang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba dang/ rmongs par 'gyur ba dang/ gang gis
bzod pa dang/ dran pa dang/ rab tu dang ba thob par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa byams pa chen po sbyin par mdzad do// ta
bo pI ha/ bu bu la/ me la ba ri/ i la sAhA/ haT ga Ta/ ga ga nA k+ka/ sham bgam/ mde tA/ modi tra/ tsakra brko ti li/ sa g+ha ra/ tA li//
sa05 duNA li hi ha le/ ha bahe/ na ra dza/ ya ban srid te/ kan te/ mde te/ srid tA rA ma/ mde tu kha g+ha/ sardzas tI dza Ate/ sarba kra ma khrid tra/ na ma/
brtatshud du/ d+hItIpishAr sr-ide te swAhA/ rigs kyi bu sdang ba zhi bar byed pa dang/ rmongs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs sngags 'dres tsam pa ka'i 'bru mar la lan
bdun bzlas brjod byas pas/ lag pa gnyis la bskus na/ sdang ba thams cad dad par byed/ rmongs par byed cing/ srung ba'i sprul dag dang/ sdang ba'i gnod
spyan dang/ grul bum dang/ srul po dang/ bdud bye ba brgya stong yang rung ste/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis ci yang byed par mi nus so//
gal te sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad kyis gling bzhi pa gang bar gyur kyang/ skyor chu gtsag gis thams cad de'i med kho na la yod par 'gyur ro// gal te rgyu/
rnyog pa can gyis rgyu mtsho bzhi yongs su gang bar gyur kyang rung/ skyor chu gcig kho nas rab tu dang bar byed do// 'di la the tshom med kyis long la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
du song zhig/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag du med bas tshogi mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunab bcom ldan
'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ 'dus pa chen po blta
dang/ nyi ma'i snying po' chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi 'a 'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags de yang mnyan par 'tshal/
lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te der bdag cag kyang mchir gnang ba lta na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzad du bdag cag mchi lags so// de nas
bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu drag khyed thams cad so so nas/ gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los
sgyur ba'i cha byad dang/ rtogs dang/ dbyibs dang/ yo byad dang/ spyod lam gyis lhan cig mthun par deng zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu po
de dag thams cad gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs dang/ yo byad dang/ spyod lam mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'
nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ti/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' la
'bod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang/ rin po che las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma stod pa bdun bdun dang/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang mngon par
sprul to// spyod lam de lta bu s de nas chas te/ de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig gtsage gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mjed thams cad du kha cig gis nagasar gyi phyi ma'i
char mngon par rab tu phab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa' u0f7alas byaba'i phyir/ kha cig gis ni
dngul gyi phyi ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cige gas ni spos kyi phyi ma' cher mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cage kas namu tig gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha
cig gas na gser skud drug mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni mu tig gi do shal dag mngon par rab tupab bro// khacag gas na dpung rgyan gyi rgyun dag mngon par rab tu
phab bo/ kha cig gis na sa dang/ ras bcos bu dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ de dag thams cad kyis/
'a @#// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad 'ad lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'dus pa chen pa'i mdo//
nyame'i snying po'i le'u las/ pho nya'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so/// rgyal po gzugs can sAng pos mngon ma mthong ba/ tshangs pa chen po dang/ brgya
byin dang/ srud med kyi bu dang/ gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba grangs med dpag tu med pa mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur to// stan las langs nas/ ha
cang yang thag ma rede bar 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi pho nya bzhi pa de dag 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'khod do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos kyang/ de bzhin gshegs
pa shAkya thub ga la ba de logs su ma rtogs pa ka'i 'phreng ba dag gtor te/ de'i tshe tshagis su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba' snang ba 'dzani/
lta ba nyams pa'i 'gro ba'i lam stsolag/ mnyam nyid ldan pa 'gro la phan mdzang khyod// bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzad khyod// 'dul dka' 'gro ba nyon modas thara mdzad
khyod// chos 'di'i snang ba yun ring 'bar mdzad khyod// bsam gtan sgo 'di ngag gis skyes mchog ldan// zhing mang thams cad shin tu mdzes par mdzad// rgyal ba skyes//
mchog skye bo mkhas dgu la// rgyud rang nas na zhinge 'ad brjod par mdzad// 'gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'dre dka' ba ste// de mthong bdag 'dare chos ched tshogs su mchis//
'gro ba mir skye ba ni rAd par dka'// shin tu ring nas mar skye rung nas kyang// nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur thub byed na// rab myur nyon mongs dra ba gcod mdzad lags//
sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs klung lhung ba// khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral// rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag pho nyar tshangags/ khyod kyi chos kyi gter la yaM rang
mdzod// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dunas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dang ga du ma mchis pa'i bye ma snyed 'das nga de na/ 'jig
[R]na gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba
bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyama' snying po'i chos kyis gnas
paklu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa' 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad/
cang gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das tsa snyan ma mnga' lags sam/
gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal bam mams sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin
sku du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dan bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul
bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gtsuge pu lags sam/ 'di ni thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo bskor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'od na gang
rgyu su dag 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa klu'ayul 'jig pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u
gzungs sngags 'di la dad par sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas bden pa dang rjes su mthun ba'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod
sa[chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyud pa/ nga rgyal
dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags so zhes bya ba ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin te/ bden pa dang rjes
su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'dan/ bdud rnams tshar gcod pa/ klu rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnams tsham par brgyad pa
lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par bgyid pa rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ dmangs rigs rnams mchog du dga' bar bgyid pa// bud med rnams 'dod
chags dang bral bar bgyid pa// mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar bgyid pa/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar/
bgyid pa/ 'thab pa dang ]'thab me dang/ mu ge dang/ dus ma lags pa'i nad dung/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ rlung dang/ char pa dang/ chu bo dang/ grang
ba dang/ srob thams cad rnam par zhu bar bgyid pa// kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ ro ma bro ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/ srud srud po dang/ rig par dga' ba'i dengos po rnams
rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bag shar bgyid pa// chos kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa// sangs rgyas kyabastan pa rton par bgyid pa// 'kho
bas skag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/ zad pa shes pa skya bar bgyid pa/ ma skye ba shes pa rtog par bgyid ba/ ma rig ba'i mun pa'i phung po rab tu 'joms par
bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa// srid pa'ichu klung skams par bgyid pa 'du yang bskur lags te/ tad+ya thA/ bAye ba a pa rab re/ bA he/ bA ha/
par bAre/ pra tipA pra tu be pa ra bAre/ A ba/ A ba pa ri bA ro/ tadzate dza pa ra bA ro/ ma lom la pa rab ro/ kha g+ho kha g+ha pa ri bA re/ a lo ke daa lo ka pa
ri bA ra/ sgra me sbyam pa ri bA re/ ra dzo ra dza pa ri bA re/ sa le si la pa ri bA re/ ga ma ga ma pa ri bA re/ a bo tsa/ a bo tsA pa ri bA re/ ma la ma la me la ma ra lA rA la
la ra ma bde tshu dzAname b+hu tang ga ma b+hu'u tung/ g+ha ma pa rab ra/ tsaklu gru he/ tsak+ta gru hapa ri bA re/ shod tu gra he/ shod tu gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ grwa nagra he/
rgyu Na gra ha/ pa ri bA ro/ d+d+hihAkr-i ha dzihA grwa ba/ pa ri bA re/ kAa gra he/ kAyaM gra hA/ ba ribA ri/ ma na gra haM/ man gra ha/ pa ri bA ra/ sperA gra he
sngarA gra he/ pa ra bA re/ pa da nA gra he/ ba da na gra he/ pa ri bA re/ trish+tsa grwa he shu gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ u ba da nA gra he/ u ba danA gra ha/ pa ri bA re//
bA ba gra nyapa ra bAre/ dza tu gra nye dzad gra ha/ pa ra bA re/ dzAr ma ra Na gra he/ dze rAm ra Na gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ du kha san tApa gra hU~M/ du kha san tA pa gra ha/
pa ra bA re/ A rA pa ra d+hu dze/ A rA pa ra d+hA dza/ gra ha pa ri bA re/ A rApA ra dwa dza gra he/ A rA pA ra dwa dza gra ha/ ba ri bA re/ a bA rta ba brta gyi a pa ra mu pa ma
sA s+ya/ be g+ha ba nobatra Ar+yar/ samabo sha shAn ti swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i
bzod pa bskur ba ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas
kyang legs se zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa dag na ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i
shugs kyi sAng po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'dir nga stan 'di nyide la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas
ba/ lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis
gang khyed 'dzar 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir/ byin pa lus kyi khyad par thams cad sgrub ba zhes bya ba nas/ shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i bar nyi ma'i
spyan pad+ma'i spru gu'i gzungs sngags de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi me'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
zla spyod ya the dan/ sid d+ha ma te/ bu lo ka ma te/ a le kA ta ri she/ ru tse/ su ru tse/ bud d+he/ ba bud d+he/ mahA bud d+he/ unamad te/ sunamad to/ pra tin
d+ha na/ rA ga rU pa/ rAg rU pa pra ti bi d+ha na/ bin du/ bin du ma te/ tsate tse tapra ti/ sho d+hane/ a skatsan da/ ha ha tsa ti/ na Da/ nirma/ ha/ ka ma/
ba ga/ ha ta/ pA nan+d+hab ra dza/ hata tsa lhasam to/ hata bo me ta mud te/ ha ya g+ho/ ha ta ya h+phe/ haya g+ho/ ha ta sa mu tra dza bro/ hata bi ma na ra/ hata
hahi/ ha ta dzatsa/ ha ta das ra/ hatab hu ra dza/ ha ta brdzam te/ hata u pag ma to/ ha ta ro ga ra g+haM/ ha ta rog ra/ ha ta da rma sI no/ hata
sarnyan mA ta/ dzA/// badza/ dzA// saN+DamA ga dza dzA/ a kho na ta tra/ sang sa ra du khe sa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
gshegs pa tsam po ka'i mdog des/ bdag chaso ba'i dus kyitsi/ bsrung po'i slad du nyi ma'i spen pad+ma'i gzungs sngags gsal ba ni 'di lags so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal ba/ snyan pa khyod kyis nyi ma srung po'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ snyan pa de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba red par dka' 'o// dre bas kyang nyi ma'i spyanapad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di chos red par
dka' 'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshags pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rten blos kyis kyang rung/ gang gas kyang ri'i rgyal po re reb bam/ rgya mtsho chen po'i yon tan
dang phanayon brjod par nus so// rigs ma'i spyan pad+ma'agazungs sngags 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang rung// brjod par ma nus
so/ nyame'i spen pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang/ der sems can rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes byab nas/
zag pa thams cad zad pa dang/ byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sbos kyi glang po ches 'dra skad ces gsol to// shing
ga rgyal po drung du bdud na gcig pu khyod kyis bcom// byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang na gtsage pus brnyes pa lags// lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin gtsag bu khyod kyis dbang du
mdzad// rgyal ba nyi me rab dro ye shes mchog gi 'od zer lags// 'di na mu stegs gzhan zhigatsag bu 'od drang bral mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun n srin bu me khyer dag la
nyi ltar mdzes// thuba' 'dusan sems can bsgral ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang chos tshul yun ring gnas pas mdzad// khyod gcig
pu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa// dug dang byang chub yongs su brtsam phyare chos don gnyer ba lags// rgyal ba khyodan sdug bsngal thams cad gcod
pa'i chos ston pa// khyod na ye shes byang chub spyod pa rab mchog ston par mdzad// gcig pus zha gyur bdud rtsis sems can rnams kyang zhi mdzad pa// yang sride mams
mdzad sladu srog chags khrag khrig sgrol ba khyod// zag pa zad cing lta dang bral ba nyon mongs spangs gyur pa// gangan mya ngan byed med zhu ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod// 'di/
ni 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mtshungs lags te/ rgyal pa rnams kyis khyod la zhu ba'i smad du pho nyar mngags// rig pa'i rgya mtsho thugs rje mnyam pas gnas bar
mdzad pa po/ thub pa zla ba chos dang gsananas gzungs kyang bskur ba lags// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dpa bgyi na grong khyer
rgyur dpag tshad tsam mchis pa/ bya mas bltam pa de snyad kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 'dus pa nas/ sAgs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma'i rgyal
mtshan zhes ba de mchis te/ dran de bzhin gshegs pa ridabang rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des
bdug 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'ge par mdzad pa'i 'od zer kyi le'u sems can rnams
las 'bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing/ gnod pa chung ngas/ bskyed pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes
[f2e ]/kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rtsa snyan ma mda' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma/
mtshame 26gas sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar mos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags
sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhang 'dan/ bdud kyi yul dang/ klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs
glu rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags samaM/ sangs rgyas kyiyul 'dan/ gang su dag 'khor lo bskor
bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u
sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so/ de nas stong ba nyide dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/
phan yon tshab/ 'dod pa 'a 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par
bgyid pa// nga rgyal dang/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang/ pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad bar bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar dang/ sdug bsngal gyi
khur 'dor bar bgyid pa'i bar 'du yang bskur lags te/ tad+ya thA/ dru ma te/ d+hu ma te/ a kiM d+hu ma te/ pra b+ha sa d+hu ma te/ sawA kA sha/ d+hu ma te/ a phe kha g+ha/
ba ma te kha g+ha/ amo ha kha g+ha/ anamya bya khag+ha/ bya brid ti kha rgyu/ sam ru tsa kha rgyu/ a nim kha g+ha/ li tsan ba g+ha/ sha kha kha rgyu/ ba tisi ra kha rgyu/ u kam ba rgyu/
u ra kha gyu/ akA kha/ ya bad ma nokha g+ha/ rUb kho g+ha/ ya bad bi dzAnakha g+ha/ tsakU rgyu du kha rgyu/ ya bdaman baidz+nyAnad+hA tu kha g+ha/ pri thi bi d+hA tu kha g+ha/ ya bad/
bad na nga tshu kha g+ho tsa tu smad tu pa smra na kha g+ha/ ya bad ga ba ni ka kha g+ha/ du ba khaglu/ Abad man kha g+ha/ ba ba ba/ na bi kra ba/anun/ sa se ud tra nAn/ sa//
kA ra Nano/ sa sad smra na ba shwa bon ni/ A kAn tsan nan/ kA b+ha kA/ A li i si le/ a i la/ ma le sAhA/ bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa 'dabang rgyal
pos khyod la stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba na 'od legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legs sazhis bya ba gnapang/ sangs
(rgyusakyi zhing ma mdzad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lcags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa dag name gtogs so/ de
sa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shes kyi bu 'dir du stan 'di nyid la bzhugs
bzhin du sems can rnams la don drang bcas pa// tshig 'bru dang bcas pa lhag chad med pa'i stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzus sngags rgya cher ston par mdzad do/
zla dges kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ra debang rgyal pos/ gang khyod 'dare 'ong ba'i tsho bsrung ba'i phyir byon mi 'dapa' sbubs kyi lung bstan pa/ sems can rnams kyi semag dar
tshor ba bsgrubs pa yang dag par 'du ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dang// bdud bzhi 'dul ba sgrub pa'i gnas dang/ chos kyi tshul dang/ dkon mchog gsum
gyi gdung sgrubo pa ma zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i bar de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po sbos kyi glang po chos 'di skad ces gsol
tor M tad+ya thA/ sha ra Na byaya/ shik+ka bya ya/ sna ti bye/ pra han bya ya/ rade da byaa/ an dra ye bya a/ ba la bya ya/ rlung ga bya ya/ sa mA d+hi byaya/ d+har
na bya ya/ kun tu phyi/ rgya nan bya ya/ sa rU pa byaya/ A na ni dzi byaya/ mArga bya ya/ a ba dza bya ya/ pra tu sam ba ta bya la/ bya ma bya a/ bad du bya ya/ ma na mi
tubya la/ ma hA kA run bya la/ srid ti b+ho bya ya/ sa tu bya ya/ d+hamabya ya/ ta ma bya ya/ A lo ka bya ya/ pra ti b+ha sa bya ya/ prati rud kA bya ya/ gag na bya ya/
byas/ shwa rgya ta bya ya/ pra tI dbyaya/ a pra Na hid bya ya/ A ni yong ta bya ya/ ru ta bya ya/ rgyug bya a/ a kin tsa na byaya/ a ba si ba/ a na nu/ anon/
a ba ha/ tsatsAr/ tsa tsa tsAr ba mu/ tsa// tsatsAr ba mu/ bya ya/ ba mu/ klu ya ba mu/ A pa bya a ba mu/ a sa mu dA tsa rab mu/ rtsed ba mu/ A
kAsha ba mu/ byub sha ma ba mu/ an g+ha sa bsu/ a ha hab chu/ a pA ra bi mu/ u pa sha ma sa la la ba mu smahA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs/
pa ra dbang rgyal bo dogs bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag bsrung ba'i slad du ma zad pa'i sbrebs kyashezungs sngags btsal ba ni 'di legasaso// de nas bcom ldan
nas shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u dza ni la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u de ni khyod kyis ma zad pa'i spubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ ko'u di tse de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// de bas kyang mi zad pa'i sbyabs kyi lung bstan pa 'di ches rnyed par dka' 'o/
rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i nyin gros kyis kyang rung/ bskal pa brgya stong gi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi skad cig bgrang bar nus
so// gang dag mi zad pa'i sbubs kyigazungs sngags 'di'i mun pa med par 'dug pas zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag nagang gis kyang bgrang bar ma
nus so// ko'ud n+yade lta bas nami zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i chos 'di tsho ltar gros pa 'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang/ de dag
chos de thos pas las thams cad zad pa thob pa ra 'gyur ba nas/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag dang/ spobs pa gcad du med pa dag dang/ spobs pa rgyun ma chad pa'i bar
dag thob par 'gyur zhing/ khrims gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhinagshegs pa dag tu'ang 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen/
po snang ba'i snying bo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btung nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di deg gsol to// 'gro drug
sdug bsngal gyis khridatsang// nyon mongs nad kyis kun tu gayadas// khyod name khas pa mgonagyur khyod/ khargal nas 'gro ba sgrol mdzad khyod// dbang po drug la rmongs
gyur cing// bdud kyi zhags pa nyon zin la// yang dag lam ni ston pa khyod// 'dzage rtan nan rib rAd dkag/ yan lag drug ldan khyim gyi gzhu// mkhas pa'i mi
tshas sbyangs pa lags// khyod ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen// chos kyi mu ge 'dzagi mdzad pa// mngon shes drug ldan sgom chen lags// bden pa gsung ba drang
srong che// sems can 'khor bar zhugs pa rnams// 'ching ba dam las sgrol mdzad khyod// khyod kyi sngags la dad nas su// zhing 'dir yang n lhugs pa lags//
'dare na 'jig rten mgon po yis// bdag cag phonyaramangags kyis gson/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
kyi byam snyad 'dus nas/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams sdong po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa lo shis dpal brtsegs
rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gnag
ba de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u/ sems can rnams kyi les 'byang ba'i gzungs
sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing/ gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngas/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang 'dra bar mdzod lags na/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ru snyan ma mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ ma
sgyu pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags sam/ dza ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du yang chos de la nan tan snying bor bde ba dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid
lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ad na bdud kyi yul dang/ klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs
pa ma mchis par 'khor lo bskor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang su dag 'khor la skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa yis dpal brtsegs
rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i tshes kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi les 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad
mthawa/ pa sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas smon pa med pa'i rdzas sumathunapa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phanayon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par
zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams rud dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyide pa/ nga rgyal dang/ lhag/
pa'i nga rgyal dang/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad yang dag par zadu par brgyad pa 'di yeng bskur lags te zhes bgyud pa nas/ ma rage pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab
tu'joms par bgyide pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ ta[5]wA/ shan sha ra/ sha na
nag ba/ a ba klu brasha/ tsaklu g+ho ba shab/ khro dgu ba/ gluN shab/ dza hAshab kA ya gab/ mAn sha ba/ ka ta bdebya tsek+ku/ pra ti bi ka thu/
sho tsAA bkwa dza hA bA yu ku shu mon o dza kA b+ha/ a lo ka dzAn ke/ bI dzesang kra ma kAsh+tsa/ ang kur/ kha g+ha/ kAb+ha sha ma/ ka ru ka b+hu ka ya/ rA sA sku
ba/ shAn ta phyi sra lha b+ha/ na to na taM/ na ton/ a ba ni ra to/ nan yA pan yi na ton/ a kha an to du kha su satwA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
ba ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des/ smon pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba ni 'du lags so// b.rum ldan 'das kyis kyang legru
so zhes bya ba gnang// bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong ma mdzad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad drang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang
( legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad rjes bka' stsal to//
rigs kyi bung stan 'dra de la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la don bzang po tshog 'bru bzang po lhag chad med pa smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rgya cher ston
par mdzad de// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal pos de gang khyod la 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe byin pa rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa de khyod kyis kyang ston
gi lung bstanapa des ni'i dare sems can rnams kyi srid ba chung ngu dang 'bring dang/ chen po nyon mongs pa srid pa'i sgyurab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gzugs dang
gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa sade ba'i rnam bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bstsal bar 'gyur ro// las 'byung ba dang/ dge ba'i phyogs thams
cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du yang 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin te// bstan par bgyi lags so// tad+ya thA/ ba rgyu pa ra tsi de/ goms kAs/
gaN+Dar bde lta bu b+ha ga klu ka a yo ge pra ti ri re shu man nA sa ka the/ sa ma me kA dzaSha/ akA ya na te/ klu sgyub rdzo/ nad cu dzate/ sa mun te/ apyasha ya dzA te/ badzra
ba dz+ha/ shikAdza sa rlu dza ba tshu te/ sa la la gu bya zhe[ ]/ sa la ku bya ba kA ri na ko sha/ sa hrun ko ni swA ba dA nAn// ba tu brid te/ u pa kra ma pa rje/
pas nats+tshar bra khe/ pra ti kra ma Na/ sa bdu blugs la tsa na ba mi/ kro d+ha d+hare/ kA ma sa ge/ sku kAn kha ge na rgyu kun tsa/ bad rub na kAn ba na/ u tsa ba na/
sa ma ma ka re/ shar e ba na/ mo g+ha dza de/ har kon ba/ naya na mu le sA ra ka ko la/ nA rAu tshur/ a nadra bA sa no/ o a/ a ba sa/ sa rab
a ba rA/ A pa rA/ sa ma g+ha du kha na ste ra nan che he sanA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des/ bdag chas pa'i
dus kyi tshe bsrung ba'i slad du rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa stsal ba na'ed lags so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
byas bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// de bas kyang 'ge sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'du ches
blornyed par dka' 'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyen thos kyang rung bskal pa brgyas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyisa' khems
thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams bkrung ba 'am/ mtha' rtogs par nus so// rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di'i mtha' na bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang brjod/
par ma nus so// rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan ba 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rig sngags 'ad yang thung zhig/ kun chub par byos shig/
'khorab zhi po dag la yang rgyas par ston cig/ yang dag par rab tu ston tsag dang/ de blos pas kyang sems can de dag gi srid pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po sride pa'i
rgyu rnams dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rgyab kyis phyogs
par 'gyur ro/ bud med mtshams med pa byed pa'i las kyi sgrib pa sride ba'i rgyu rnams zud par 'gyurazhing/ lhag ma med pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// zag pa thams cad zad pa
dang byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dab 'a chen po nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs
su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di reg gsol to// khyod ni ded dpon gtsuge bu lags// chos rnams kun la nges pa sta// mthong
ba'i gus pa skyes pa yin// bshes gnyenadubal yang nye bar 'dzani// ma rtog gcig dang bdug pa laMs// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod bgyis na/ yan lag
