pho brang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings na bzhugs pa mthong nas/ mchog tu yid mi bde lta/ lus thams cad nas la 'thon cang mchi ma byung nas ma dga' bar gyur to//
de bdud kyi gnas thams cad du rgyu bar byed/ rnam par rgyu bar byed/ 'jug par byed/ 'byung bar byed/ 'dug par byed/ ldang bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ kun tu rgyug
bar byed/ glal bar byed/ 'dzum par byed/ shugs ring du 'byon par byed/ kha la lces ldeg par byed/ mge 'dzas par byed/ lag pa gnyis skyong zhing skum par
byed/ mgo la lag pa gnyis kyis rdzob par byed/ mgrin pa dang nu ma la mnyed par byed/ de mthong bas bdud kyi gnas na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gnod pa dang/
mngon par mi dga' ba dang/ yid mi bde bar gyur to// de nas bdud gor ba nam mkha'i shang zhes bya ba des bdud sdige can l tshogs su bcad pas dris pa/ 'khrul semA
tshade rab ma bde bas// tsa med de ltar khyod rgyug cing// kun la dwaga' bar ma dgongs bas// gang du yang ni dgyes ma mnga'// bdud sdige can gdong mcha ma dang bcas
pas 'di skad ces smras so// go'u tam stobs chen mthong nas ni// nga yi snying na rnam gam nas// lus kun nas ni rngul 'thon cing// gdeng yang mchi mas gang ba
yan sems can thams cad mthun pa ru// dza ltar thos pa bzhin du der// tshogs chen ril gyis deng bas na// nga yi yul ni stongs par byas//
nam mkha' dang na mtshungs pa'i yul// phyogs bcu nas na lhugs pa yis// de la bskor ba byas nas su// bye ba mang pos yongs su bskor// bdud rnams thams cad
zla 'khor bcas te// de la yang na skyabs song bas// nga yis dpungan ma mthong ste// gang na'ang nga yi phyogs med do// de nas bdud sdig can la bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shang
lhades 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag thams cad 'khor bcas te// go cha sra ba dag bgos nas// ral gri 'khor lo mda' bo chos// de yi lus ni phye mar rlag/ sdig
can gyis smas pa/ de lamang ni skyabs song zhing// der yang rang nyid song bas na// de la dmag ni yang dag phul// ngani bcing ba dam pos bcings// de nas bdud shor ba/
nam ma kha'i shang des smras kha/ thabs rnams kun gyis ci bgyis kyang// dgran dbang du ma 'gyur te// mdza' bo'i gzugs kyis bslas bgyis na// de ltar na ni ga sad
bar nas// sdig can gyis smras pa/ badza' bo'i gzugs kyis der 'gro bar// 'di ltar bdag gis de bsams nas// rang gi mgul ni dri nga ba'i// ro myags 'jigs su
rung ba mthong// nam mkha' shing gis slar smras pa// bdud dang klu dang bsam gtan pa'// tshul gsum dag tu bshad pa la// bdag cag gi na tshul bcom yang// klu rnams/
in yul bstan no// klu de dag kyang gzi brjid che// dmag rnams mang zhing stobs kyang che// de dag gi ni yul mchis pa// kun tu gzhan gyis ma grub lags// 'dod pa'i
khams nagang su dag/ klu yi rgyal po gnas gyur pa// de dag rnams la go'u ta ma// thal bar rlag par myur du bsgo// sdig can gyis smras pa/ kye bsod nams shes rab chen
po can// klu a gnas su nyade song la// go'u ta la dang dmag 'gyed par// thams cad la na khyod kyis bsgo// des smras pa// de bzhin du bgyi 'o zhus nas/ dmag
brgya stong go bgos ba de dag la lag pa bsgrung ste bsgrags ra/ klu yi rten du bdag cag 'deng// go'u ta ma dang dmag 'gyed cing// srog dang bral bar byed du gzhug// der
ni bdag cag grogs bya bar// thams cad la ni bsgo bar bya// de na 'khod pa de dag kyang gang du ang suyang 'gro ma nus pa dang/ shor ba nam mkha' shing de gdong mchi ma dang bcas
shang spyi zang zhes byed par gyur to/ thol mo sbyar ba byas nas sdig can la snyas pa/ bdag cag gis ni gang du yang// mchi bar bgyi ba'i rngom glog/ sgyu 'phrul brtan
po go'u ta ma// drang srong gi na skye lags so// bdag cag thams cad kang pa bcings// lus rnams kun la rngul yang byung// gang gis dgra las/
khyod rgyal bar// gzhan zhig kyang na mdzad par gsol// bdud sdigacan je sdug bsngal zhung gi de ma bde nas mya ngan du gyur nas de 'di lta bu'i blo skyos te/ gang bdag goge klu'i
rten thams cad du gung kun tu skye bar byed pa dang// mngon par mi draga' ba skyed par byed pa dang/ klu thams cad kun du gshe bar byed pa'i bdud kyi stobs de lta bu yang
dag par dran par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis klu'i rten thams cad dug sbrang dang/ sbrang bu mchu ris dang/ sbrang bu gdug pa rnams
sprul te// thams cad dri nga bas bkang ngo//rdul byung ba dang/ mngon par mi dga' bar byas so// dro bzhin du klu dang klu chen po skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo
thams cad mngon par ma dga' nas/ de dag thams cad kyis rnam par bltas te/ bdag cag la rtso 'dra bar byed pa su yin snyam na/ de dag gis ma shes shing ma mthong ngo//
gling bzhi pa 'di'i klu dang klu chen po skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo gang jag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang khro bas thol gyis non nas/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang
rang gi gnas bor/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ nye dga' gnyis 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas kyang rang rang gi gnas bor nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'dab na/ rang la ta ya/
zhes bya ba yod de/ ri kha la da ya de'i rtse mo na/ drang srong thub pa rnams kyi gnas rten na/ kun rten ces bya ba rgyar dpag tshad bzhi khri pa lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa
zhig yod pa/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du rten cing zhugs so// der de dag zhugs ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i lus chung ngur gyur te/ dang ra na mag sman bku ba'i
thur ma bzhin no// de dag kyang rang khros pa'i mthus re re yang 'di lta bu'i lus ra re ba tsam du yang dag par shes te// de dag gis skad 'byin kyang ma nus so// de nas 'gro bar
yang ma nus te/ mya ngan chen bo dang/ khro bas thol gyis non nas der 'khod do// de bzhin du klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho 'khor bye ba brgya stong phragaM du ma dang/ de bzhin du
sa spungs kyi bu zhes bya ba'i khar dang/ de bzhin du shin tu brtan zhes bya ba'i bar dung/ de bzhin du 'jog po zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du ma dros pa zhes bya ba'i bar
dang/ de bzhin du bting bzung zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du rgya mtshos byin zhes bya ba'i ber dang/ de bzhin du chu lhas byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du khyon
bdag gis byin zhes bya ba'i ber dang/ de bzhin du chu byan zhes byaba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du sog ma med kyis byin zhes bya ba'i ther dang/ de bzhin/
du ra bos byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du ba lang mgo zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du rgyun skyes zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du a la'i 'dab ces bya ba'i bar/
zladang/ de bzhin du lag pa'i tshogi mi mngon zhus bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du sku bsags zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du mtsho khyad ces bya ba'i ber dang/ de bzhin du stobs kyi rgyu
zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du duse'i gangs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar dung/ de brazhin du rgyu'i rishugs zhes bya ba'i phrar dung/ de bzhin du gtsug phud sngon po zhes bya ba'abar
dang/ de bzhin du gser ser skya zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du rtswa sngon po zhes bya ba'i bar drang/ de bzhin du gshe ba'i shing zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du mag gsal ba
[% ]zhes bya ba'i par dang/ dre bzhin du glang po zad ces bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du rnon pos byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du gnas na rgyu zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin
du gshol ngan zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du a la'i gdong zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du mgo dmar zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ de bzhin du yod 'phrog ces bya ba'i bar dang/
de bzhin du 'bu mchog ces bya ba'i bar dung/ de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na klu'i rgyal po chen po lnga khri drug stong gang drag yin pa'i bar de dag thams cad klu'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor

brgya stong phrag du ma drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du rten tsar zhugs so// glang brgyad khri bzhi stong nas gling re re nas kyang klu chen po brgya stong phrag du mas rang rang gi gnas
bonas/ gnas rten der skyabs kyi don du zhugs so// de bzhin du byung ga sgra ma snyan na klu'i rgyal po lus 'bags pa'i khab ces bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgyu ba chen po zhes
bya ba de gnyis re re yang klu dang/ klu chen po dang klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mo dang lhan cig tu yongs su bskoratshang drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyobs kyi don du
rten te// shar gyi lus 'phags kyi klong nas klu yi rgyal po zla srung zhes bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po dbyig gtong zhes bya ba de gnyis re re yang klu dang/ klu chen po dang/ klu'i rgyal
po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas lhan cig yongs su skor sring mdun du bdar te/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der skyabs kyi don du rten tsang zhugs so// dra lang spyod kyi gling

nas klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang/ klu'i rtse la pho ba lang 'od kyi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba de gnyis re re yang klu dang/ klu chen ng dang/ klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong phrag du mas lhan cig tumadun du bdar cung/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der skyabs kyi don du zhugs so// yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa 'di dang/
gling gzhan brgya stong phrag brgyad cu na/ klu dang/ klu chen po dang/ klu'i skye gnas pa klu sgo nga las skyes pa dang/ mngal nas skyes pa dang/ drod gsher las skyes pa dang/ rdzas
te skyes pa pho dang/ mo dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo yang rung/ gang su dag yod pa skad cig de la gang dor rten par ma gyur pa grwatshag kyang med de/ drang srong sgrub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don
du zhugs so// de dag thams cad zhugs ma thag tu re re yang 'di lta bu'i lus chung ngur gyur te/ dper na mig sman bku ba'i thur ma bzhin no// de dag kyang rang khros pa'i mthus re'i yang
'di lta bu'i lus ri rab tsam chen por yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo// de nas de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis gnas rten du klu'i skye gnas pa thams cad 'dus pa thams cad lus chung ngur mgrong
ngo// de mthong bas shas cher 'khrugs shang kun tu 'khrugs te slog nas rang gi skye bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'byung ba chen pos klu rnams thums cad g.yos// drang srong
gnas pa der na 'dus nas su// thams cad stobs dang gzugs dang dpal las nyams// dge sbyong dmangs kyi stobs la lta bar byos// de nas bdud shor ba gzhan tshul/
khrims rten zhes bya ba des sbas pa/ thugs ma dgyes pa ma mdzad bdag la gson// klu rnams bdag nyid rtsa ba 'di lags te// ji ltar shAkya'i bu ni phyir rlog pa'i// chogs/
chen 'dus pa la ni mngon brtag mdzod// sdoge can gyis smras pa/ blo mchog de na myur du 'gro bar byos// klu yi tshogs ni thams cad spro bar byos// rje spu shA ka bu tshogs
bcas bsad nus na// klu rnams kyi ni yul yang mchog tu 'gyur// de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten de bdud kyi gnas de nas srog chags brgyad khri dang lhan cig chag so// de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sngon gyi skyon lam mthar phyin pas/ drang srong thub pa thams cad dbang du mdzad/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad/ sangs rgyas
kyi yul thams cad kyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyu 'thun pa bshad pa yang dag par bstan/ byang chub sems dpa lasoms dpa' chen po thams cad skyo bar mdzad/ rtswa dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ mi deng ma ma ani pa shAms cad rab tu dga' bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad shin tu yongs su spyad pa mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
pa thams cad kyi nang na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di mchog tu ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang/ ches skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ chos bsod nams kyis bon byed pa'i mdangs dang
ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi mchod bar 'os par mdzad de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs ra sa 'phrul mngon nga ra 'du ma dzad pa rgyun de rbad do//
de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'din sems can gang dag yodra pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyi shes pa so sor sbyangs so// de bzhin gshegrwa
pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi su lakyi rgyu mthun nga 'a cho 'phrul gyi byin rlabs kyi teng nge 'dzan gyi stobs rgyun bcad pa dang/ de'i tsho sngon dza ltar bzhugs pa bzhin du yang drag par snang//
de de ltar shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de de'i bar du yang rang gi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas
bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang/ dri dang/
phye ma dang/ rin po che dang/ ras bcos bu dung/ chos gos dang/ phyang phrul dang/ rgyan sna tshogs dang/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas spyan
sngar 'khod do// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ ga za dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi bar de dag/
thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'dus la me tog dang/ dra dang/ phye ma dang/ rin po che dang/ ras bcos bu dang/ chos gos dang/ phying phrul dang/ rgyun sna tshogs zhes bya ba
nas/ mchod pa'i bar du byas te/ bskor ba byas nas chos mnyanapa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// bdud shobatshul khrims rten bdud kyi res brgyad khri dang/
de nas 'dzam bu gling 'dir babs nas/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas sku yas pa kun tu bstan pa ji ltar rgyun bcad pa mthong ste/ de yul ma grwa rgyun bzhugs pa kun tu snang ngo// de bdag cag
gis smug pas rgyu'i stobs las ma nyams sam snyam zhing da lta na dor 'khor dang bcos 'dus pa'i nang na 'dug na/ de bdag cag gi phyir 'jug nas sdig pa byed dam snyam ste/ gang
bdag cag gis der dang por song nas 'di la rgyu gang yin par 'gyur ba nyan par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten 'khor dang bcas te/ de nas babs/
nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ de'i tshayong des tshigs su bcad pa spobs pa byas pa khyod kyis
0/ @#/ nadan chen po dang// rga sha'i mtsho las ma rgal to// 'di ltar sems can skya phyed na// byang grol du nadza ltar zhugs// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ bdud shorab tshul khrims rten la tshigs su bcad pa slar baka' stsal pa/ nisims can chu bo sgrog/ nga la yang srid med pa yin// sems can rnams la
thugs brtse'i phyir// srog chags rnams la chos ston to// 'khor bar yunarangs brtsams nas su// khyod kyi byang chub phyir spyod de// mar me mdzad ni tshun chad du//
sbyin dang tshul khrim kun tu sgrubs// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong po// de dag khyed kyis ri mor byas// thog pa mchog gi don du no// nga yis khyod la lung bstan te// sbyangs
tho pa'i yon tan kun tu spyad// mtshan ma med pa rnam par bsgoms// nga yis mge rnams dag pa sbyin// sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par byos// de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten
sngon gyi tshe rabs dang/ smon lam dang/ sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os
par gyur te/ gdong mchi ma dang bcas pas thal mo rab tu sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcomaM ldan 'das byas pa ji lta ba dang/ myos pa dza lta ba dang/ sems
'khrugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du nongs pa 'chags lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nongs pa 'chags lags so// 'dultar bdag kas dran lags te/ gras ma mchis pa gzhi
rdzogs bar bla na ma mchis ba yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byed chub tu brtson pa chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod ba spyod lags so// dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs pa mang du bgyis
lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa rnams dang bzhugs pa brgya stong phrag bye nga la bdag gis bsnyen bkur dang/ bkur ste rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te// chos
kyang thos lags so// smon lam ya nga btab lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la dge slong la nyan thos kyi gtam rjes su bskul bar bgyis lags te/
nas bdag gis ma bsams bar kyi ma dge sbyong gi lus khyad kyis gang zag gleg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyimadun du nyan thos kyi gtam 'chad pa 'dra na bdud do zhes sngog
pa can gyi tshig brjod lags te/ der gal te bdag gis sdigapa can gyi tshig du ma smras par gyur na ni/ der bdag gis bla na ma mchos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
pa thob par 'gyur lags na/ sug las kyi lhag ma des bdag de nas go 'phos nas bdud kyi gnas su skyes te/ dgung lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang/ dgung lo brgya stong dag tu
[7]@#// der blo na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gsems bskyod pa gcig kyang ma byung lags na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang
ci'atshal lags zhes de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la lan gnyis kyi bar du bzod par gsol to// ji srid du sngon gyi mtha' 'khor ba de srid du spyad kyis phyi ma'i mathra'i
mur sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro lags kyi/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems ldog par ma bgyade'ags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
! bka' stsal pa/ 'gas kyi bu legs so legs so// gang la la snying rje'i sems kyis byang chub tu sems gzhol bar byed na/ 'di ni 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog dang phul
yin te/ 'dren pa'i spyan sngar la la mar me ri cab tsam rab tu 'bar bar byed kyang bsod nams kyi phung pa de snyad yongs su bzung ba ma yin gyis khyod longs shig/ nga la sdig pa'i las
sra ba 'or tsag/ phung po dang/ khams 'di dag la spros pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ 'dus byas thams cad dran par byos shig dang khyod yon tan mchog du kha bsgyur
bar 'gyur ro// de nas de nyid kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su mthun pa'i tshos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas
[42/]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rten ston las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la rin thang med pa'i mu tig gi rgyan 'phrang gis sku la g.yogs nas gsol pa//
gang bdag cag gas chos thams cad myur du rtogs nas dbu ba dang 'dra ba'i lte ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par brgyad pa dang/ byang chub tu bzod lo achog thob par 'gyur ba dar
yun rade por ma thogs par sems can glams cad thar par brgyad pa'i tshos ni gang lags/ gang zhig na byed chub sems dpas sbyang ba'i slad du bsgom par bgyi ba lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims ston mkhas pas chos bzhi myur du skyed par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi phyir sdug bsngal tshad med pa thams cad la klobar
bya ba yan/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi bslab pa shubag yas pha gzung bar bya ba yin/ ma nyams par gzung bar bya ba yani/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa thams cad myur du
yongs su rdzogs pa'i byub yanano// yang de'i tshe tshul khrims rten gyi 'khor bdud kyi sde brgyad khri bzhi stong pa de dag gis lung bstan pa de thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa dag
dad pa zhachog skyes shing grub pa bskyod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhag pa'i bsam pas bzod pa gsol bar gyur to// de'i tshe de dag gis bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu smon las btab ste/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzan thob bo// bcom ldan 'das la de dag gis rang
yatshes rang gi lha rdzas kyi chos gos dag sku la gsol nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// bdud sdig can gyis mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag nas 'dra skad/
ces smras so// dge sbyoganistor chud pas// 'khor de dag dang bral bar gyug/ 'di nas gang du dong ba ni// thams cad de a drung du song// des su yang phyi rol ya'abyung zhug/
bdud kyi spyod yul 'dir bdag cag gnas par bya'o zhes smras nas/ myur du grong khyer gyi sgo bcad de gab tubcug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ji ltar nam mkha'i sbyin
las gsungs pa bzhin du de dug la tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnam pa gsum pa sems can la dmigs pa dang/ chos la dmiges pa drang/ dmigs pa med par rgya cher bstan par yang dag par
brtsom par mdzad do// ra kha la ya ta'i rtse mo dang drang srong grub ba'i gnas su klu gang dag rten cing 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi lus chung ngur mthong ste/ dper na mig
sman bku ba'i thur ma bzhin no// ji ltar sngon gyi lus bzhin du yang bzhag par ma nus so// slar 'byung bar yang ma nus te// de dag thams cad 'jigs shing skrag la spu zing zhes
byed pa 'a ba spu'i khung bu byung nas/ de dag thams cad kyis dga' bo dang nye dga' la rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces smras so// gang gi tshe bdag cag gi grong du sha sbrang dang/ sngad bu
mchu rades dang/ sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kun tu byung ba de'i tsho/ bdag cag gnas thams cad bor nas bskyab pa'i phyir 'dir zhugs nas/ 'di nas gang du yang mchi bar ma nus
te/ lus dag kyang chung ngur gyur lags na/ gang gis bdag cag gnas su mchi bar bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ mi 'jigs pa stsal par gsol/ dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis
kyis kyang smras pa/ dge sbyong 'di ni g.yo sgyu can gyi blo// shAkya'i bu pho sgyu ma byed pa yin// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir zhugs par gyur nas su// lus kun la ni thams cad chud par gyug
des na klu rnams kun gyi gnas dag tu// sha sbrang sbrang bu mchu ris sbrang bu sgrol// sa 'dir skyab+hA phyir nged cag lhags rgyur to// thams cad stobs rnams las ni nyams par
gyur/ go ta ma ni blo gros g.yo can yang// las des rdzu 'phrul de las na chos gyur cing// de ni lus kyang chung dur gyur nas su// stan gyi stong na dmangs ni kun tu snang// des
ni bdag cag lus kyang chung dur byas// btson ra 'dir ni bcings par gyur nas su// nged cag tsa yang byed par mi nus kyis// ma 'jigs lha la khyed cag phyag tshol cig/
'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud sdig can la klu de dag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te smas pa gang bdag cag btson ra de nas 'byor ba dang/ rang rang gi gnas rnams/
su gnas par rngo thogs par bdag cag bskyab tugasol/ klu'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi dus de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// bdud dpung bcas pa rang nyid skrag nas su// go'u ta ma
sgyum g.yo sgyu can la skyo// 'khor dang lto kol rnams kyang g.yo yas su// dres na de la skye bo mang po phrogs// bdud la mthun rtse gang yod ma yin/ 'gro ba dang ni 'phrul de
las nyams// gzhan la khyed cag myur du skyabs su deng// lha rnams la ni kun kyis rjed par byos// de nas klu thams cad kyang kha cig ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyago
'tshal bar byed de// kha cig ni brgya byin la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha tsug nu rib 'thab bral la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha cig na yongs su dga' ldan la phyag 'tshal bar
byed do// kha cig ni 'phrul dga' la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha cig ni lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha cig ni tshangs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal bar byed
do8/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces smras so// lha dang lha dbang 'di kun 'khod nas su// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang// go'u ta ma
dmangs la thams cad skyabs gnas pa// khyed cag gis ni ca ya phyir ma mthong// dka' thub drag po drang srong chen po dag/ gzhan rnams la ni grogs dag khyod phyag 'tshol/
rtas krungs ma thon par skar ma dga' ba dang// ngan slong du la tsa phyir phyag mi 'tshal// de nas klu de dag thams cad kha cig na drang sror rab tu dpal ldan la phyag 'tshal bar byed do//
ba tsag na brtan po la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha cig ni sa spungs la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha cig ni mthon por 'phur la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha cig ni skar ma lta
dga' ba la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// kha cig ni drang srong ngan sbyong gi bu la phyag 'tshal bar byed de/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag la skyabs su nye bar dong
yang de'i tshe drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ de dag gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi ngos la/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i mdunan/ shA kya khyu mchog gi yon tan sngags pa nyan
cing 'khod de/ drang srong de dag gis klu thams cad 'o dod 'bod pa thos so// thos nas kyang drang srong lnga pa de dag stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dar 'a chen pa/
skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das drang srong thub pa'i rten du klu thams cad gnod par gyur cing/ bdag cag la skyabs su nye bar gnas pa gzigs/
@#/// sam bzhus te/ der bzhud la klu'i sde thams cad yongs su sbyar par mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ khyod deng zhig/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin brgya
stong phrag mang po 'di dag nga'i mdun du 'khod nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmags pa med pa yongs su 'dri bar byed de/ ngas de dag gsems yongs su ma gu bar bya'o// de nas skar ma
la dga' ba'i rkang pa gnyis la drang srong de dag thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyis deng ste/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas kyi gzhi rten du
bod do// de nas de dag la klu de dag mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so// khyod bsod nams can shes rab dang ldan pa thabs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drang srong chen po dag/
lags na/ bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ btson ra'i 'jigs pa 'di las bdag cag yongs su dgrol du gsol/ de nas drang srong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//
nged kyis na khyed 'di nas yongs su grol bar byed par ma nus so// lag 'gro'i bdag po dag gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi ngos la drang srong thams cad kyi bla ma dbang che bar grags pa/
shes rab dang/ thabs dang gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ des khyod 'di nas yongs su grol bar byed par 'gyur ro// de la phyag tshol cig/
de klos nas klu thams cad drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas/ dbyangs gcig gis 'o dod bos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad/
can drang srong skar ma la dga' bas lha dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang pos mdun du bdar cing yongs su bskor te/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas nas drang srong thub
ba'i gnas der yang phyin par gyur te/ de la klu thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa mchog bskyod nas 'di skad ces smras so// gang bdag cag rang rang gnas su
mchase nas dga' bar 'gyur bar bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ gnas 'di nas bdag cag yongs su dgrol bar gasol/ 'du shes pa dus la lta ba drang srong chen po
des kyang rkyen gyi dbang gis de dag la rgyu skar gyi go rims kyi gtam brtsams pa/ ji ltar thams cad smrar 'gyur ba// de bzhin du ni bshad bar bya// byang la phan pa gzhan
med kyis// mthar gyis sun mnyan par gyis// 'dir nanub so gang gnas pa// de nadabyar zla tha chung ste// de ni'u me'i lha yin zhing/ klu rnams kun dang 'brel
ban// skarama'i dpyad na phangs pa dang// snying por drang srong sbyor bas bstan// gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams// nam mkha'i la ni su yis bzhag/ mkhas pa
rnams na dega' bgyid pa// lo skor shes pas bshad du gsol// zla ba DA ma rgyu skar dang// gathon rnams 'gro ba ji ltar lags// zla ba rnams
kyi dang por na/ rgyu skar gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba'i yud tsam gang zhig lags// go rims kyang na ci 'dra lags// lta na ci lags rus kyi lags// lcog
tsa legs ya nga ba gang// phan pa rtsa lags yang btsa// stabs ca// stobs su bdag la myur du gsungs// gang gis su ni mtshan mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdunan cazhe
lags// grib ma'i gom pa du zhig tu// nyi ma 'khor bar bgyid pa la// zla po gang la lho phyogs su// nya me byang du ji ltar gnas/ drang srongakhyod la kun kun// bdag cag
lan kun ston tsagi/ shes rab chen po 'jig rten mkhas// skar ma dga' la de skad smras// bskal pa bzang por zhugs pa na// sngon chad 'byung ba skya lag 'gro// dpal
ldan grong khyer lta len du// 'dod pa spangs shing chos dang ldan// gtsang ma 'dod cing rab mkhas pa'i// mi rgyal 'byor pa chen po byung// de yo btsun mo dam pa ni// 'dod pa
rnams la 'chums gyur nas// de tshe yul ni debun par yang// gzu lums can dang lhan cig sbyar// mngal na smin par bya ba'i phyir// yang dang yang du spyad nas su// de
rmachos kyis sbrum par gyur// mi snag pa yi khye'u zhig byung// bong bu'i mgo dang bud mgrin po// bong sna po la bong gdong po// thams cad rtsub po ral pa can// ma yin 'u sa
na phyed yod pa'i// de mthong 'jigs nas myur du ni// snam phyi sar ni de bor ro// reg tum rung mi gtsang ba// de phyir srin mo bong mos bangs// gangs kyi gnas su song nas su//
bu la chags pas gsos pa yin// bcud kyis len ni 'thungs pas na// de tshe lha dang lhan cig 'grogs// shes rab chen po skal ldan po// rab tu brtson ldan snying rje'i sems//
gzi brjid chen po byams pa thob// sems can kun la phan byed pa'o// lha yi tshogs kyang 'dus nas su// rngabong la na phyag 'tshal nas// de la yang na sIng brtse'i phyir//
gangs kyi ri bo sprul pa byas// shing dang me tog 'bras bur ldan// drizhim dga' bar byed pa ste// sna tshogs rtsi yis khebs pa la// bya rnams sna tshogs rten pa yin// der ni/
drang srong rnga bongani// rnam par dben par rten nas su// lo ni drug khri tham par yang// rkang pa gcig gis dka' thub gnas// brgya byin tshangs pas phyag byas te// lha rnamu
kun gyis mngon par bstod// gzugs rten lha rnams thams cad dang// der ni tshangs pa nyibar 'ongs// 'dod rten lha rnams thams cad dang// der na brgya byin nye bar
@#// 'ongs klu dang gnod sbyin grul bum dag/ thams cad der na nye bar lhags// 'jig rten gang sumakhas pa ni// drang srong tshangs par spyod pa rnams//
ba 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs khams dang// thams cad der na nye bar lhags// kun gyis drang srong rnga bong la// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas// btud na thal mo sbyar/
byas te// brgya byin tshangs pas 'di skad smras// skal ldan chen po kye khyod ni// ci phyir nged la mngon par dga'o// re ba ci 'dra ci la bsams// ci 'dod pa ni snyabar@#
[/ ]gyis drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa// gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams// mkha' la rtsa'adrar byung gyur pa 'di/ sngon gyi bskal pa bdag kas dran// nyin zhag tu ni rgyu skar
rnams// re re nas na rgyu bar byed// tshe rabs kun tu rgyuskar gyi// yon tan las rnams rnam par shes// bskal pa bzang bo 'di la ni// 'di ni rtsoyang mi snang
sku na snying brtse bgyis te khyod kyis ni// rgyu skar go rims kun zhog cig/ ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir gnas bzhin// de ya las dang yon tanagasungs// yon tan rgya mtshor yod
cig ces// lha yi tshogs rnams kun gyis smras// drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa// re zhig dang por smin drug ces// rgyu skar dkyil 'khor thams cad la// nang gi de la por
ma gzhag par bya// ji ltar smin drug gzhag pa bzhin// 'a da la su zhig dad pa 'bul// lha yi bu na nyi ma yang// skar ma drug pa ston par byed// smin drug rgyu skar de dag ni//
mkha' la rtag tu rgyu bar shog/ klams cad ldan pa'i 'khor dga' nas// me lha zhigan sprul ba byas// gzi brjid chen po drang srong lha// mi bzhi 'jug gi bus smras pa//
bdag gi sring mo'i bu 'di dag/ gling bzhi par ni gnas par shog/ drar slong nga bong smaraM smras pa// dang po smin drug de dag yang// rgyu skar chu yo rus can ni/ de gnyis
ba yang na yin par bya// skye dgu'i bdag gis 'di skad sgras/bdag gis bu lnga dbul lags te// rus ni drang srong chen po rgyu// rab tu brtson ldan snar ma lags// chu
ya rus kyi rgyu skar ni/ snar ma'i mi re go gnyis pa lags// zla ba'i bu lo gsum po na// ming na mgrozhes bgyi ba lags/ pA ra dwa pa'i rus su// mgo zhes bgyi ba gzhag
pa logs// rab tu ma bzad log ces pa// lha drag rnams kyis bstan pa lags// lcang sngo'i bu yi bu rus su// de ni bzhi bar bzhag pa lags// drang srong bcas pa'i
lha tshogs kyis// nyi ma'i bu ni bstan lags te// nang so lags shing gnas 'jog dus// phur bu'i bu ni gsum lags te// lag gi bu ya rus lag gang// rgyal zhes
bgyi bar de dag bshad// sa srudas kyi na bu lnga po// brtul zhugs spyod pa mkhas pa rnams// mdza' bo'i bu ya rus lags te// de ltar de dag rgyu skar
ba bdun/ shar phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag/ de yis las dang go rims dang// sbyor ba kha 'dzan gzhung las bstan// ngas kyang yang na khyed cag la// gling bzhape na gnas
byad mang// las ni tshe 'dra sgrub byed pa// mdor na myur du bshad par bya// phur bu'i bu ni bu lnga po// byang grol brtul zhugs 'chang ba dag/ ser skya'i bu ya rus su ni// lho
yi phyogs su ngas bzhag go/ dbyangs can gyin bu gnyis po// mnge gis kyang na gro yon te// drang srong go'u tam lus su ni// lho yo phyogs su ngas bzhag go/ lha mo yis ni bu gnyis
bo/ mang gis kyang na depo yun te// ko'ud rgya'i rjes su// lho phyogs kha 'dzan gsum pa bzhug/ sdig pa yi ni bu bstan pa// drang srong ka ta'abu rus// lhar bcas drang srong
rnams kyis der// me bzhu zhes ni bya bar bzhag/ dri za'i bu ni nag ba sta// kha ta'i bu yi rus yin no// sa ri de ni ma yi bu// ka ta'i bu chen rus yin no// 'dAr na sa ga
dpal gyi bu// ka ta'i bu rgan rus yin te// drang srong rnams kyi rgyu skar bdun// lho phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag/ mdza' bo'i bu yang bu bzhi po// drag po'i bu a rus inate/
mang gis lha 'tshams zhes bya ba// nub phyogs su na bzhag pa yin// dbang po ye no bu gsum ste// zla ba ka ta'i bu mi rus// 'jam pa'i las de thams cad la// gnyis po smon ni bzhag pa yin/
sa ya lha mo'i bu gsum ste// snubs na lag pa'i bu ya rus// rgyal ba'i lha mo'i bu bzhi ste// ka ta'i bu yi rus yin no// thams cad lha bzhis bya ba bzhi// mo'u 'gal bu la rus yin no// snubs
dang chu stod chu smad gnyis// rgyu skor gsum po bzhag pa yin// sred med bu yi bu gsum po// rgyu skar rnams ni rlabazhin 'khod// khyab 'jug gi na bu gsum ste// ka ta'i bu po dpal gyi rusaM//

de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun// nub phyogs kyin kha 'dzan yin// nor lha'i bu mon gru ste// drang srong rnaba'i rus yin no// chu lha'i bu ni gcig pu ste// dub tshobu yi rus yin zhing// sman ma sprul gyi lha
mo yi/ rgyu skar mon gre gnas pa yin// sdig pa mi na bu gnyis te// khrums stod ces ni bya bar bshad// chu yaM rna ba'i rus su ni// gsum pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin// rtswa yi drang srong chu lha'i bu//

khrums smad ces na byu bar bshad// bra nye drang srong rus yin bar// bzhi pa 'di ni bzhi g pa yin// lha yi drang srong rgyal gyi bu// nam gru zhes bya de bstan te// drang srong dbang po'i rus su ni// lnga
pa 'di ni bzhi g pa yin// dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gsum ste// rta len du ya rus yin zhing/ dmyu skar h+pha skar zhes bya ba// 'dzag rten mkhas pa rnams kyis bzhag/ drag po'i bu ni gsum yon to//
ma/ @#// bra nyang n spong rus yin no// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// byang phyogs kha 'dzani rnams su bzhag/ rgyu skar nyi ma rtsa brgyad po// kha 'dzan bzhir ni gzhung las bshad//
gtor ma las dang yon tan rnams// mdor na nga yis bshad par bya// thams cad rab tu thal sbyar 'khod// lha dang shed las skyes rnams kyis// drang srong nga bong la ni skus// mi dag sngon
du 'gro ba'i las// gang byas khyod nomi sdug skyes// gang du thams cad myur zad 'gyur// 'di ni lha dang mi rnams dang// drang srong dag nazhi ba rnams// thams cad gzug ni bzang por gyur//
rigs dar snyan ldan de dag kun// drang srong rnga bong de la ni// brgyabyin lhan cig 'khod nas su// 'khor kun rangs te phral sbyor gyur// bsam pa gtsage du smras pa na// nam mkha' 'di
la rgyu skar na// gang zhig drang po rgyu bar byed// kha zas su dri za shod// mi rnams kyi na las ci sgrub// yunanaM dza srong rgyu bar byed// drang srong de dag thams cad la// rnga bong gis ni 'di
skad smras// ji ltar nga yis brjod pa bzhin// 'dire na khyed kyis dad pa phul// rgyu skar 'di la nga mchog phyin// de na khyod la brjod par bya'o// go rims shes pa dra dug bzhin// gling
bzhi sems can phan pa'i phyir// la skorayang ni shes par bya// dang por nyi ma gang []ne pa// ngas byas pa ni nga yi mig/ bu drug g.yon can sems rangs ba// de na nga yis dang por brjod// ]
de ya phyiren smin drug ni// rgyu skar tshogs ni thams cad du// nang ga gtso bor gyur pas shog/ zla ba nya dang nyi ma yi// nyin mtshan de dag mnyam par gnas// mtshan mo
gzhan na mun khyab dang// chu lha yang ni gnas par 'gyur// 'gro ba bzod pa'i bgrang ba dang// bra nye gnas bzhin 'di ltar bshag/ mon sran bcu drug brgyar rgyu te// skyod
khu dang ni brgyad pa gtsage/ brgyad ba phrag nadicu drug la// cha ni gcig tu 'gyur ba yin// cha ni drug cu tham pa la// yud tsam tsag na de yin no// de tsam yud tsam sum cu la//
'dir ni 'jig rten gnas pa yin// ri rab g.yas nas bskor ba'i tshe// yud tsam sum cus 'gro bar byed// 'dir ni mon sran tshod ma bza'// bya ba nyur du grub par gyis///
rgyal po nad pa 'gro ba kun// zhag bcu tham par tham par bgyis// rtag tu dang bas mtshon chas srungs// mchog sbyin khyod kyi bu skyagang// tshor ba dbang po grul ba dang//
chos kyi blo gros nabaso la// mngal du nying 'tshams sbyor bar 'gyur// 'dir ni grol bya ba ma// chu smad bra nye gsum ba na// mi bzhu snar ma gro bzhin no// nor rgyud
bud ra u0f8bga lta ba na// stabs dang skag dang nam gru ni// lam dag gi ni rgyuskar yani// khrums stod dngan snon dang ni// rgyal dang yang na khrums smad ni// phun sum tshog
par byed pa yin// mchu dang chu stod zla skar dang// mon gru dang ni smin drug dang// dbo zhes bya ba dag gis ni// bde ba sgrub par byed pa min// 'di'i
na mgo dang nag pa dang// mon gru dang na lon gre dang// sa ra lag minam drug gis/ grogs po dang ni grogs mchog 'gyur// lha dbang pos 'di skadas// ston gyi tshe na tshos
rgyu gnyis la// yud tsam sum cur mi bzad pa// bya phyir mkha' la khyod gnas kyis// khyod kyis kyang na la lu gu dang// bu ram zas la gnas par gyis// nid pa zhag na bcu
gsum khrol// da lta skye dgu skye ba che da// shin tu tshul 'cha' snying rje spang// mchod sbyin dung na skye ba dang// snon la skyes tsho rtag tun// mngal du mtshams sbyor srung bar brgyas//
nag pa dang ni mon gru dang// mgo la grags pa mang du byed// byi bzhin dang na gri dang dbo// las dag gi ni rgyu skar yin// khrumar stong dang ma khrums smad ni// rgudabyed
mchungang chu stod dang// tha skar phun sum tshogs par byed// snangs dang skag dang nam gru dang// mon gre ma bzhi snar ma// bde ba sgrub par byed pa yi// bra nye dang ni gle dang ni//
chu smad mdza' bo'i mchog tu 'gyur// khrums stod dang na sa ra dang// mon gre dang ni neb so dang// sa go dang ni lag kyang na/ 'dir ni rnam pa drug tugyur// lha tsha drang srong nges
gsob kyis// snabs bshad pa na tshos gsul la// yud tsam sum cu nam mkha' la// bya ba che chung khyod gnas kyi// zas ni 'bras bu khag dang// bdug pa dang ni mi
tog ste// zhagan sum dur bdag nyid kyis// nad pa yang ni thar par byed// gang zhig spyod par byed pas ni// skye dgu ma spyi nor dang 'bru// skal ldan skyes bu'i rnam pa dang
sal las ni byed par 'gyur// mgo la mal du mtshams sbyor ba// rta dang yang na rdzamo dang// glang po che dang khyu mchog dang// ded dang bcas pa'i rnam pa la 'gyur// chu stod
dwang ni gri dang ni// bra na yang nagasum pa ste// 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur skag dang sgrubs// de la tshe ba byed par 'gyur// nam gru bgrang dang mnyam gyur te// monagru las kyi rgyu skar
in khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang// de la rgud par byed par 'gyur// lha ma tshems nab so gsum pa yin// lag nA ri la rgud byed 'gyug/ sa ga dang ni mon gyi yang// gsum pa
zhes na bya ba yin// zla skar de la grub par 'gyur// chu stod zla ba gnyis pa ste// smon dang rgyal zhes bya ba yang// de la bde ba byed par 'gyur// khrums smad ces nubya ba ni/ grog/
dang grogs po mchog tu gyur// drug po 'di dag lag dang ni// gro bzhin snar ma gsum pa yani// smin drug ces ni bya ba dang// byi bzhin dang na deb yoneno/ 'di ni khron pa sa rar
gyur/ma lha yin te sa gas bshad// glang pahAre tshes ni bco lnga la// khyod spyod yud tsam bzhi bcu ltas// 'gro bar byed cing bya ba ni// chen por mi bzad pa ya
gnas zhag na bco lnga tham pa yang// nad pa yang ni thar bar gyis// su zhig kyang ni khyod kyi bur// yang dag rjes su skye 'gyur ba// gzi brjid dang na dpal dang ni// longs sbyod dga'
ba 'bar bar 'gyur// bud med brnab sems shin tu bsrungs// de skya'i rgyu skar lag neno// dre'i las rgyu skar mon greyan// mchu dang chu stod tha skar rgyu// smone drug ces ni bya ba
la// 'di na 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// bya bzhin dang na dbo yang ni// 'dir ni rgud par byed pa yin// khrums stong dang ni snon dang ni// nang so yang ni gsum pa ste// lha mtshams
zhes ni bya ba yang// de la phun sum tshogs byang yan// nub so khrums stod snabs dang ni// nam gru skag na bde byang yin// gro drang yang ni chu s+sang dang// gsum pa bra te sgrub pa
yon mdza' bo dang ni mdza' mchog tu// de dag der ni 'gyur ba yin// nag pa snar ma mon gru bzhin// mgo gnyis ma bzhi gro bzhin ya nga// 'dir ni de bdun lho phyogs
kyi ka 'dzin phrugs zhes bya nga yin/// 'phags ba hAn tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde// nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/bam po brdung/
[mdza' bshes kyi ni sgyu mo yas// yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la// 'gro bar byed pa'i go rims kyang// lha mtshams la ni sas pa yin// bra nye tshes na bco lnga yi// nyan ra ra pa nga na ud+ha 5
mo yang na de tsam ste// nyin mtshan gcig la bra nye yin// mchu yi lha mo de yang ni// nyin dang mtshan du mnyam pa ste// du tsam sum cu tham pa yin// de yi longs spyod thang tsagasheg/ rgyal
po legs bstan snying rje spangs// mthun par yul 'khor skyong ba bzhin// de bzhin du ni mi bzad pa'i// bra/angan 'gro bar shog/ 'dzam gling 'di la ston par shog/de bzhin khyed cag tham cad

kyis de la dmod pa 'dor bar gyis// de bzhin 'gro la bstan par gyis// kun gyis smras pa// de bzhin rtag tu gyur par shog/ ma brjod pa yi bya ba gyis// khyod kyis sprad pas gangaskye ba// ma bu ngo ma bzang
'gyur// des na ngal 'dzug chu stod yin//pra nye la ni skyes pa'i mi// 'chiba'i tshon lha 'tshems dang/ khrums stod ces na bya ba yin// 'di la ma Tas pas brtag byas te// sa ri mon gru ma yin no// dmag

'gro rtsod pa'i gnas dag gi/ bya nga spu gri'i las mi bya// snar mar me bzhi byi bzhin ni// rgud byed dgra rnams khyod kyis gzhom// khyod kyi las ni che chung kum// gre ya tsho na bya 2ra gyis// chu nga dang na

dbo yang ni//phun sum tshogrwa pa byed par byed// sman rnams rten bya sbyin dang dul//gos dang rgyan gyi bya ba'ang brjod//mgo dang nag pa zhes bya dang// gro bzhin mchun bde bar byed// sa ga ba so u0f7cmon gre ste/
de dag lam 'jug sgrub pa yin// skag dang stabs zhes bya ba dang// tha skar dang ni mchu dang gre// grogs po mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// bsgrub tu mi rung las kyang gyis// 'di tshe khri
bzhon gos drang mal// mdza' bo rnams la'ang brtsam par bya// nyi ma'i bu namag dmar te// drang srong chen po der dpang btsugab// bcu gnyis khyim dus gnas de nas// der yod las mthun grib gom
drug/ der ni dus kyang mnyam pa yin// nyin dang mtshan yang mtshungs pa yin// de yod bla skar mtshan mo gang// lce mtshams nyin par gnas pa na// khyod kyis nga na spang bar gyis// mkha' la spyod cing

khyod kyis ston// gling bzhi pa ni mgu bya'i phyir// 'dir ni ji ltar lhags pa bzhin// ngas 'dir gang zhig yang dag brjod// lcaya drang srong kun dgar gyur// de bzhin khyongan kun tu song// smin drug de

bzhin me yi lha// bdag nyide gling bzhi der gnas shing// khyed kyis ma bzhin myur byu gyis// yud tsam sum cur tshal du song/ der gang ma yo zas 'byung ba// dam pa'i grogs dang longs spyod kyang// zla nya

khyod 'dzare yang legs rdzogs// de ltar nga yis thos pa yan// zhag bzhi bla mar nad pa na// myur ba kho nas thar par gyis// mngal du 'jug pa ma bzhi srungs// chu smon 'chi bar byed pa yin// skag rngun su

stod smad nab so dang// mon gre 'phel bar byed pa yin// khyod kyis bya ba 'di spongs shig/ dmag dang rtsod pa'i gnas 'gro dang// spu gri yi ni las rnam so// gro bzhin dang nagapa dang// ma go ni rgud par
byed pa yin// lag dang dbo ni 'dir 'dzoms byed// byed pa'i bya ba 'di'i gyis shig/ rma dang chung ba gang du yang// sbar mas phunasum tshogs par byed/ byi bzhin dang na dag par bcas//der ni bu nga

gang rtsi dang//gom pa sbyin pa gos dang mal// der ni rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// lag ni bde bar byed pa ste// mon gru dang ni sa ri yang// gabu ma pa dug na de dag an//lam du 'jug pa'i ng dedag yin// rgyal drang rtsu
mtshamA khrums stod na// las dag sgrub par byed pa yin// mchu snabs skag dang khrums smad dag/ de dang de rnams drag byed grogs// skal bzang bsam gtong ngang bzhon/ma 'a yang der de bya

ste khyim dang dus shes bya ba dang/ dag thor rnams bdag gis brjod pa na// de ltar bdag gis dus kun brjod// khyod ca drang srong lha mi dga'// bdagashes byed de ra shad pa bzhin lha dbang drang srong 'khor ngang

bcas// ma yasi thal sbyar 'daskad smras// 'byung po kun la phan pa khyod// 'gro ba la ni skyob pa khyod// de ltar shes mnyam ji bzhin khyod// sa nga smras nga Na bong can kyi drang srong ste// ra ma chu rogs kyang yin

chu yi lha mo khyod yin na// gsum pa yang ni 'gro bar gyis// byed pa chung ngang 'bring yin zhing// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga tham pa yi// 1 nga tsam du ni khyod kyis 'gro// dug dang sha ni zas pa mamo// khyong 'a spyod nga ra byed
yis// gang dag mi rnams skye 'gyur ba// de dag phyug cing chos dang mthun// nyag lnga nang nga myur du thos// de 'dir khyod kyis bstan par gyis// phyi nganomanan+tA mnga' du 'jug/ kaN ba sna bas 08
mchu bzhin te// rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod 'phal// dmag 'gro bag ma gtong ba ya// gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa dang// nyo tshong dang nibazo byed pa'o// de 'dra ba yo bya
ba sprod// sa ra mon gru de dag 'di'i// rgud byed dgra 'dir gzhom par bya// ma bzhu las kyi skar in// che chung thams cad 'dir gyis shog/ mgo dang nag pa kro bzhin te// de dag phun sum tshogs

par byed//rtsa byed na yang de dag bsten//der byin gos rgyan sna tshogs sgeg/ nab so dang nas ga dang// mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/de dag la ni lam du 'jug/smon na sgrung pa byed pa yin// skag ces bya dang khram sa

smad na// drag po'i las dag byed pa yani// chu stod chu skyang bla skar dang// bra nye khrums stod khrumu smad mdza'// dbos na skal ba bzang po sbyin// rtsod pa dang na bzhon pa dang// ma 'a dang khri ni bshams pa
tho yang 'dul bya ba de 'jug go/ yang smras pa/ 'gro ba bzhi dang ldan par ni// mgo la khyod ni gnas par 'gyur// mi ya 'as bya myur du sgrubs// ud tsam sum cu 'gro bar gyis// zhag brgyad nad pa myur/

du gsos// khyod rjes sha tshon zla ba'i lho// der ni skye dgu gang dag skye// dpa' zhing 'byor par gyur pa yin// khyab 'jug bden 'di shin tu srong// de byed ji bzhin nga yis bshad// gro bzhin bla skaramanga'

du 'jug/ mchu gnyis gra dbo 'chi bar byed// snonagyi tshe na bye ba 'phel// skag dang gzhan bcas thob par byed// lam rang ngartson dang gnas nas 'gro// bya ba de 'dra spang bar gyis// nang so chud par byed/
0 pa ste rnamon gre sa ga bzhin du shes// gsang ba'i gnas bzhin brtsam par gyis// brdzun g.yo ngamangs kyis 'joms par byed/ nag pa las kyi rgyu skar te/ 'ang la che chung thams cad rtsoms// lag ni

dunasum tshogs par byed// mon gyi sa ra gzhan blob byed// 'jir ni snyan dang sprin dul bzhon// rgyan dang gos kyang thob par byed/ rgyal dang rtswa mtshams khrims stong bde// de dag lam du nyan tu 'phrod/

stabs dang nam gru mchu sgrub byed// 'di la gtum po'i las kyang brtsams// mibazhin ngagwa zum dra re ngang// snar ma dbyer med chu gnyis bzhin// skal bzang bag ma gtong dbang no//ma la kum 'dir na byed

dachu/ ]lag lha drag mos de tshos+sas// tshes lnga la ni khyod gnas te// yud tsam bco lngas khyod 'gro byed// khyod kyi rjes na marags ra te// drag cing na bzad snangarung sgang// nad pa nga ni zhag bcu na// khyod la sprad pas/

mi gang skye// srid pa gsum du mi bzad 'gyur// nor tshol byed cing chom pos 'cha// khyod kyis sbyor ngas de yaMmatsho/ mon gru skabs la mngal du 'jug/ chu dang nam grus 'phel bar 'gyur//dbo yi tshe na

'chi bar byed/ rdurlagatis bra nye dza bzhinano// skye dang 'dzag dang 'phel ba yi// byed pa de ni spang bar gyis/ lta mtshams ngeng ni khrums stod der// byed pa bstan nas rgud par byed/ dag pa' sa kyi rgyu skar

yan/ byed pa chung ngus thams cad 'jug/ sa ga dar na mon gre dang// nang so phun sum tshogs par byed// khrums smad bar ni ngade byed yin// snon ngang skag ni 'a ma namanyam/ gre u0f00 sgrung ra ra byed
star richastod tha skar gsum pa yin// me bzhi'i bar gnyen grogs mchog ste// smin drug nag pa gro bzhin dang// phyi bzhin bag ma gtong dung bzhon// mal dang skal ba
bzang por sgrub// nyi ma'i lha mo nabasos smras// tshes drug la yang gnas par 'gyur// sprul sha khyod kyi zas su shog/ las kyang drag bor bya bar gyis// ud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'gro//'dir nand ba

zhag brgyad leni// khyod spyad su yang ma nang skyi// zhing pa longs spyod ldan par 'gyur// rta dang glang chen thad par 'gro// nab sos mngal du 'jug nga ra 'gyur// 'dir namon gre'i zas yin te// smin drug
la ni 'chi bar byed// khrums snyad rgud par byed pa yin// skag snon las kyi rgyu skar te// sa ga brtul zhugs brtan pa yi// rgyal yang phun sum tshogs par byed// lag dang lha 'tshams zhes bya dang//

khrums stod kyang nibade bar byed// mchu dang nam gru bzhin du ste// de dag lam du zhugs n bzang// bra nye chu smad gre dang dbo// sgrub byed nag pa gro bzhin dang// sa ri snar ma mgolo nag mi yi nang khyod

grog mchog 'gyur//rgyal 'da'i ltamo phur bu khyod// tshos bdun gnas khyod yud sum cu//'gro byed bu ram sbrang rtsi zas//chos ldan byed rlung myur du sgrub// nad kyang zhag lnga kho na ste// khyod spyod su yang ma snang

skya tshul dga' chos stsamadun 'don blo// ngaring bag gtong de dag 'dzage/ khram stong dang rtsa lnga 'tshamasal/ma la du 'jugs pa lang ste la'o dang rta bla ra rung/ rma sud la ni'aphel bar byed//lcaa nag
00/pa gro bzhin 'chi// gsum po de dag shes par gyis// mchu stabs nam gru de dag gsum// rgyud byed mkhas pas shes par gyis// lha 'tshams byed pa thams cad la//las dag gi ni rgyu skar te//mkhas pas she

pa kho nar gyiso// na ni phun sum tshogs par byed// khrums smid skag gis thob byeng ge// chu stod tha skar gsum pa bde// me bzhi sgrub smin drug dbyer med// de bzhin mkhas pas gsum shes gyis// sar grogs
dang grogs mchog ste//mgo dang lag dang mon gru bzhin//sa ga dang ni mon gre yang// don ni 'bras bus bcas pa yin//sprul gyi lha mo skag 'di s+sa tshes brgyad la ni khyod gnang kyis// yud tsam btso

lngas khyod 'gro byed// kod pa'i sha ni zas yin no// 'gro ba'i nang du gshin rje yaM// byed pa ma bzang khyod gnas kyi//nyin der khyod spyod su mare skyo// khro zhing sdig pa can du gyur// shade tu mi sdug tshul khrimI

nyams//chos gos gding ba zad gyur cing/ khram smad ces bya rab mchog la/mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed//ma bzhi smin drug 'a bar byed// mgo snabs gren ro myangs pas// rgud byed chu stod tha skar dang/ snon

ni las kyi sgyu skar yin// snabs dang nam gru amuzhes pa// gsum pa phun sum tshog par byed// bra nye bde byed gro dbo dang// gro bzhin chu gnyis khyod thos sgrub// nag pa snur ma chu gnyis dang/ mon gyi lha 'tshams sa

mig dang// lage dang nab so nge deg grogs// khrums stod kyang ni de bzhin no// gshin rje la dgas lha mo skyas// tshes dgu la ni khyod gnas shig/ yud tsami sum cur nyin mtshan du// la gyi sbyor blug zas yon
[p ]// no// sems can bya ba rlung 'phring sgrubs// zhig brgyad tham par nad pa gsos// gong ma'i bra nye su'i skye// bsod nams byed pa bshad pa yin// rdzun srog shin tu yun ranges spus///

snubs na las kyi rgyuskar yin// 'dir yang nam kus mjal du 'dzag/ sa ga la yang 'chibar byed// lag ces bya ba kho na dang// mon gro yang ni gesum pa yin// snaram dang ni neg ba dang// gsum po gro bzhin 'dir

go' byed// dbo dang bra nye chud byed yane/ chu smad phun sum tshogs par byed// tha skar dang na gri dang ni// cha gnyis 'phel bar byed pa yin// gsum po de dag shes par gyis// me bzhi dang ni bye bzhin

dang/ smin drug kyang ni bde bar byed// sa ra de la sgrub pa yin// mgo gnyis dang/ mon gru bcas/ de gsum rje'u grogs shes par gyis// smon rgyal lha 'tshams chu stong dang// nab so lhag par zla ba yin/

skal ldan lha mo gre yis smras// tshes bcu la nakhyod gnes shig/ thal ba mar gsar zas yin te// yud tsam sum cu khyod kyis 'gro// 'gro 'di'i bya ba chung ngu sgrubs// zhag bdun nad pa khyod spyad pas//

su zhagi ma skye dri dga' 'dod// gos drang rgyan kyang 'dod pa yin// bye brag phyed rnams su bsrung ba// tha skar la ni ma la 'jug 'gyur// nab sos 'tsha'ako zani ro myong// 'phel byed smin drug rgud par byed/
ba bzhi'ang mkhas pas ma na shes kyi//gre zhes bya dang bra nye dang// chu smad ces na bya ba gsum// phunasum tshogs byed shes par gyis// 'dirin sa gamon gre yang// sgrub yan lag la'ang bde ba ste/
snar ma nag pa gro bzhin nyid// mkhas pas grogs gnyis shes par gyis// rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ba ni// skag dang nas grwa rgyal dag dang// sgrubs dang smon zhes bya ba dang// khrims gnyis kar yin 'dir
yin no// lhag par yang ni de bzhin du// thams cad kyang ni bgrang bar gyis// mkhas pa blo gros ldan nga yis// rang gis thams cad shes par gyis// gre dbo nyame'i lha mos snyas// tshes ni bcu gcig

khyod gnas kyis// yud tsam bzhibatsa lnga yis// khyod ni rnam par grol bar gyis// mgo yas las na chung ngus kyang// sa bon thob cing bskyed bya skyed// zhaka cunganadapa zhi bar gyis// khyod kyang skye dgu
gang byung ba// blun zhing bsnyen gnas gnas pa dang// sbyin phral 'gro la sdang mi sdug/ dug gi bar 'gyur ba ste// de la mngal 'jug dra []shog/ nam gru mon gre 'phel bar byed// lag ces bya dang

sa ga dang// snonazhes bya ba gsum pa ste// de dag 'chi bar byed pa yin// khrums smad dang na la dang 'dare// rgud byed yin par shes par gyis// snar ma dang ni chu skad kyang// de las rgyu skar shes nga ra gyis// che

bzhi'ang phun sum tshogs byed yin// byi bzhin dang nasmin drug kyang// bde bar byed pa'i wa nasayin te// mon gru dang namago grub byed// nab so khrums stod lha 'tshams 'das// mkhas pa bzhin du'ang shes par
gyis grogs dang grogs mchog bla skar te// mchu dang nam gru skag dang bcas// snabs dang khrums stod ces bya ba// drug po de dag nam mkha' la// 2ma'i lha mo lcam chag par// ma las nga yis sem [' lk]
dgyis 3/ bcu gnyas khru myur rgyal byed mkha'// dpal las bya bar myur ma bzad// yud tsam sum cur 'gro bar gyis// sems can rnams la phan pa byin// e ma khyod zas lham chugashen//

zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos// der gnas skye dgu gang skye ba// dbang phyug gtso bor nor ldan yin// chom rkun rnams ni 'dul byed mchog/ spyan dang rul bar byed pa yin// mchog sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// ma chod sbyin/

byed par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub kyi nam na lag bdun/ go 'phang srung bar byed pas na// de yi grags ba mngal 'jug kyang// skag ces bya ba kho na yin// lha 'tshams 'chi bar byed pa ste// de a 'phel byed

zla nab so yin// khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang// las kyi sgyu skar dbyer med pa'o// sa ra tshon gru 'di'i rgud byed// 'dir na mgo yang gsum pa'i ng yin// phun tshogs byed 'di'i gro bzhinayani// sa ra smar

ma'ang gsum pa yin// mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/'dir ni sa ga lag gsum pa// smon dang rgyal yang sgrub pa ste// 'di ni khrums smad gsum pa'i ng yAn// grogs dang grogs mchog 'di dreg ste// chu stod mchu

rgyu dang tha skar dang// chu smad ces na du ba dang// gro dang bra nye 'chi bar byed// dga' byed lha mo nag pas smras// khyod mkha' myur song yud sum cul// mi bzad las byed myur gnas shag/ yan lag smras pa'i ng
khyod kyi bza'// zhag drug nad pa myur du gsos// khyod la gnas pas skye dgu skye// glu dang rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur// sbyin dga' 'dod spyod mkhas la sdug/ snar ma de yi mngal 'jug yani// tha
skar zhes na bye ba dang// mchu na 'chi bar byed ba ste// chu stodatses bya gsum pa'i ng yin// khrums smad 'phel bar byed pa ste// smonadang rgyalanagasum pa'i ng yin// de ya las kyi rgyu skar
nan+ti/ gro bzhin yin kyis bgrang bar gyis// 'dir ni mon ge rgud par byed// sa ga 'dir lag gsum pa'i ng yin// mgon phun sum tshogs byed 'di'i// sa ri mon gru gsum pa yin//
[]ra yang lha 'tshams bde bar byed// mgo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang// khrums stod ces na bye ba dang// skag kyang 'dirini sgrub pa yin// grogs dang grogru mchog stabs nam gru// 'dar drug
chu smad smin drug dang// bra nye dang ni dbo dang yang// sa bon bre dang sa ga ste// pha mas 'dir smras gling bzhi bar// mkha' la khyod song tshes bcu bzhir// khyod spyod 'gro ba'i gling bzhi
bar// lnga lud drag byos khyod song zhig/ me tog nas shan zas yin te// zhag ltar nad pa myur du gsos// khyod spang skye dgu su skye ba// rtsis pa 'byor reng khro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni
rgyu skar khro sdong g.yo// snar ma e bzhi rgud par byed// 'dir ni sminajug phyi bzhin dang// gsum pa dbo na phun tshogs byed// sa ga la nga ni nub so dang/ rtags ma nga khrums stod sgrub pa ya
'di'i bde nag pa mgo mon gru// rnam pa drug ni mdza' bo yin// namagru smon mdza' tha skar dang// mchu snubs de dag mchog tu mdza'// byi bzhin tshangs pa'i lha mos smras// chos drag rma ka' la khong
yud song// mi bzod bya ba 'byung bya phyir// mar gsarayang na khyod 'o zhig/ khyod la sems can su gnas pa// dpa' zhing sran grub 'byor rgyal gtso// yul 'khor grong
ba'joms dgra thul ba// jabo la de ni mngal du 'jug/ de la 'phel byed 'chab med// de yi rgyu skar kun grogs mchog/ gro bzhin khyab 'jug lha srong smra/ nga'i g.yas tshos bdun 'di'i khyod/
rgyu song// sum cu yud sha bu ram zos// 'phrod byed bya ba chung ngu sgrubs// khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba// mkhas par byed pa'i mchog yan te// grogs sbyong rnams kyi mchod pa yin// 'drar de
me bzhis mngal 'jug yin// rgyul zhes bya dang lha 'tshams dang// khrums stod la ni'aphel bar byed// mchu snabs gro bzhin 'chi bar byed// snar ma las kyi rgyu skar yin// sa ri son
gyi lag rgud byed// mon gru mgo zhes bya ba dang// nag pa phun sum tshogs par byed// khrums stod nab so sa ga bodi// nam gru nab so smon skag sgrub// nam gru grogs dang grogs mchog
ste// smin drug chu smad de dag yin// de gnyis gsum pa dpo yang yin// mon gru drang srong nor lha/ tshes brgyad yud tsam sum cur khyod// bzhir song las chur khyod lu 'byung// der ni/
nad btab lo gcig gsos// khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba// khro zhing rnyed gos dus kyang spangs// nang mas yongs bskor mchod sbyin srungs// 'dare nge' mngal ajug chag pa yin///
gre dang phra la 'chi bar byed// chu stong gsum par bgrang bar gyis// smon skug nam gru 'phel bar byed// sa ga nab so khrums stod rgyud// sa ri dang ni mon gre dang// lag na phun sum chag
par byed// las kun gnyan gyis shin tu bsrung// de yaM mngal 'jug skag yin no// chon gre zhes ni bya ba dang// lag ni 'chi bar byed pa ste// ma bzhi dang ni mon gre dang// snar ma 'apa la//
par byed pa yin// nam gru de las rgyu skar yin// bra nye dang na chu spyad drang// gre zhes kyang ni bya ba yang// gsum pa yin te rgud par byed/ mustod mchu dang tha skar ni// phun gu ma tshogs byed
nag pa dang/ dgon grwa mgo ni sgrub par byed// byi bzhan dbo na bde bar sgrogs// rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog yin// khrums stod khrums smadu nab so 'dir// rgyal zhes
bya ngang lha 'tshams dang/ sa ga 'dir ni smas pa yani// chu stod gzhi yi lha mos smras// tshos bzhi'i 'tshams khyong mkha' la song/ n+ya gro ta yi ze yan te// ung tsam sum cur 'gro
bar byed// gdab mo chu yaM las phyir yin// bad kan gyur nang chung bar 'gyur// khyod kyang skye dgur der su skye// chos gnas brtson thos longs spyod ldan// mkhas pa dag dang phrad pas//
bya ba kun la mkhas pa yin/ dpe'i skya'i rgyu skar 'dir mchu yaM// 'dir las rgyu skar bla skar yin// nag pa mgo dang mon gru 'phel/ sa ga khrums stod nab so ni// 'dir yang 'char
@#// byed pa yin// dbo ni 'dir yang rgud par byed// smin drug bya bzhin gsum pa'i ng yin// 'dir ni phun sum tshogs byed gro// bra nye chu smad gsum yang yin// khrims dang
sa ri mon gre sgrub// ma bzhi snar ma gro bzhin bde// grogs dang grog 'bring rnam drug ste// nam gru rgyal dang lha 'tshams skag/ snon dang 'dir ni khrums smad yin// chu skyid drang srong kun
lhas smras// tshos lngar bzhi bcu lta yud 'gro// khyod chung bsdu byar khyod zas mang// zhag bdun nad gsos skye ba bsrung// khyod kyang skye dgusu skye ba// bu ldan yin zhing nad kyang med// grogs
( mang rab tu 'byor pa ste// mngal du 'jug pa'i ng chu stod yin// mon gre dang ma lag dang ni// sa ra kho nas 'phel bar byed// khrums smang dang ni lha 'tshams dang// rgyal yang 'jar ni 'chi
byed yin// gshin rje'i lha mo las mgos sa// rgyal zhes bya dang lha 'tshams dang// khrums smad bde bar byed pa ste// tha skar mchu snabs sgrub pa yin// dbo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang//
rgyu chu smad smin drug grogs kyang byed// snar ma byi bzhin brtsis nas kyang// gsum pa me bzhi grogs mchog yin// mon gre bra nyo'i lha mo sna/ gling brazhu mkha' la khyod song zhig/ yud tsam
bco lngar zhe mer zo// zhag bdun nad gsos las kyang chung// 'dir khyod gnas pas skye dgu skye// khro bar byed pa sbyad pa na// chu bran la na srung bar gyis// mngal 'jug 'dir
nis ri yin// tha skar man bas 'phel bar byed// chu smad ces ni bya ba dang// smin drug 'chi bar byed pa ste// dbo yang gsum par shes par bya// khrums smad rgyal dar lha 'tsham
na rgud byed lag las rgyu skar yin// khrums stong nab so sa ga ste// de dgaphun sum tshogs par byed// snon skag nam gru bde bar byed// gre dang chu stod bra nye grub// gro bzhin mgo ba
ma bzhi dang// snar ma bya bzhin grogs mchog grogs// khrums stod drang srong gis smras khyod// las chung g.yo byed yung sum cur// bcu bzhi tshes gling 'du bzhir song// sha sran/
khyod la me tog rnams// der na sems can gang dag skyes// gya gyu g.yo chu blun zhing 'grub// ra degs srog gcod yudu sum cur// nad pa myur du thar byed yani// skye dgu de dag
ngamag rkun dang// rgyun sgra rtag srungs sa ga yang// 'dir mngal 'jug yin bra nye dang// chu stod gsum pa gre 'dir 'phol// snar ma bya bzhin shi sos byed// klams cad phyi phyir nab/
so lags// rgud byang nam gru snyon skag bzhin// phun tshogs khrums smad lha 'tshams rgyal// tha skur mchu sbyangs 'dir bde byed// smin drug chu bo gsum pa sgrub/ mon gru mgo dang
nag pa grogs// grogs mchog mon gru lags ri// khrums smad nyi ma'i lha mo khyod// bsukacig tshes la mkhaM' la song// udatsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar song// ri dgas sha gtor zhag
bdunar mas// khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba// glu dang gar mkhan nor 'bru mang// rab tu rig pa'i pha rol phyin// 'di'i na chos kyi sbyin pa byed// lha 'tshams 'phel
byed smin drug drang// chu smad 'chi bar byed pa ste// nag pa mgo dang gro bzhin dang// rgyal de'i las kyi rgyu skar yin// sgrubs dang spa skar mchu rgud byed// nam gru smon skag 'di'i phun tshogs//
me bzhi byi bzhin sgrub pa ste// bde bar byed pa chu stong gro// bra nye dang ni nag pa dang// sa ri mon gru lag yin no// ba so dang ni sa ga dang// mon gra gsum pa grogs mchog yin// drang
glu srong lha mo rgyal smras khyod// mi yi 'jam chung bya ba'i phyir// bcu bzhi'o tshes ud sum cur song// gtor ma du ram mun pa srung// zhugan nyi shur khyod spungs pa// skye dgu skye mdzangs
nor 'bru ldan// sbyor dang rab sbyor bya ba dang// dbyig rnams dpag tu med pa'i ng yin// de pa u0f7a mngal 'jug snon yon te// ma bzhi snar ma bya bzhin 'phel// sa ra monagru lag 'chi
sku byed las kyi rgyu skar 'dore skag yin// dubo dang chu smadu smin drug bde// gro bzhin nag pa snar ma sgrub// chu stod gri nye rgud byed// zla skar ma snabs phun tshogs byed// nang so sa
ga tshonagra grogs// rgyal dang lha 'tshams grogs mchog ste// khrums stod drang srong gis smras pa// dri za'i lha mo yud sum cu// tshes ni bcu bzhi khyedasong zhig/ myur bya'i gar ma
[re]/ zan dron sha// 'dare zhag nyi shu lnga nang yone// srog ldan 'bras dkar brgya yas sus// khyod spyad skye dgusu skya ba// sman sbyor byed pa sman pa yin// glu gar rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur/
'dir de'i mngal 'jug skabs yin no// nag pa mgo dang gro bzhin 'phel// rnab so mon gre lag 'chi byed// skye 'chi 'phel nyo tshong las 'gyed// 'thab mo 'dreg mkhan las rtag sbyongs//
smin drug gro dbo chu smad nyos// rgud byed 'diri ni dgra pham byed// khyod kyis las dag che chung byas// mchu dang gro 'di'i brtan phun tshogs// chu stod dang na bra nye dang/ gsum pa khrum
smad bde bar byed// mo bzhi sbyar ma bde bya phyir// gtsang ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin// log dang mon grus ri sgrub// drag po'i las rnams kun gyis ga/ rgyal dang lha 'tshams khrums stod/
grogs/ bya ba skal bzang 'dir chud za// skag snon grogs mchog bstan pa ste// khrums smad 'di'i yang gsum pa yin// skal ba bzang dang bzhon pa dang// mal dang kan tu brtan par
gyis drug bdun de dag las bzhin dang// sna tshogs mkhas pas shes nas su// sngon gyi bya ba bzhin du gyis// gshin rje'i lha tshes bcu bzhir song// zla nyi zla ba rangs pa'i tshe//
smin drug kyang ni 'gro bar gyis// lha dang ma dang drang srong rnams// byed pa gang gis sngar bstan bzhin// zhag na sum cu zla ba rengs// nyin dang mtshan ni mnyam pa ste// yud tsam btsolnga
[rr]@#// bco lnga yin// grib ma'i gom drug 'dir kun 'khor/ tha skar gyis namtshan mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdun na lha 'tshams te// lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor// bzhin gyi dekyil/
'khor mig dmar yin// a bu lha srong rab spro byas// khyod kyi zla ba 'di la ni// rtsa dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin dang// sdig pa la sogs srung bar gyis// cha dang char na dus bzhaka par// sdig
pa zhes bya khyod phan song// phyogs dang phyogs su las bzhag par// khyod ni yang dag phan par song// mi mthun 'thun dang 'phel 'di yin/ 'gro ba la ni len pa yin// rjes su mthun pa
sgra bdag gis su// dang por bsdu bar byas 'di yin// de nas drang srong rdzabong gis thams cad la la mo rab tu sbyar te// 'khor la go bar byed ce sa pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis go rims kyi
dang po dang/ mtshan mo dang/ nyin mo dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ rgyu skar dang gza' dang/ dus dang/ khyim dang/ gnas dang/ 'gro bar byed pa dang/ 'khor ba dang/
sgyu 'gro ba dang/ mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ rnam par shes pa de bzhin du da ltar yang bstan tshade rnam par gzhag na/ tsa kyang cag 'di ltar rnam par gzhag pa dang/ gdags bas rgyu
skar dang// gza 'a yongs su mgu ba la rjes su yi rang bar byed dam/ 'on te ma yin/ de nas de nyid kyi tsho lha ma yin dang/ mi dang/ drang srong dang/ lha dang/ lag 'gro dang/ mi 'am
ca' tshogs thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye khyod ni rtse thams cad kyi bla ma/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na gtso bo mtshungs pa med/

bar ma khas la mngon par rtogs pa'i snying brtse bas bskal pa pha rol dran pa'o//sems can thams cad la banapar 'dod pa'o//dpal thams cad phun sum tshog pa'o//yon tanaThamA cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//dus
gsum thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang/ nyin mo drang/ skad cig dang/ rgyuskar dang/ gza'i dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyud 'dogs par byed
pa 'phel shes de lta bu su la yod pa' sems can de lta bu su yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na med pa yin no// 'di ltar khyod kyis da ltar btags pa bzhin du/ bdag
cag thams cad kyis der dad pa byin pa yin no// rjes su yang yi rang ngo// legs ldan legs so// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rgyu skar dang/ gza' dang/ khyim dang/
dus kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zla ba gnyis pa la yang gdags par gyis shig/ drang srong rnga bong g.yis rab tu smras pa/ bdag gis rgyu skar smin drug brjod// zla ba nya tshe zla rangs
'gyur// ston zla tha chung zhes bya ba// 'di ni rab tu brjod pa yin// mtshan mo yang ni yud tsam cig/ yongs su bskor te slar ldog byed// branye dang ni smin drug kyang// lan gnyis
yongs su 'khor bar byed// de nas rgyu skar thams cad kyang// phyir zhing 'jug par byed pa ste// snar ma gcig pu'ang zla dor byed// tshes gtsage la nu mkha' la 'gro/
ji ltar sdar bya bshad pa bzhin// de bzhin khyod kyis skye dgu srungs// de tsam mgo tshos gnyis la 'gro// de tsam lag tshes gsum la 'gro// tshes bzhi la yang nab so ste// rgyal yang
tshes na lnga la 'gro// tshes drug la ni skag ga tshags// mchu yang tshes na bdun la sbyang// tshes brgyad la yang the yin te// tshes dgu la na dbo 'aglo byed// mi bzhi tshos ni bcu la 'dzug
nan pa'i ng tshes bcu gamag la 'gro// sa 'ang tshes bcu gnyis la gnas// tshes bcu gsum la sogs ga ste// tshes bcu bzhi la lha 'tshams yin// tshes bco lnga la de bzhin snon/
'di ni zla ba phyed du bshad// yar gyi ngo la snabs grub ste// tshes gcig la na skye dgu srung// sa gnyis la na chu stod yin// tshes gsum la ni chu snyad yin// tshes bzhi la ni phyi
bzhin srung// tshes lnga lanagro bzhin yon// tshes drug la na mon grwa tshigs// chos bdun la ni lha yan// tshos brgyad la ni khrums stod yin// tshes dgu la ni khrums smad 'gro//
tshes bcu lan nam gru srung// de bzhin bcu gcig tshes tha skar// gshani rje'i lha mo tshos bcu gnyis// tshes bcu gsum la tshe lha mo/ tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snar ma yin// zla ba rad
la mgo bshad do// dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba 'dir// lha yi bla ma'i phur bu ste// 'di ni lhan cig byed par gzung// de bas gza' zhes bya bar bshad// de'i phyir nyin mo tshes bcu bzhir//
yud tsam mtshan mo bcu drug ste// smin drug gis nAmtshan mo 'thob// snabs kyang nyi ma'i mdunan skyo// grib tshod gom pa brgyad yin zhing// nyam yongs su 'khor bar byed// lho phyogs
nyi ma kha ltas 'khor/ de bzhin dgun zla ra ba pa// zla 'dir khyim gzhi shes par bya// mar gyi yi tshes gcig la// lagan sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes gnyis la nanab so ste//
sa gsum rgyal du shes par gyis// 'dire tshes bzhi la'ang skag yin te/// mchu yang tshes na lnga la 'gro// tshes drug la ni gre yon te// chos bdun la nadabo yin bshad//
tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin// tshes dgu lan nag pa gnas// tshes bcu la nas ra 'gro// tshes bcukacig la sa ga 'gro// tshes bcu gnyis la'ang lha 'tshams te/ tshes
btsu gsum la'ang smonayin no// tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snabs yin te/ dwatshes bco lnga la'ang chu stod bshad// yar gyi ngo ya tshis gcig la// chu skyid kyang ni rung ba yin// tshes/
gnyis ji bzhin gro bzhin te// tshes gsum lan min grwa 'gro// tshes bzhi mon gre 'gror rung ste// chos lnga la ni khrums stod yin// chos drug la yang khrums smad yin// tshes
bdun la ninam gru 'gro// tshos brgyad la ni bA skar rung// tshes dgu gshAne rje lha mo yin// tshes bcu smin drug 'gro rung ste// tshes bcu gcig la'ang snar ma yin//
tshes bcu gnyis la 'ang mgo yin te// tshes bcu gsum la lag kyang 'gro/ tshes bcu bzhi la nab so ste// zla ba nya la rgyal yang yin// zla ba nya ba 'di la yang// 'dir ni rang bzhin
brjod par bya// lho yi phyogs su phyin nas kyang// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// nyin par bcu gsum shes par gyis// mtshan mo'ang bcu bdun 'gro bar byed/ mtshan mo
yang na mgor bshes gyis// nyi ma'i mdun du'ang gro bzhin te// grib tshod gom pa b.ru tham pa// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// 'jig rtan mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang//
'dire na sbyin pa'i zhing bstan pa// 'di la mgo yin shes par gyis/ zla ba gsum pa rnams bzhag nas// zla ba mar gyi tshes gcig la// skagan sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes
zla gnyis la ni mchur shes gyis// tshes gsum la ni khri yin no// tshes bzhi la nadeb 'gro ste// tshes lnga la name bzhu 'gro// tshes drug la ni nag pa sgrub// chos bdunul ni sa la 'go/
tshos brgyad la yang sa ga ste// tshes dgu la ni lha mtshams yin// tshes bcu la ya nga snona'agro ste// tshes bcu gcig la skyabs 'jug byed// chos bcu gnyis la chu stod yin// tshos
bcu gsum la chu smad yin// tshes bcu bzhi la phyi bzhin tu// tshes bco lnga la gro bzhin 'gro// zla ba yar gyi chos gcig la// mon gru sgrub par byed pa yin/ chos gnyis la nA bon
grwa lta tshes gsum la na khrums stod yin// tshes bzhi lan khrums smad yin// tshos lta la na nam gru 'gro// tshes drug lan bla skar tshogs// tshes bdunagashin rje'i lha mo yin//
de bzhin tshes brgyad smin drug ste// tshes dgu la ni snar ma 'gro// tshes bcu la yang mgo yon te// lag nitshes bcu gcig la 'gro// tshes bcu gnyis la'anganab so ste// tshes bcu
gsum la rgyal yang yin// chos bcu bzhi la'ang skag yin te// mchu ni zla ba rab rdzogs byed// dgun zla tha chung rang bzhin yang// mthar gyis kyang n brjod par bya// lho yi phyogs su phyin
nas kyang// nyim yongs su 'khror bar byed// mtshan mo bco brgyad shes par gyis// nyin par yang na bcu gnyis yin// rgyal yang mtshan mo 'thob par byed// nyi ma'i mdun na
mon gre yan// grib tshod kyang na sor bcu bdun// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// spren pa lha yi bla ma dag/ zhing der rab tubarjod pa yin// 'dir khyim bum ba mnyam pa med
dpyid zla ra ba mar gyi ngor// gre na sgrub par byed pa yin// tshes gnyis la ni de bo yin te// tshes gsum la ni mi bzhi ste// tshes bzhi'i bar du rtag pa yin// tshes lnga la nas ra
ste chos drug la nas ka yin// tshes bdun la na lha 'tshams te// chos brgyad la na snyen yin no// tshes dgu la ni snubs yin te/ tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin//
tshes bcu gcig la chu smad yin// tshes bcu gnyis la bya bzhin te// chos bcu gsum la gro bzhin yin// tshes bcu ngazhi la mon gri ste// tshes bco lnga la mon gre yan// de ni
zla ba khyad yin no// zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la// khrums stod ces na bya ba yani/ chos gatros la na khram sa smad yin// tshes gsum la ninam gru ste// tshes bzhi la na tha
skar yin// tshos lnga la na bra nye yin// tshes drug la ni smin drug ste// chos bdun la ni snar ma yin// tshos brgyang 'a ni nag yin te// tshes dgu la na 'a ga yin no// chos bcu
la nanab so ste// tshes bcu gcig la rgyal yin no// chos bcu gnyis la skag yin te/ tshes bcu gsum la mchu yin no// chos b.ru bzhu la gre yAn te// zla rangs tshes btso
zla lnga la dbo// 'dir na dpyid zla ra ba yi// rang bzhan yang na brjod par bya// byang phyogs su kha bltas te// nyi ma yodas su 'khor bar byed/ nyin nga ra bcu gsum shes par
gyis/ rnamtshan mo bcu bdunu'agro bar byed// mchus kyang mtshan mo thob par byed// nyin bar khrums stod 'gro bar byed// grib tshod sor ni bcu gnyis su// nyi ma yongs su
'khor par byed// zhing der lha a bla ma yang// rnam par gnas pa kho nar ni// bshad pa yin te 'dir yang// de ni mtshan mo 'byung ba yin// dpyid zla 'dang po'i zla ba ngo'i// dung/
por tshes gcig ma bzhi ste// tshes gnyis la na nag pa yin// tshes gsum la nas ri yin// chos bzhu la na sa ga ste// tshos lta la nu lha 'tshams yin// tshes drug la nA
smon yin te// chos bdun la na snabs yin no// tshes brgyad la ni chu stod yin// tshes dgu la nu chu smad yin// tshes bcu la ni phyi bzhinato// tshos bcu gcig la gro bzhin yin//
tshes btsu gnas la mon gru ste// chos bcu gsum la mon gre yin// tshes bcu bzhi la khrums stod yin// tshos btsolnga la khrums smad yin// de ni zla ba khyad yin te// zla ba yar
kyi tshes gcig la// nam gru tshos gnyis bla skar te// tshes gsum la ni bra nye yan// tshes bzhi la ni smin drug ste// tshes lnga la ni snar ma yin// tshes drug la na mgo yin te//
tshos bdun la ni lag yin no// tshos brgyad la ni nab so ste// tshes dgu la ni rgyal yin no// tshes bcu la ni skag yan te/ dwatshes bcu gcig la mchu yin no// tshes bcu gnyis/
la gro yin te// chos b.ru gsum la dbo yin no// tshes bcu bzhi la mi bzhi ste// tshes bco lnga la nag pa yin// dpyid zla 'bring po kho na ma// rang bzhin yang na brjod
par bya/ byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// na ra yongs su 'khor bar byed// 'dir ni phyis kyang yud tsam dag/ yongs su 'khor bar shes par byed// yud
la tsam yang na re re zhig/ nyan par drag la 'jug par byed// nyan par bcu bzhi shes par gyis// mtshan mo'ang bcu drug shes par gyis// gre dngos mtshan mo thob par byed//
nyi ma'i mdun na tha skar yin// grub chod sor brgyad nyi ma 'khor// sgrima'i bu ni mig dmar te// gza' rno shan tu mi bzadu yin/ khyim lug lan yang dag gnas// dpyad zla

brjod par bya// lho yi phyogs su kha ltas te// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// nyin par b.ru drag 'gro byed cing// mtshan mo yang na banubazhi pen// khrums stod kyis ni mtshan mo
