khyim srang zhes bya ba bzhug/ zla ba bcu gnyis bshadra bain// yongs su 'khor ba de yas na// 'khon de ltar 'gro bar byed// mig stong yang dang yang du ni// 'dus te chos kya phyogs
la ltos// khyod na shes rab gzhan na// chos ma yin pa'i ng zlog par gyis// chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// thos phyug mkhas pa bsam gtan pa// de dag khyod kyis
chos gos dang// bza' btung rnams kyi rjes su bsrungs// yang dag gnas te brgyabun gyis// rdzabong la na thilaphyur nas// rab tus pa bdag cag gi/ bya ba yang ni bsgo bar
0 @#/ gyis smras pa/ lha ya bla ma khyod kyis su// rtag par tshangs bar spyod pa spungs// rig sngags sman dang gsang sngags rnams// thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs//
ba las kun drang srong zla ba dang// zla ba chung dang zhu/ dang bzhi// bzo yi las kyi mtha' kun la// gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin// drag po dug gi sna can dang// dgon pa dang nilci ba ste/
gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni// mchod sbyin rib mar gtso bor bkod// rgya mtsho tshulha 'jog pa dang// me chen skyong dang ring du 'gro// sa yad tshes dang zla srung dang// gnas smrar byed ba
rgya mtsho ni// gtso bor ba zhig ste ma dros dang// khab kyae lus 'thigs chu lhas byin// ri dwags 'khrug pa'i ng klung de bzhin// klung rnams kyi na gtso bor bkod// khyod ni dge ba
rab bskyed pa// ne tse ya ne khyab byed pa// mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste// de 'dra ba na ji lta bur// khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang// ma ya rtse mo'i gar+ya bo ste// khyod ni rlung dmar
rgyu'agul g.yo ba// rlung na yang pa' gtso bo yin// rdo rje'i mge dang sang go'i mig/ legs mthong lag namadung gsum thogs// lha mo bzhi po de dag ni// grong khyer gtso bor bkod
pa yin// gong ma'i tshigs skyes rtsis mu khyud// 'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin bzhi// de dag rin chen brtag pa la// nyo tshong byed pa'i gtso bor bkod// phyogs mtshams su ni
bzhi yin te// srung ba'i phyir nayeng dag gnas// yul 'kho grong khyer tham du// srung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod// drang srong dag na thams cad dang// lha yi tshogs dang klu rnamA
dang// lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi// bar yang rjes su ya rang byed// lus brtan rab tu rgyal ba mchog/ sgrub pa yi ni gtso bo ste// khyod ni skye dang 'gag pa dang/ zas dang ro drang me ga
mchog khyo ni dra 'phel byed pa ste/ shu dug rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyod ni lam bde spyad ba ste/ rnam par 'tsho las rgyal ba'i gtso// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis//
ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod// nor rgyas phu dung thang shang zhung// lce mchog mig dmar dramugs byed skyom// khyod ni dbyangs can glu yi gtso// khyod ni grub dang yod 'phrog pa// zla ba/
phog par byed pa ga/ bcud kyis len gyi gtso bo yin// gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin// khyim rnams thams cad rnam par bzhag/ rgyal po chen pa bzhi yang// skal ldan rgyu ni
rnam par bzhag/ lus nganaganod sbyin rnams kyi gtso// grul bum rnams kyi'aphags skyes po/ klu rnams kyi no sngon mi bzang// dA ze rnams kyi yul 'khor srung// thams cad kyi
glang chen po bzhi// gling gzhan brgyad khri thams cad du// drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongs su skyong ba mo bkod par btang ba'i genas ci yang med do// der lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod
sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci deng/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang ma ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byas par
gyur te// drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjes su yi rangs par gyur te// bya ba de ni mchod pa dang/ rim gror bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to// de'i rjes su shin tu yun
rang zhig na/ drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste/ des kyang skar ma'i depyad rab tu byas so// zhug gas ma thub pa dang/ shol yod par yang bshad do// yang de'i tshe drang srong
grub pa'i gnas rten ga la ba der klu thams cad 'dus te// de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa smyos te/ de la mchod pa'i las bya
ba'i phyir ci nus su brtso na par gyur to/// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po thag pa chen po' mdo las/ ltama'i sdong po'i le'u bcu gcige ba las/ rgyu
skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par bzhag pa'i le'u rdzogs so/// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde/ 7ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/bam po bcugacig pa/
rgya mtshos smras pa/ nam mkhu' la ni rgyuskar tshogs// ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni// khyod kyis sngon tshe tshe rabs dran// mkhas khyod sride gsum kun gyi gtso// khyod kyi snying rje byams
pa dpar// shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin/ kun ngang la 'di nas khyod kyis ni// lag 'gro thams cad thar par gyis// srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod/ de la 'gro
bde kun tshim byed khyod// khyod ni drang srong kun gyi bla// mo rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os// 'gro ba'i kun dpal khyod la ni// lha dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs// rten gyis rnamA
thams cad pa// lag 'gro myur du thar par gyis// de nas drang srong skarim la dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu yid dang ba bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs
cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshogi snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces skyas so// yon tan de 'dra bdag la med// drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin// khyed cag 'di nas grwar byed par/
bdag gis nus pa ma yin no// gang gis bskal pa du mar nA/ deka' thub dka' ba bzod pa spyad// khyed cag thor par byed pa yaM/ drang srong gzhan de lta bar gyis// ga
brtson zhing sbyin pa byin// mkhas shing glang chen ltadang ni// shing rta bu dang chung ma dang// nor gyis sems can ban pa byas// rkang lag mgo dang rna ba dang// mag dar lag
pa khrag dang ni// bu bran bran mo bza' btung mang// mal cha kha zas sngon chad btang// snying rdzad ng ni byams pa yis// khyed cag thar byed srid gsum na// mtshungs med bsam
gtan ngaga' byang ba// de ni drang srong rdzabong ste// kun tu brtse zhes byang chub sems// sngon chad ra deshas pha rol phyin// sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyis//
a nyam na thar pa ra byas// de na sangur ses 4 tshe du yang/ ts+tse gyi tshe rabs re bska lA par// dma' ra ba 'gro bzod des dgas// de na 'jig rtan saMngs rgyas byung
sems can sdug bsngal nyam thag kun// sdug bsngal thar mdzadu rdza bong yin// sems can smin byed brtson 'grus dang// snying rdzabartan pas de srid 'khor/ rnga bong de ni
skyes pa na// rgyal sras du ram shing pa yi// rdzogs ba zas gtsang ga ni sras// des ni btsas ma thag tu khung// sring ga ga ma bde 'byung 'dzag chen dpal// yid bad rnam pa sna tshogs
dang/ []lha dang klu yaM sa rnams dang// 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab// der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags// de yi sa gom pa bdun bor te// ra dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi//
rgyu sa na thams cad 'khrugs par gyur// 'gro ba rgand snag bsngal dang// 2cha shas gzar las ngas dgrol zhing// zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med// skam la dgod ces shAka
ga ngas// me tog dro dang rin chen dag/ lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis// sras nga la ni bstod rgyur// bskal pa mang po du marayang//
sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang// sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la bstan// sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod// 'di las skye ba 'di dang nA/ thams cad kyi ni bla ma lags/
sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par// ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya// nges kyang dpa' bo bstanopar gyur// mtshungs pa med do bud mang tshogs// drug khri tham pa sngas nas su/
spyod pa rab brtan le drug spyad// g.yo sgyu can ni sdor bcas pa'i// bdud na gcig pus bcom nas kyang// byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes// mya ngan med la don dam gzigs//
byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis// semaMs catsakun dang mi mnyam zhing// 'byung po drag na thams cad la// de na byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa// sems can gang la'ang 'gro ma 'tsham///
sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las// thar par mdzad cing de yang ni// rnam bcanges btsonar thar mdzad pa// ma ga d+ha na de gnas shing// 'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston//
de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob// byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos// drang srong mchog gi thad du dang// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las// khyed cag yongs su thar par byed// rang nyid kyang
ni 'drong bar gyis// dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis// phyin chad mkha' lding thams cad las// 'jigs pa khyod la mi 'byung ngo// rtag bde sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis//btson ra 'di'i

dang ma dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ chos thams cad kyi
dbang ga pa rol tu phyin pa/ sems can thams cad kyisdug balngal sel bar mdzad pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa/ ngaga' ba thams cad skyed par mdzad pa/ shes rab thams cad kyi pa/
rol tu phyin pa/ rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa thugs rje thams cad kyis khyab pa/ 'phrin las thams cad sgrubs par mdzad pa/ lam thams cad ston pa/ yang dag pa'i mag gsung ba/
lha dang klu rnams kyi mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa mchod pa thams cadra 'os pa bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal zhing btson ra 'dar 'phangs 'a gas na/
'di nas bdag ca/ thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu de dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de gnas de nas 'gro

bar ni ma nus so// de dag tham cad kyis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la smras pa/ de bzhinagshegs pa de ni bden te/ sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam bar ma 'tsho ba'i chos nyid[]kan//de la bdag

cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so// 'di nas myur dubazhud cige/ bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar par mdzod cig/ skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshen pa drang srod sems can thams/

cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa thams dmkhyen pa thub pa des/ byang chub sems ba 'a sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldeg par bya ba'i phyir dang/ byang

chub kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang/ rgyudang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir/ dang bor ma byung ba la dmig
bdang/ nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog bstan to// yang byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams la sgyu las yang dag par byung pa dang/

so sor brtags pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to// da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ses rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyeng na/ theg pa bla na med

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir dang/ bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i phyi re dang/

dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ chos kyi khrus mdzad do// da lta shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa kun nas ldang ba med pa/
[r ]@#// rgyu ba med pa/ kazhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/ rnam par bzhag pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ unang med pa/ snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med

ba gsal byed med pa/ spyod ba med Na bla ma dad pa 3de ces bya ba na// phung po ra/ khams dang/ sku mched dang/ 'byung po chen po thams cad dang/ mag ga rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i srid pa zhes bya
ba'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon ba med pa dang/ mngon par 'du byed ra lung pa dang/ 'jug pa med pa' chegs kyi dbyings dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ 'gagar

rgyu na nga pa dang/ de bzhin nyid 'dres pa dang pa dang/ gang 'jug nga med pa'i chos kyi dbyis don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba phyed pa'i yeshes kyi spyod pa
dar ldan pa/ yang dag pa la dmigs pa'i de bzhin gsheg pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drugagi sbyong pa dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas ba/ sems nam mkha' dang

lta tam zhing mtshungs pa/ ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyinge thob pa// lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmags pa med pa ston to//

kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas stan pa 'di bshad pa na ang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang/ klu'i rgyal po yus 'bags ba'i khab ces bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po zla ba la gtsub pa zhes bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal

bo rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes bu dran pas/ de dug snang ba dang/ rnam par bsgying ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob bar/

gyur to// de'i tshe ka gzhan brgyad cu rtsa bzhin/ byang chub kyi sbyong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags ba'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pa/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin klob
bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// khyod bzhud la snying rje chen po thob pa gangags/ 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs
thar pa bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thob pa de la/ bdag cag gi choge gsol ba thob cig/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skaram la
dga' bo drang srong gi che byad kyis/ 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po ro li'u bcu gcig pa las brgyad do//
bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabs su nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thob te/ shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la/ rgyu shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus
rdul nas lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// lag 'gro skyabs ni skyabs su dong// skye dgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing// 'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa// mi bzad g.yo sgyu can la
ka @#// ltos de'i tshe bdud kyi bu mo mun bral ma zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis// dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchi// gang dag de pa tshig thos shing//

de mthong ba lta smos ci 'a tshal// brtson pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yin// khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs// bka' ma chade sna tshogs lhan cig mdzad// de yi spyi ni ma bslabs sam// bdud kyis slar sa ba//
dge sbyong go'u tam brtan pa yin// rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste// stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs// brgal nas skye dgu sgrol bar byed// mun bral mas smras pa/ stong pa lan gang zhugs pa/bdud

sgyu rnams phye bas mi bskyod de// byang grol bde ba sbyin bgyid pa// de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi// de bzhin nyid la gang brten cing// ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin//de la bdag ni skyaglu

su ma mi// sgyu de bdag gis bslab par bgyi// sems can thams cad rnam par grol// chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ bdud kyi bu mo lnga stod bdud kyi gnas der ba 'or

rgyunas/ byang chub tu smon lamabatab par gyur te/ bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dpang ste rmongs nas/ stobs kyishugs kyi 'chag sar zhugs te/bdud kyi stobs kyi shugs kyitsho 'phrul gyis byin gyi rlabs pa de

lta bu byin gyis brlabs so// gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring po ma lon par/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas/ nam mkha' las rdo'i char pa me rab tu
'bar ba'i cher mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te/ klu thams cad thal bar rlag par 'dong nabatsem ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogrwa rab tu bab ste/ klu thams cad rab tu

dga' bar gyur to// dga' khyab mas smras pa/ kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyed ltos shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling der dge sbyong go'u ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dir sdug bsngal mang pos

gnod pa byed na/ gang dag 'dir 'khor nas/ dge sbyong go'u tam la skyabs su dor ba/ rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas skyabs su se nas can su

'gro ba// bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te// tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang// de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro// ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing// byang chub smon lam brtan

bo bskyed pas na// de ni bdud rnams du mas gsad ma nus// nam nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// de yi bslab pa'i gzhi ni gtsag blangs shing// tshig gi don tsag tsam yang nyan byed na// byang chub phyir
nasems kyang bskyod ba de// sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nam nur med// yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis// der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs// sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ma khyod la

bsngos// der ni cayang nus par ma gyur to// gang gis sems can de dag sdug zad cing// bdag cag gi na las kyi sgrib 'byang ba// chungadu lung bstan pa na de nyanaba'i// rig pa gcig kyang der na ston bas
gsungs// bdud sdogecan shas cher 'khrugs shing gshi ste/ sdug bsngal zhing yid ma bde bskyes nas/ mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pur 'dug go/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'/
sa sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi gle bar mjug klogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go/ bam
ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yod la 'gyid pa'i gzungs sngagru bshad par gsol/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis sngonabadag cag gnyape bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na/ lus kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal

! gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas dgum pa la thug ste/ btson rar stsal nas/ zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhunge/ bcang ba lngas bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa man+da ra ba'i bsung la yade la gzhan ma sems par gsol
ba btab pa lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man+da ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shul kar bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa

de lta bu s/ bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yong la bgyid pa'i gezungs sngags bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus btson ra der bdag cag gi rnalaMm du don dang bcas/ tshig 'bru dang bcas par grags so// gsang sngag

ya de la bgyid pa de dag gse bdag cag dga' ba dang dad pa yang dag par basbyang nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang/ skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang//

lan grangs gzhan la myor bar 'gyur ba thams cad dung 1 las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ sems can gyi sgrib pa dang/ sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba

nas/ shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang/ nye bar spyod pa dang/ longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang/ cho' 'du byed bas pa'i sgrib pa dang/ bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing/

yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i sgrib pa yodasu bas shing/ der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyi mod la/ mgrin pa 'ching ba lta las grol to/ btson ra

nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cing/ de nas nam mkha' las chas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man+da ra ba'i gsung gi thad du nye bar phyin to// de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rabo'i

'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin gyi mdog gi thad du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas/ san chad bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams lu bdag/

cag maskyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de bzhin du da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad/ sems can m dang mi gas pa dbag tumamachis pa sa
khyab// de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshog sakyi zani do zhes bgyi ba nas/sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su las yongs su ma dag ba dag gis bsgribs te mchi bar ma nus pa'i gas so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o// sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu sems/

ny+tsacan rnams kyi ma da ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ sems can gyi

sgrib pa dang/ sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ngo nas/ shes rab kyi spong nga zhes bgyi ba'i ber dang/ zhebar spyod pa dang/ longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i 'os kyi lan gyi sgrib ba mchis pa'i bar tham

mi cad dang/ thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis nga thams cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang/chos bstan pa des sems can rnamA
bzod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang/ ji srid 'tsho ba'amatha' bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas/sems can rnams ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/bsams bzhin du
! sud par skye ba len par rdzothogs par 'gyur ba dang/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang// rtag par rgyun du brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang/ log par mi

ltung ba 'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson ba dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos bo bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang chos nyan ba dang/ dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang bas na/
gtan gyis rnam par ro' pa dang// mngon par shes pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa 'a ma ngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad du bla na med nga'i yongs su mya ngana' sa 'das pa'i/
bar du chos de dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das da sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi nga rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzu=
sngags de legs par bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang khongaskyabo mang po la phan nga 'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes grubanas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//dge song ngas/gso pa ma la khrigs spyi kham/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can su la la the ga nga gsum las/ theg ba gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho la sa rgal bar 'dod pa de na myur du theg pa
de yongs su rdzogs nga ra bya bar 'dod pa yin la/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi gnas ngan len thamA
cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa yin/bstan ba srung bar 'dod pa yin/snyan pa 'dod pa dang/ red pa 'dod pa dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang/ dbang phyug 'dod pa dang/ gzugs ]
'dod pa dang/ stobs 'dod pa dang/ 'khor 'dod pa dang/ nor dang/ 'bru 'ded pa dang/ thu bo 'dod pa dang/ mi dngam 'ani nga thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod nga yin/rtag tu
lus 'dod pa yini/rtag tu lus dang/ gdang/ yid kyis kun tu gnon par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon dag

shes ba dang/ tshadas pa'i gnas pa dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ba sgrub par 'dod nga yin no// de ltar yang 'os kyi snying pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phongs pa rnam pa sna

tshogs kyis zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ra 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsams bzhin du srid bar srad pa blangs ba de'ibar gyis/ myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs nga lta bu

de dag bsgrub par mi nus te/ las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing/ kha zas gtsang ma dang/ ma 'a gtsang ma de skyil mo krung ngam 'chag

pas kyang rung ste/ rjes su 'thun pa'i tshig brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs yid la byed pas/gzhan yid la mi sems pa zhes du ba nas/ las gzhan ma byed cing sems rnam nga ragayangs pa na ya na nga 'i

bar gyis re zhig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba nas/mtshan bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na/des rang gi sku byad du sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs chung

0 dur rtog par byed na chung dur kho nar mthong ngo/ la ngan tshad med par rtog par byed na/ga zugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo//des mtshan thog thag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma thong ngo//mtshan

gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba mthong ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la sa de kyis rjes su bltas nas gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do// tad+ya thA/ badzram b+ha/ badzram b+ha ud pa da bya ya/bidzin b+ha/ a nu

na ta b+hA tA/ b+hu tiko ki ba dzram b+ha pAhA/ji srid du des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par sprul nas/de nas byung ste rang gi mgo'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par mi g.yeng pa'i yod

kyis rjes su bltas nas/tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya/ma de ngang bar bya'o// rang gi lus la mer blta bar bya ste/ji ltar zhen/ dos kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang/ nying lag thamA

cad du 'grob mgrong nas/rang gi lus thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/ thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes

bya ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs thams cad du de la gzugs gdang gang ni 'byung ba 'di ni di'i thams cad sgrub pa yin no// rige/ sa kyi bu su la la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu bzhi pa rab kyi mthA'a gnas yid la

byed pa 'i gzungs sngags shin tu bsgoms shing/ mchod sbyin legs par byas la/shin tu yide la bus na/ de'i las kyi sgring pa thams cad dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib ba dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa zhes rtsa bas/ ma
[f ]// lus pa'i bar du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang/ dam pa'i chos spangs ba rnams dang/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnan sa nin gtogs so// de
'dod na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung thums cad dang/ phyi rol pa'i bstan ces thums cad dang/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang/ gzhan yang gang dag snyan dngags su byas pa'i/

sh+tsa rnams des the tshom med pa ra shin tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nyin mtshan gcig gas bsam gtan bzhi dang/ gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa
bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i ston par 'jug pa bzhi sgom par 'dod na/ des shin tu bsgoms pa yin no// de 'dod na skad cig gcige gas nges mas can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi

'pho dang/ skye ba dang/ sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shis nga ra 'gyur ro// de 'dod n skad cig gcig gis nan mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam/sangs rgyas kyi sku 'am/brgya byin gyi bar ram/ tshangs pa'ibar
rgyu ram/ sred med kyi bu'i bar ram/dbang phyug chen po'i bar ram/ rgyal chen bzhi'i bar ram/'khor lo sgyur ba'i bar ram/ chu'i bar ran/ de'i bar ran/ sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed do// de 'dod
na skad cig gcig gsanam mkha' thams cad me tog gi bar dang/ rin po che'i 'brang ba dang/ spos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ ras bcos bu dang chos gos dang/

rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang bar byed do// susang zhi nga rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran bde lta bu shin tu bsgoms pa yin zhing/ shin tu 'dris nga rangs la
shin tu yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// de de ltar bsod nams dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa dang
rnam par rol ba dang/ mngon par shes pa tshad med par 'gyur ro// des de ltar gang yang rung ba dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na/ myur du 'khor ba las thar par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang
dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'phag pa la skurang 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de lta yin yang mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa de yang bdun
phrag bdun du bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas pa de la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom bar byed na/ bdun phrag bdun po de 'das nas/ las kyi sgrib pa sum cha ma/

zad cing/ lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// bzhi pa rab kyi ma lnga 'a gnas yid la byed ba/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa de lta bu de ni de ltar don che ba yin no// su la 'bazhi/
ba rab kyi ma tha' gnas yid la byed pa// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rna lam du blosan/ de la mi 'am/ mig yin pa'i bar de labar brtags nas dang pa dang dga' ba dang/ mchog/
tudag 'a ba skye'o// de btson ra'i 'ching ba dam po las yongs su thar pa ra 'gyur ro// gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyang/ sdug bsngal dag las
yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang/ chad pa dang/ brdeg pa dang/ g.yangs dang/ tshe dang/ chudang/ dug dang/ dgra thams cad dang/ 'byung po thams cad dang/
ny+tsa nad kyi 'jigs pa dang/ gnas kyi 'jigs ba dang/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya banas/ bran gyi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'as

yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// su sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu thos pa tsam rna 'an du grags na/ de 'a zhabar brtags nas dad pa skyes te/ de ltar don che zhing phan

yin che ba yin no// su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sa kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ng na sngon yongs su sbyang ba sbyad pa/ dkrigs pa khrag khrig brgya stong phragang rgyud cu rtsa

sku drugan/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur to// ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe srogachags khrag drage brgyad cu rtsa bzhin sdug
bsngal la chog shes pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa kha cig ni mthar gyis snyonas par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ 'bras bu dang bo la gnas par gyur to// kha cig

ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par gyur to// de'i tshasems can dpag yas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma skyed pa'i sems bskyed do// mun bral ma 'asogs ba bdud kyi bu mo

lnga brgya po de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnas su 'khod bzhin sems yongs su sbyang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad phyogs so// thos nas kyang bud med kyi

dngos po ma snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa nyid thob bo// gang dag sngon yodasu sbyang babyas pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur to// ji skad sngar bshad pabazhin

du yon tan de dag dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i chabyad du bdag nyid mngon par sprulanas/ tshangs pa chen po re re yang bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing/
bye ba brgya phrag mang bos mdun gyis bltas te/ sil snyan dang/ phag rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod ba nas// bcom ldan 'das
kyi thad du babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/ 'brongang dang/ spres dang/ byug pa dag dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag dang/ rin po che dang/ ras bcos bu
dang / chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing/ mngon pa ra gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
tu 'khod do// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so// kade/
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu lag 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhal lta byos shig/
blobcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang/ nyon mongs ba med ba'i sems kyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das kyi dus lags kyis gshegs shig/ bcom ldan 'das gang khyod kyi mdzad pa mdzod gcig/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ba dang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no//
yang de'i tshe lha nyams cad ces bya ba nas/grul bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me tog dang/ spos dang/ rin po che dang/ rag bcos bu dang/ chos gos dang/ rgyan dang/ sdud pa dang/ gdugs dang/

sku rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyi char pa dag rab tu 'bebs/shing/ sal snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra 'byin la/ mi dang ma na mAn ba khramacad kyis bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis bstodanas/ bcom ldan
'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so// 'dod pan spyod pa dang/ gzugasan spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang/ gang bcom ldan
0 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar tsage byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te/ ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i ng bzhed par shes so// de ltar ri gnas mi

mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyire rin po che sna bdun las dug nga/ ras bcos khu snachogs dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i ma tog bkram pa'i thim skas sbrulanas 'di skad cesagago la
to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis them skas las gshegs par gasol lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi rten gsatsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i
phyi ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas rnams las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu 'phrul dag nas kyang dracom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi
gser gyi them skas tsan dan sa mchog sna tshogs bkran pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi thos skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis bcom
ldan 'dasakyi phyir lha rdzas kyi ba cha chu'i thim skas dus kyi rjes su 'brud pa'i tsan dan khyen sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas 'as gshegs/
bar gsol/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi bo lhunu'i them skas/ lha rdzas kyi phyi ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
[z/ ]@#/ khacom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin gyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'as kyi phyiramu tig dmar po'am/
gsulhardzas kyi tsan dan gyi phyemasnatshogs dang na po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la lem skas las
gshags par gsol/ rgyalapochen pobazhisakyang khacom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi zhu po che rdo'i snying po lasakhyag pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcosabu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs
pa'i them skas de nyid lanas 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cagage them skas lasar bkya rtsa mar gshigs par gsal/ lhamalan gyi dbang pakhazhi
'khor dang bcas pas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi smyug gzem skasalhardzas kyi gser gyi phyi ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pad nyi dpal nas/ 'di skad ces gsal
( to bcom ldan 'das bdag cagagi them skas las ri rab kyi rtsa mer gshigs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dga' thugs brtswa nas bdag nyid 'dun pas bdag dang 'dra
bsangs rgyas kyi sku bdun sngalanas// sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag lha'i dbang po dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyimadun du nyan blos kyis mdun du bdar cing/ byang chung sems
dwapa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de ltakhus/rab kyi rtse mor gshegs so// sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag na chog tu lhan ne lhang nger ra ra ba/
kyi rtsomor bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi sarar las 'od kyi 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang nye mabya khadrag stongashar ng bzhinano// klu khang dag drad srong thub pa'i gnas
rten du lhags pa de dag thams cad kyus/ dom shong nas ltad mor gyur te/ gcig lagacig dris pa// snang ba chen po'i nang na ston par rab kyi rtsa mal gnas pabargyad po de dag ga las
'os/ dag 'kho dang/nyi dga' gnyis kyis smasapa/ ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan g tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don pa 'di gnas pa// kun mchog lhul dbang phyugashan tu mkhas pa rnams
kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin// bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzebarjid kyis longs spyod byed// 'ching ba rnams las thar par khyed kyis kun kyang dal mag khesaphyag 'tsho
cig madros pas 'di skad ces smras so// de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sngagacan 'gro gtso 'dod pa'idabang phyug rdzu 'phrul can// khyod lasAng brtse ba yis bu dang skye bos ra ngas bskor 'di
na gzhag pa yin// 'di na la gang zhig le la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkris shing skom pa'i nad kyis 'jigasaM// sems cand yang ra'atu'arabyed khyed cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams
@// las thar bar byed// sa 'dabang phyag gis 'di skad ces gso/ da ltam pa na 'di rgyal lha dbang 'aglababral dbo 'aldan 'aphrulab gzhan 'phrul ba/ dertag/
khyed la snying brtse ba yis ri la gnas shing ku ya tshogs la lta// bdag cag yongs su skyobs zhes kun gyis gsarapar dedag la ni 'o dod 'bod de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan pas
khyed cag btson ra dgu nas zhi bar byed// rgyu mtshos smras pa/ dudag la yan 'di ni lha khang brgya byin tshogs bcas gzi brjid lhang nge ba// de ni gling bzhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su
yod par ba'i yid kyis la/ khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i pad du gyis la khrob myur du dor bar gyis// de yis ra du lag 'gro bar byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun las zur Na/ra byed//
shin tu brtan gyis smras pa de ltam lan 'di kun gzugs rten lha tshe'o/sa bsam na bde ldan gzi brjid can/// can rnams kyi ched du drang srong 'dar 'dris su 'khod nas/
brtse bsa phyogs rnams su// myur du srog chags rnams kyi 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i char pa 'babs// lha yi yid kyis thams cad de la phyag 'tshol 'di nas bdag cag
thar par byed/ klu lus 'bags pa li khab kyis 'ad skad ces smras/[ ]'don gzugasan rten pa'i lha min bzhi pa 'di kun bdud kyi 'byor pa yin// lus ngan skyes mchog bdud
xxxx
zhan mthong na 'donas myur du thar par byed// klu rin chen skyong gis 'di skad ces smras so// de dag ma yin don mgi brigs ngur smug gos can 'khod par snang ba yin// de dag la
na kun lta thalam sbyar 'khod skar ma ri nang na zla ba bzhin// bdun po de dag cher bsgrubs bcul zhugs brtan pa mgo brabs bdag kasar pa/ mun smug gos bgos/
mtshan rgyas rab bskyon 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os par mthong// gru lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras/ 'o na bdag des kyang 'jug nan
pa yin teng lari ltar snang// sems na rnams kyi mnyam gnyen 'gro ba skyob pa sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sil byed pa// gang dag lhan cig snang ba drang srong gnyan rnams kyang narje samyu la
pa yin// bdag lcag le ni brtse bas 'di nas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed// de nas khartsom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtsal me la bzhugs ma thag tu/ tshwarab dpago
tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'khor brgya stong yod par gyur to// danas 'dad pan yodapa dang/ gzugasan spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rdzas kyaran pacha sna
spya// bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa 'og min gyi lha'i gnas la thug pa'i bar man chad/ sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar sus pa//
desrid cig sulate/ danas bcom ldan 'dogalamachod pa'i lasakhyu ba'iphyir/ lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang// chos gosadad/ rgyan dang/ sdud pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal/
mtshan dang/ bdun dang/ sadang/ me tog sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par sprulapa yin no// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bos te
bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shika sangs rgyas kyi zhing mamad na nga dang sang sa rgyas rnams dong/ byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chan po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen pa rnams dang/
drang srong nam dang/ bdud rnams dang/ dbang cha par grags pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yin pa rnams kyis shin tu lesapyad zin to//
de bzhin du da ltar ri rab 'ded bzhin gshegs pa nyidakyis shin tu legs spyad zeti phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
da dbag dang lha dbang cha bar grags pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to// rab kyi rtsa man gnas pa'i khyu le khyad 'a na pa dang/ bde bar gyur ces// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das gal te bdag cag la thugs brtse bar mdzad na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ ri rab longs sad
par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na ga' yang gang su dag bdud bar ma nar tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po 'am klu'i dbang po/
'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ lham yan gyi dbang po 'am/ nam ma kha' ldang gi dbang po 'am/ ma 'am tshu'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i
dbang po 'am/ sems can dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa lha'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas/ mi'i drang srong gi bar de dag thams cad 'dar lhags par gyur na/ 'dir bangag
cag la shas cher than pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur lags so// der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ de'i zhalagyisnyan s 'od zer// kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang/
mar bodang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang shel gyi kha dog lta burnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo// 'od zer de dag gshegs na// bdud kyi gnas bya khaphrag brgya dang/ brgya byin gyi gnas/
bye ba phrag brgya dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa zhes bya ba nas// lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas dang/ lham yan gyi gnas dang/ drang sronga gnas bye ba phrag brgya'asangs rgyas kyi
zhing 'dirjesnyed pa thams cad du 'od zer dedag zhugs so// de dang de dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar khrags pa bdud dgu zhes bya ba nas/
ya drangasrong rnams zhes bya 'badumang du btags pad dang/ dud gtams cad la rab tu go bar mdzad nas/ bdudacas byub sa drang srong zhes khya kha'abar de dang de dag
denas chas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku brgyad bod dgag labar smad cig nga cig yud tsam cig gis 'di ri rab kurtsa mer 'khod/ bcom ldan
'das kyis la pa dag rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal// nga 'asangs rgyas kyi zhang 'dan/ ra'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya rjesnyed yod pa thams cad kyi nang na/ rarab 'dazhin chog/
dang/ shul ston par ngs bshad de/ ri rab 'dan 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyig longs spyod pa yan chung/ ri rab thams cad kyirgyal po yin no// de thas nas rgya byin ko'u shika dang
zhes bya bas/ mimadud kyi bdag po tshangs pas bya ba'i bar 'tshog tu yid bde ba dad rangs pa skyes sa// bcom ldan 'adas kyimasakru' rgyalapa chen po bzhi pa de dag drang srid jus
pa'i gnas rten des dong ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshon 'dinas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang dumajug nas 'dug nas/ ri rab kyi rtsama'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'dA

par dang/ klu'i rgyal po zlabal rtsub pa'i shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po 'gang dumajugam bzha gnas zhes bya ba nas/ mirab kyi rtse ma'i bar du de 'i mgo bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das
'ba' zhig lo lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag med pa de dgan/ de nas 'dangokharam nus so// de dag thams cad kyis gsang bstod de 'di skad/
ces smasago btson ra 'di nas bad bag cag yongs su bskyab par gasol/ yongs su thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu'i rgyal po dag 'a bo dang/ nye dga' gnyis/ bcom ldan
'das ri rab kyi rtsam nas 'dir gshegs shing/ gnas rten 'dir bzhugs nas/ klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam ste 1 de dag gnyis kyis gnas rten nas//
ri rab kyi rtsomo'i bar du dusrid kyi rang gi lus stsal to// de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ klud drug lus rtsub cing 'dus pa rag pa gdug pa yin pas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil dag ral bar gyuran mi rung ngo snyam nas/ des lag 'gro'i lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yongs su gtogs shang/ mgo la yang tsan dan
sbal gyi snying po dang/ ta mala'i lo mas phyi ma'i yongs su g.yogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dag mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyisang
srong thub pa'i gnas don de/ rgyar dpag tshadabya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phragabargyad cu rtsa bzhir salato mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbus su lha rdzas kyi zhu po che'i rasAban+do
budang/ rgyan dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che rnams kyigadan dag khra ting ngo// de'i tshe bcom ldano 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas/ kun shes ko'u di la bka' stsal pa// can s
kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing me mdzad thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis sa bar du lasangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs de lta bu s chos ston te/ ko'ud/
gang mig la skye bdang/ gnas pa dang// 'byung ba dang/ nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o// 'dan nadadang/ srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi
gnas pa'o// 'di na rga shi'i 'byung ba'o// ka'adi rgya gang rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi skye ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ nye bar len pa
la mngon par zhen ba 'dan sdug bisngal gyi skye ba 'o/ 'di ni nad dang srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o/ 'din shi'i 'byung ba'o// ko'i de n+ya gang mig gi 'gog
pa dang/ nye bar zhi ba dang/ nub pa dang/ nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba 'dan sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o// 'dan srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'disI/
rga ba'anub pa'o// ko'u dicu gang ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'gog pa dang/ nye bar zhi bdadu/ nub pa dang/ nye bar len pa'i rnam par zhi
ba 'dan sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o/ 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nya bar zhi ba'o// 'di ni rga shi' nub pa'o// tshes gang gis lha dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang
bcas pa dang/ dag sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/bul yin par gragru pa dang/ byamApa chen pos mchog yin par gragrwa pa dang/ snying rje/
podamapa yin pa'i grag pa dang/ 'khor ba phal tu phyin pAkhAnamed par gragapa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ dur bdang/ yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par grags pa'i
chos kyi sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag par sdom pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs sukhasgoms pa'i rgyumathun pa'i chos de ni
ngas sems can thams cad la rgya char bstan to// gsal bar mdzad do// ston pa thugs brtse ba can/ phan par bzhed pas gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad pa nongs mdzad zin
[z/ ]@#/ ted khyed cag gis bya ba len no// rgyasha'amakhrur dbyu kha'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang/ shing drung dang/ dur khrod dang/ ri dang/ 'byed dang/ bas/
mtha'i gnasamal de dag tu phyis 'gyod pacan gyuranairung gis sgoms shag rtsol cig/ ngas kyis rjesubastan pon 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grwa
zla'ade bshad pan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzad 'di gling bzhi ba phye ba phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad dugludabazhi par ror lang/ sems can dkrigs pa bye ba brgya stong khrag mang po
dadag gas ni/ dgaba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed do// kha cig na ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa rnams la gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig/
bskyed do// kha ca gnas ems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las kyi sgribapa rnams kyang dro zhigabya banas/kha ci gnas emAn dma' ba dang/ dud 'gro bar dang/ khacig gnod sbyin dbul po nyid kyi bar dang/
bcaganamadabul po nyid du 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su byang ngo// nad kyis btab pa rnams nAnd med par gyur to// sems can rnams btson ra nas yongs sur bar gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'dasal/kru'irgyal po rgya mtshosatshigs subacad degasolal/ dgabasnatshogs drim med pa'i gsar can spyod pa rnamadag phyugs rdzisaphyag/ lha dang shed las skyes dad laga'agro'i//
dmapa nyon mongs rtog pasel mdzad pa/tshul khrims shes rig gsum po phun sum tshogs pas na sa can3mas cad 'dzud pa po/ lag 'gro'i tshog sar bar mdzad sdugs rjes brtan po sngon
gyi dam bcas dgongs par madzod// gzhan ser na sems can slad du sdug bsnga' ji ltar btang ba bzhin// lago 'breg skad cagam 25 sa 'di'i rmongs sdug bsngo sna tshogs thebs//
dgra yis phyag bgyis brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las grol ba// shes chab kyis lag 'gro thams cad tshar par mdzad du gsol// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po brag pa chen po'i mdo/
nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ ri rab lagshegs nga 'a 'a'u bcu pa'o// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde/ nyi ma'i snying po zhus/
byuba'i mdo//bam po bcuganyis pa/ 'ad nas bcom ldan 'dras me tog dang/ rin po che dang/ chos gos dag gi char rab tu 'bebs

shing salasnyan dang/ pheg rdob pa dang/ glu dbyungs dgagi lamo'i sgra'abyin pa'i lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham rin thams cad sdud pas ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gshegs te/bcom ldan 'das nyanaN+Do

kyi dge 'dun gyis mdunadu bdar cing byung tshub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi yongasubaskor nas drangosrong sgrub pa'og rtenagyidabusugadan ting ba nyid la bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i
phyir/ steng gi nam mkha' la lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yanadang/ mi 'am cu thams cad kyis rgyan dang/ phyi ma sna tshog sadang/ me tob sna tshogs/
pa dang rin po che sna tshog sakyi mar ba tu phab bo/ bcom lda'adas laglud dgags kyang lo tog sna tshogs dang dri sna tshogs dang rin po che sna tshogs dang/ rig gos dang/ sa
bcos pu dang/ chos gos dang/ rgyun sna tshogs kyis mchod pabyas nas// lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo khes phyag 'tshal nas/
lcaspyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ ku'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa com ldan 'das sug las gang dgags//
sems can rnams klu'i skye gnas su skye lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po las kyi sgrib pa bcusasums can 'byung po rnams myur du gru'i skye gnasu skye'o/
bcu gang zhen sems can gdu dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing/ bla na med pa'i thug pa rongs su tshol ba'isems dang ldan pa dag yin laM/ myur du 'dodo ba rnamA
kyi la rtas dmags sultakho ma yin zhing/ shin tu sbyin pa laM mngon par brtsonal/ lagabaskyod bdag yod de/ de dag smon lam gyi khang gis ku rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ yongasasems ]
can ga nga da ga bla na med pa'i thag pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par brtson padag yod// de dag gis tshul khrims thams cad rdzog
bar skyon med par srung ba mnusaso// de dag sems can ngumal ba dang/ yi do das kyi drigs pas skrag nas/ rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can
gang dag bla na med pa'i phyig pa yongs su tsholakhar byed cad shan tung rgyalagyisakhangs pa dag yod de/ de dag nga rgyal gyi mthus rang gi smon lam gyi ku rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang semA
can gang dag bla na med pa'ig pa'ispyod pa'i mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/ de dag shin tu khre ba mang zhing sa na sana rnams la rab tu stong ste/ dgo shAn la brten pas 'cha
ba'i dus thamar rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te/ de dag smon lam gyis der skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nyan byis kyi theg pa dang yang dag par ldan zhing/ snodadu gyur ra'i
sbyin gnas yongs su btsal ba dang/ mchod pa'ims dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag rang gi smonalam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag sil snacan dang
nga rgyal gyi skyon dang ldan pa dag 'dod de/ de dag las des ku rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal la mngon par dga' zhing/ mu cor stsal rdzun du smra ba dag med
[w]na da de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag yin zhing 3chos dang/ dwag
'dun dang/ bslabapa dang/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang/ bla ma'i gnas lta bu dang/ bam rnams la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang bdag yin pa yod de// du btsa
brgyud dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ lad chung ngus 'khrul pas klu rnams kyin ng du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyaladad/ gti mug gis zil gyis nan cing
ma dul la skyon med pa ma yan par spyod pa dag yod de/ de dus gu rnams kyin ng du skya'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang/ phra masmakhadang/ tshig rtsub po sA ba la gomasapa dag red/
da dedag 'chi ba'adus byas nas/ klu rnams kyin ng du skye ste/ bcu po de dag yin no// chos gzhan gsum dang ldan n klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// gsum gang zhe na/ sems can gang
ngag lus dang/ ngab dang/ 2da kyi sapar spyod pa shin tu dam po drug gsasems can da myalab rnams kyi nang du skyes pa drug yod de/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas//
nyes par spyod pa'i lhag ma chung ngus ku rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang/ de bzhin du yi dgas rnams nasazhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis
sems can rnams kyu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// rgya mtshos rang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de du bzhinano// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ btsun pa bcom/
ldan 'das 'di na klu gong dag longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa'i dpaladang ldan pa/ lhadang 'dra ba dag mchis pa nas/ mi smad ramasadang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang/ ra dag
dang 'dra bdag mchis pa' bar dang/ gang dag dud 'gro'i skyo gnas pa dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i kharanas/ klugang dag sems can damya labadang 'dra ba dgags bar mchis lags te//
da dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor bgrod bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po pad+ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdagasug las gang gis kru'adabs su skyes nas//
gzugs mchog tu lhamam zhing/ lus kyis rig pa gang rungazad cirag kyang/ gang kun tu tshig cing 'bar b.lags/ bdag dus hramasacadumachis nasaMm 'boranas/ gcer
bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/ bdagagawa mden dpal phun sum tshogs pa/ ches khyad par du 'phags pamyong ste/ dperan gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'argyal po bzhin lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyisabaka' sul pa/ kyi lag 'gro sngonabyung ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa 'disapada' tshade'i dus na de bzhin gshegaso pa zhes bya ba nas// sangs rgyas
btsem ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// de'atsha rgyal pom tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal pom rtog bral des kyang//
de bzhAn gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de 'azlab gsum du yo byad khams chad phul nas/rtag
tu chos ma nyan te/ d+hu na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das de 'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so//
rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba zhig yodad/ shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ pa'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de rjes
su skyong zhing 'dug go/ de nas brlom ldan 'das kyi nyan rjes kyi dag slong gang dag gnas pa dang 1 dun gang dag bza' ba dang/ btung bdang/ mal cha la longs spyod par byed paThamA
cad ' ma tog bral gyi bu dag slong srid sgrubabasad phrag dogakhyedato// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dug slong de dag kyang gnas de nas do ngo// de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas//
! bdag nyidakyis kyang longs sodapa mi byed/ gzhan la yang mi ster zhes khyab nas/ dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dusabyas nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du
skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ da lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas baaso// de de nas shi 'phos nas yi dugs rnams kun
du skyes te/ lebargya stong phrag mang por dasdug bsngal myong ngo// phyis nang sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas rnam5 kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo// lag sogs 'khor bas skrag
pa'isams dang ldan pa srid sgrub bcus zhes bya ba rab tu byung ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas/ de ltar yunaring por ngan song du sdug bsngal myong ba de gzhan zhig yin par khyed sems/
gzhan yin par yang blta bar mi bya ste/ da ltar las kyi skyob pa dam posazinam yang khyod yin no// 'di thanachad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan song la/sumukyi nang
du skyes so// de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo// gang khyod 'di nas shi
'phos nas/ phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang/ da'agro dang/ yi dgas rnams kyin ng du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyisag zer bar gyur pa 'di ni gnas yod do// klu'i bu de mchog tu yod
dga' nas/ rab tu ngu nang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis laphyag 'tshal nas// 'ad skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das byas pa ji ltakhaMdang myos pa ji lta ba
'bru// dang mi gsal ba dang/ mi mAkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du nongs pasAsor 'chags lags so/ nos paso sor 'chags lags so// btsun babcom ldan
'das bdag gis bsam pas sdom pa gzungakhar bgyi'o// bdag de brtan gshigs pa'i dag bsnyen lags te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dusrog gcod pa spang bar bgyi lags so//
bag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs sumachis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lags lags so// khyod lhag pa'i khasamalas skya
su song bas khyed kyi ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su zad do/ 'di nas shi 'phos nasakhyed kyisabyamasApa'i tshanama'aredapa thob par 'gyur to/ byamasapa'i smad du rab tu 'byung
kaM bar 'gyur zhing/ dgrakhacom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa la zla bgasum du yakhyad thams
cad kyis ramagro byas pa dang/ de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab yo byed thams cad phun sum tshogs par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog khral zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems/
na de bzhin yin par yang mi blta ste/ dan klu'irgyalapo rgya mtsho'adi yin no// bden bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror ma skyes so// lha'i dpal dang/ skal ]
[d]/ ba bzang po phunasum tshogs pa shin turgya chen po myong ngo// 'dan bun med pa'i theg pa'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ 'dir dpal dang skal
ba bzang po de lta bu myong ngo// de skad ces smos nas/ klu thams cad skye zhing mchog tu yid ma dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyos shang nye bar rtogs pas ga
par byed par gyur to// de'anang na klugazhan mig med pa/ long ba 'bras bu nyam chung ba zhes bya bzhig yod da/ des gasad bstod nas 'o dod bos te gsalapa/ sems can
rnams la shugs brtse bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ yun ring bdag gi lus la sdug bsngal tshor ba rab ma bzad/ srin bu sprulapa skye bo srog chagasU sna tshogs tshan
bar bgyid// bzla'akha btud ba ma mchas chab tshanan bdag gnas lags// bcom ldan 'das kyisabakA'astsal la// 'khor ba 'jig rgyalakhastan pa la// sngon ni dge sbyong khyed
gyur te// mkhas shing gtsang sbra spyod lam ldan// dben pa dag tu 'ang sdig pa byed// lhan cig gnas pa dag kyang mang// khyed bdog ston ba 'dra bar gyur// dgra bcom rdzu'aphrulachen po
yang// khyed lasob rnams kyis brjod// rnyed dang bkur ste byung ban// khyod gcig pu yas longs spyad cing// khyod kyis dge slong nges pa mthong// de dag la ni ma snyan
rgya// brjod// lhan cig gnas de mi dgara gnas // khyodan tshe rabs stod dag tu// nged kyi zas su gyur cig ces// de lta bu lasems bskyed de// lasAkyi rnam
par smin pa des// 'dir yang khyadan lag 'gror skyes// khyed rang gi yang lhan rig gnas// phyizur zakhar byed pa yin// chutshananangan gnas pa dang/ lang bar de yasagyur
k+Sha pa yin/ kun tu 'bar ba'i lcags dang zangs// phyis kyang dmyal bar za bar 'gyur// stobs med padran mu dga' bas// klu dbang kun gyin ng na du// zhes pas sor bshags/
byas na// sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su grol// de nas bcom ldan gser 'dra'agi/ phyag gis de bzhin dkyil 'khor rig/spyod par dka'akha dgongs mdzad nas/ ston pas
'di skadabaka'o stsal to// rgyal po mig bzang sang byung ste// sngon tshe bden pa gang gisangs/ bram ze lang ba'i den dun/ mig dag gnyis ka byung bar gyur// bden pa'i tshig lo
klu na yis// khyod kyis dri med mgashob shog/nga pa lags bar spyod pasakhyod// sngon gyi las de bya bar shog tang/ klu kha ba ra san kha kho/ karma la kha azhan dzan/bar
dza pAn ta/ dzAm/ nas ra Na te ya/ a nyon dran rtab shud d+he/ pha la shudad+he/ a dzi tadzi tal/ tan la[]bsi d+hasaka/ bas te/ ru'o te dmadonur kha/
tArat+na bra te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa 'i tshig de ba da pa na/ klu 'bras bu nyam chung ba'i mig yongasA sud ga lar gyur to// klu ga zhin stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum/
gyi mig kyang yongs su dag par gyur to// gzhan gnodasbyin dang/ grulakhumadang/ yid gasaMdang/ sha za dang/ mi khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsi bzhin sngon gyi las kyi sgrib khazad
cing mig yongasAsu dag par gyur to// de nas lha 'bumtshani khazang sa skalamo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas smas pa/ 'jig rten 'dren pa rnamag kyi stobs la ltos// rab tu
la mched rnams lam kyang//la la tastan pa 'a bag rtan mi 'byung na// su la 'gro bar sha'i yig phyis mi mthong// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
ko'u dartsalabaka' stsalal/ ko'ud rgya khyod kyis gsang sngagasaM chen po'i gozhi'i gzungs sngags mig sgrubapa 'di zung zhig daltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la la sems can
rnams kyi sngon gyi lasakyi lhag mdang/ khams kun tu 'khrugs ba dang/ gos sngags dang/sman dang/ dug gi sbyor bas led par 'gyur ba dang/ cung zad mgrod bar lang
'gyur bdes mig sgrub pa'i gzungs sngags 'dirang gas bkago par bya'o// rang gi las so sor bshagasapar bya'o// dos sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyisasangs
rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing/ las gzhan ma byed par khag bdun phrag ban durang gamig la byabs na mig yongs su dag par 'gyur yang
sems can gang dmag mtshams med btisi lhagam lus pas le bar gyur cad/ dam pa'i chos song ba'i lhag ma lus pa dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debasapa'i lhag ma lus pa dang/
sgyu chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus bdud/ glegs bam du bris pa rnam par 'jig pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang/ gzhan gyi mig rnam par 'ag pa'i las kyi lhag khas lodo bar/
gyur pa de dag gis gzungs sngags de dag yi ga 'dra'i bcug ste de yang dang yang du klog tu gzhug go/ las kyi sgrib pa bshags par bya'o// gzhan yang rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang/ shing
dngar dang sman kA tsa dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ rus sbal gyi snying rul ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btsugs shing btsusal/ gsang sngags 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyud Tan par brjod/
cang/ mgag phyi rol bsku bar bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bdu nad las gzhan mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs kyang byas na/da'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus
par byang bar 'gyur nyid/ de'i mag yongs su dag bor yang 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyi gnas dge 'dun kyi kun dga' ra ba byas na yang/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa
sa byang bar 'gyur ro// phyis kyang 'khor bar mig ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas mas cad dang ldan pa'i kru'i 'khor des 'di skad ces gsol te/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan s/
dus gsum gyi sems can kums can la phan par mdzad pa/ nad las rab tu byar par mdzad l phyag 'tshal lo/ de nas de'i tshe katshortsa sngon po gsang bskor/
'di skad rtsis gsol to// sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba khyod// khyod na dga' mdzad dpal kun ldan// khyod kyis las kyang rab tu mkhyen// srog chags kun gyi rgyal po khyed///
bad ga na chu dang rnam bral zhing// tshaba'i rlung gso dkunu gdung sa paN+Di 'brog dbon pan gnas pa lags// dri la zhim pa'i gnas ni gnas// len byakha khrag steng du/
zhag gcig bdag la de ma mchis// rtog par 'khor dang lhan cig tu// bdag ni gnyen gyisabaza'akha lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems
can gang dag sdugabyas nas// phyis kyang bdag nyid bsod nams sgrub/ lus kyigaN+Di brdungs nas su// dag slong dge 'dun tshim byed na 'ang/ las kyi lhag ma deyasANasu//
gang dang gang du skyes pa na// sdug bsngal ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur zhing da/ bza' btung dbating yang dag ldan/ yang naklu la skye gnas su// las kyis skyabar 'gyur ba yin/
bya da ri mgo la kad bder// nor bu'i rgyal po 'byung bar gyur/ kun tu chu 'byung zhes bya ba// chu sbyin byed pa'i klur 'gyur ro// gang na klu'i gnas
byud pa// de nas tshun 'bab par 'gyug/ sa bam nam mkha' la yang rung/ gang dang gang du 'gro bder// sems ni bskyed ma ga tu yang// chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur pa
yin lang nasems can gang dag gis// mi yi dngos po thob nas su// sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas// dge 'dun ramagrem byed na// de dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs
sangan song gsum dumyong nas kyang// de nyid ku la skye gnas su// skye ba thob par gyur ba yin// de nas kun tu chu ma 'byung/ mgo lanor bu rin chen med// stong pa skam pa'i
gnas dag tu// chumed par ni gnas par 'gyur// sngon 'das dusazhu khyed kyis ni// rgyal ba skar rgyal bstan pa la/ dag gling dgon pa par gyur te// brag degaser snas
gang ba yin// dag slong glo bur 'ongasa mthong ano// khro gnyer can gyi bzhin byas nas/ do dag lan sbyin btod byed// de la yang ni mngon sumagayo durani gang dag chur yang
myur du mi gtsang ba las bkang// 'chags sa kha gnas khang dgag gnas// dri da ba ras bkang bar gyuro// dag slong des pa 'gro ba na// brgyad bkag gsan gshi bar gyur/
dag slong des pa gzhan dag kyang// rgyang ring bar ni longs su sbyang// de phyir phrag te ga ser sna'i rgyus// ma chod par ni khyod gyur nas// dge sbyong su zhig la la mthong//
myar du khros nas gshakharagyug/ sbyin pa pol khre bas gsha/ ngo tsha khrel med rnam par myangs// las kyi rnam par smin pa dris// sems can dmyal bar so sor skyes//
sanabya sasems dmyal du// sdugokhasngalamang po nyams su myong// yid gasa rnams su dus dra por/ sdug bsngal rab tu mi bzad myong// khyod ni klu yi skye gnagasu/ skyes
nasashin tu sdug bsngal gyur// stong pa'i brog dgon rdzong rnams su// chudang bral bar ba zhes pa yis// sems can dmyalab rnabs su khyod// sdug bsngal tshor ba phyir khrir myong
shin tu yun ring le dgasatong// dud 'gror sdug bsngal tshor ba cing// su zhig smim 'tshiganod sems byung/ rtag tuphrag dog sar sna khresapal/ bsam gtanam
skyob sangs rgyas machod pachan// tshul khrims M mi skyob dgon par gnas pa yin/ yang de'i tshe klu'i 'khor de'i nang nas/ klu yi dgas lta bu bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa drug sngon gyi
tshorabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ skad po cher rob tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan M 'das bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag
cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bstan pa la bdag cag gis 'dra mtshungs par las bya sgrub pa de lta bu 'khas lags so// de ltar yun/
ring por dran songagasum du sdug bsngalomyong lags so// da ltar yang klu yi dgas lta burnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal rdo lta bu s gzer lags te/ dper na klu la regs
lta bu tshon rtsi sngon po bzhin// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis tshulong la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chag chag thob cig dang/ de nas M khyed kyi
sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// klu yi dgags lta bu de dag thams cad kyis lag pa gnyis khris chu blangs padahU~M/ lag na chu 'dug pa de rab tu 'bar ro// dran s
mi'i phung po shing ta la drug srid du 'phags te/ lan bdun gyikhar dud bzhanano// klu'i tshogs de mchog tu yi dam dag ba nas/ mchim dag khyung ngo/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i/
'khor de yang yid kun tu mi dga' nas de bzhin// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa// de 'dra ba pa 'bras bu thog/ dag pa yin na bzang
tshe po ste sdig pa byed po'ang sdig to'o// de nas yi dgas lta bu'i klu/ khyed kun 'di skad tshig sgrosasheg/ bden pa gang gis ston pa ni// sems can kun la thug sa snyom pa//
bden pa'i tshig de kho na las/ dud kyi chun ma 'bar zhig/ klu thams cad kyis de skad ces smras so// lan brgyad pa lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab/
gnyis la gtor nas/ nyes ba la nyes pa so sor bshags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa'i las kyi sgrub pa yi// lhag ma lus pa yongs su zad// byams
pa'i tshe na khyed cag ni/ dam pa srid pa thob par 'gyur// khyoms pa ya na bstan pa la// myur du rab tu 'khyud kha 'thob// rnal 'byor lan mngon brtson dang// myur dudagra bcom
thob par 'gyur// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyamathus kru' tshogs du ji ltar lhagasapa bzhan/ de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs drung/ bdag gis las dang/
'gro ba drang skyo ba rjes su dran ti/ 'khor de'i nang nas klu brgya stongo phrag mang po'ang gas nyis pa byas pa'i sdug pa'i las kyis rab tu dus nas/ kha ciglu gis 'di skad ces gso[']te/
sngon gyi de bzhAn gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa la bdag cag khyaman gnas par gyur te/ nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang/ chos mnyan pa'i rkyen kyis dag sang rnam sa dang lhan cag
tu dge 'dun gyi sngon du gyur pa// bsngos pa'i ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ khu ba dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba longs spyad lags so zhes bya ba nas/khacig gsagasal pa

sa gang+gab zhan gshegs pa rnam par gzugs kyi zhes kha ba 'baza bdag cag gis phyogs bzhi pa la bsngos pa lengs sad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis shis bsngos pas
los da lags se zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// kha cig gis gsalapa bdag cagade bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kya zhes bya ba'ihAr dang/ bdag cag gtsug tor can zhwa
bya pa'i bar dang/ bdag cag 'khor ba 'jig ga zhes bya ba'i bar dong bdag cag gser thub kyi zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ kru khacigagasan 'ad skad cas gsal te// de bzhin ga shog
pa 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la bdag cag khyim na gnas par gyur te/ nyi dudang 'grogs pa' rkyen dang/ chos manyan pa'i rkyen gyisaMd khazhan du bsngos pa'i dge 'dun gyi me tog dang/ 'byas
bu dang khub dang/ bza' bar ng/ btung ba dag slong rnams la stsal ba de bdag cag gi longs skyid lags so// sdig pa'i las des kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du sdug/
bsngal mabazad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshog sarab tu mkhazad pa mang po yang dang yang nyams su myong lags so// dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kun ng du dus yunar de por rtag du sdug
bsrel gyis gziralags so/ las kyi lhag mdes bdag cag klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'di'i skyes nas/ tsha ba bskol ba kun tu tsha ba'i nang du btsos lags so// bye ma kun tu tsha ba'i/
nang du bsregs lags so// bdag cag gi kha'i sgor kha zas stsal ba yang lcags kyi thu lum du gyur lags so// du ba khar btung ba stsal ba yang lcags drang phangs su gyur
lags so// yang dang gang du mchasapa thams cad du sdug bsngal tshor ba de lta bu myong lags na/ bdag cag yongs subaskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
kyi lag 'gro dag khyed kyis dge 'dun gyi langs spyad pa de na 'os pam yin te/ mtshams med pa dang nyab yin no// rnam smaram snyan par gang gis kyang myur dubashags par mnyes
saH kya lag 'go dag de lta yin yang rjesad 'chi'i bar du skyabs gsum du 'phro ba la 'bod cig dang/ de lta na khyed la/ pa dang/ bde par 'gyur ro// rgyu dos de bzhin gshegs
pa khyed 'dod pa bzhana'akher khar gzhog par mdzad do// de dag/thams cad gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la yang bkod par gyur to/ de yang 'khor de'i nang na klu ma leng ma zhig
yod de/ de'i kha srin bus gang zhing gcan rul ba lta pu'i rnag dri nga ba zag pa// smad kyi mtshan la yang de bzhin no// de'i lus yums cad dul cing rnag 'dzug pa/ thol ma
dang srin bus gang ba la/ sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu rings dang/ sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kyis za bar byed do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos gzigs te/
bka' stsal pa/ sring bo khyod kyis lus la sdig pa'i las ka ma byas ji lta bu zhag/ des gsol pa btsunal btsem ldan 'das bdag gas tshor ba sdug khas
pa lags so/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshor ba tsha ba lags te/ gron gnas klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes pa'i dbang lestong phrag sum cu rtsa drug bdag gis mnapag
'tshal lags so// bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de ltabu na gdugs/ga gcig kyang rgyunamachad lags so// bka'astsal pa/ sngon gyi las ci zhig byas M das gsol pa/
'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pal/ rgyal ba rnam par ba/rdzogs kyi bstan pa la/ ma'i rgyud kyi bud med du gyur lags te/ bdag der 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang lhan tsug tu/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na/ dge 'dun gyi mal cha'i steng du yang dang yang du 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i tshes 'dod
pa dgasosor yang dag par ma lags te/ nor gyi slad dume skag lags so// bcom ldan 'das de tshun chad bdag gtan du lhadang mA'i chud pa dang bral lags so// rtag tu ngan song
gsum gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa rab tu mi bzad pas gzer lags so// bka' stsalapa sring mo gang gi tsha'adir bskal pa chen po 'jig par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod gang du seng des
gsol pa/ sngon gyi las la rten pa'i rlung chen pod dug gis 'phangs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyags ma lnga dang ldan pa gzhan dag tu 'phangs lags so// yang gang gi tshe der 'jig
par gyur nas/ danas yang 'dir 'dzangs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag yongs sukhaskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gnyis kas rma rtsisos dang sbyar ba'i chu bzhes te 1 bden pa brjod par mdzad do// bden pa gang gis sngon spyi ba'i phyir nga'i lus chags pamed par yod/
su btang ba'i bden pa des khyod kyi nad de dag zhi bar gyur cig/ klu mo de'i khar blugs shing lus la gtor bas/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ gsum la skyabs su nye bar gnas
par gyur to// yang de nyidan klu gzhan zhig lus drang zhing srin bus gung la srin bu ser skyes gang nas/ dolas rnag khrag tsha zhung/ gor gor por zag pa/ smra ma nus pa/ mchog
tu skyon du bgrang ba zhig yod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de gzugs nas bka' stsal pa/ lag 'gro khyod kyis sngon mi dag ba'i las ci zhig byas/ klu des kha'i sgo phyanas/
srin bu'i rigs dang/ rnag khrag dang mes gang ba'i kha'i sgod brems te/ sma ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyor chu zhig bzhes te/ bka'astsal pa ri bong gyur
tadrang srong phyir// rang gis me yi nang bor ba// bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis// kun smra bar nus par shog/ skyor chu de klu'i khar blugs nas/ de'i kha'i nang
du me rab tu zhi zhing/ srin bu dang rnag khrag kha'i phyi rol tu 'byung ngo/ klad kha yongs su dug par gyur nas/ 'di skad ces gso'[']to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba 'od srung
kyi bstan pa la bdag shing par gyur lags so// bdag gsabotse ldan 'dus kyi nyan klos gzhan zhig la skyid du stsol cig dang/ ston gyi dus su khyed la dbul lo zhes gser srang lnga/
bcu zhig gsol kha btapa lags so// des bdag la 'gron bu brgyad cu'i rin bcu zhig stsal te/ lnga bcur ma stsal lags so// bdag gis dag slong de 'a khro bas zil gyis non nas/
ka 'gron bu brgyad cu'i rin bcu blangs te/de la slar yang ma stsal lags//cad zhan la da dus gzhan zhig na dag slong rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba der bdag mchis naas der dge 'dun gyi mngon
dugyur pa bsngos pa la 'bras 'bus bu bcu gsum 'a sa da lags so// sug las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma de khonas/ de nas shi'akhos nas 'brog dgon pa skam po 'di nya tshaba'i sems
can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ rtag tu bdag gi lus srani bu dag dang/ rnag khrag khasnga pas gang lags so// bkres pa dang skom bas kun tu gzar nasasdug khasnga'agyi tshor ba myong
lags so// yang medagu pa'i sa rgyus des bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ dang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes lags so// da ga slong de yang khro ba dang ser sna'i
rgyu des 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du bdag gi mchan khung du skyes te/ dus rtag tu bdag la ga lo bar bgyid lags so// de rtag tu khri bas zal gyis gnas dbu
tsho bsabadag gi lus la yongasasu gang bar bgyid do// rgyu des rtag par rgyun du bdag ga lus srin bu dag dang/ rnag khrag gis gang lags na/ de pazhin gshegs pas bdag yongs su
bskyab tu gsol/ sbrul dag dang 'dra ba de las bdag yongos su thar pa mdzad par gsol de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu chab bzhes te/ 'daskad ces bka' stsal to//
chu go dugan byung ba'i tshe// ngan 'dir yang nyar gyur te// sha dang khrag gis tshimakhyas pas// khyed cag gnyis ka bde bar shog/ chu des klu la gter nas/ de'i mchan khung nas klu'i bu
byung ngo// gnyis kas 'di skad ces gsol to// yunadzatsamakhyas ngan song dag las padag cag thar par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyi lag 'gro dag gang phyol
bzhi'i dag dun nas/ dge 'dun gyi man du gyur pa bsres pa'i me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba'am/ mal chadang/ rtsa dang/ yo byad
kyang chung dag 'dum kha la te bdag gir legs spyad dam/ gzhan la nan/ sdug ba'i las de rnam par ma smin cing/ so sor yang dag par mamyong bar sus
kyang myur du zad par bya bar mi nus te/ 'dazhimatshamasamed pa dang nya pa shikhalcoSha yanano// lag 'gro dag khyed tshur shog/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs sudang zhag dang/ des na khyed cag
tshul gnas dag tu 'gyur ro zhes bya banas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su rnam par bkod de/ tshul gnas par gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa u0f9fgu rnon po dag gas su// rang gi yan lag bad tshubs labla'o// bsngos zin pa yi dngos pon// khyim pa rnams la sbyin mi bya// me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi// lcags kyi phru lum zes
pa bla'i// dge 'dun dag las gar na/ dge 'dun gyi la longs mdu/ lhun po dang ni 'dra ba'i me// slong kha byas te zos pa blu'// khyim par gyur pas dge 'dun// longs spyad
par ni mi bya'o// thams cad dbyung ba byas pa dang// gsal shing steng du btag pa bla'i// khyim par gyur pasadge 'dun gyi// las sbyad par n mi bya'o// me mdag gis na gang ba yi//
gnas khang derani zhugs pa bla'i// khyim pas dge 'dun gnas khang du/ mtshan mo gnas par mi bya'o/ me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi// lcags kyi sku lum blangs la bla'i// rab tu byung tong
@#/khyim pa yi// dbyig ni glang par mabya 'o// 'khor lo rnon pos bdag gi lus// kun tu gtubs pa bya la bla'i// legs par gsung sa pa'i chos rnams la// rgyags dang gshekhalaskyedamA
byalegs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyis// 'gan rang gi sbyang ba bla'i// sems can dun bgrang ba la// khres pas skyes bu mi mngag go/ legs par gsungasapa'i chos can gyi//
me pa gos ni glen pa bla'i// tshul 'chos pa dang mthu yis su/ khyim pa las na gos mi bslang// me 'dra bur ni bskor ba yi/ rtsub gyurachu ni'athudas pa bya'o// rab tu byung ba
g.yo skya yis// bza' btung bsang khar mkhya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu khribs stong sud sngon nyes par byas pa'i[]go bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu dag las yongs su thar
par mdo de skyabs gsum la yang rnam par bkod do// de'i tshe klu ga zhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni skyabs gsum du 'gro ba dang/ klog pa gsum la nges par rnam par bkod do//
de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ko'u di rgyal bka' stsal pa/ ko'u di rgyasems can rnams rang la sla bal ltos/ sems can gang dag dbul po nyid kyi 'jigs pas skug
nas/ da gis ngag sbyong chos kyis kha/nas pa rnams 'a/ phanagadags pa'i phyir 'bad kyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshog saMkhasngos la/ kha cig gsan rang gis longs da/ kha cig gis ni/
gzhan galan skyon// gzhan dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir na/ kha cig gsanAmathus phyogasanas/ longs spyad pas de ltar yun ring bor dran song gsum du sdug bsngal bsten to/
yang sems can gang dag dbul po nyid kyi'ajigs pas skug nas 'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra pams cad las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir/ sngon gyisang sargyas bcom ldan

rgyu'adas rnams kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung/ de dag rab tu byung nas cha dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang/ tshig 'don pa btang nas nyams par gyur pa de dag kha cigan/ dge slong tshes kyis gnas pa
rnams la dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin du bsngos pa rang gis phyogs te longs spyod par byed do// kha cig gsan khyim pa rnams la sbyin par byed da/ de dag gnyis ka da ltar yun
ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal gyis gzir te/ ngas nyes dmigs de yang dag pa gzigs nas/ nga'i nyan thos rnams la dran par bya ba bca' ba mdzad do/ nga'i nyan thos sus
kyang dag snying la bsngos pa dang/ dag slong ba dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ le matong/ bcud khyim pa rnams la sbyin par ma bya'o// gang zag gi 'du
kyi longs spyad par mi bya'o// dge 'dun las phyi rel du yang nyo tshong mi bya'o// bskor ba dang/ bsgyur ba dang/ dbyig gi gtam mi bya'o// sems can rnams zang zang gsal/
yongs su bsdu ba'i rkyen kyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal dag la dgod par mi bya'o// sems can rnams chos kyi bsdu bas bsdu bar bya'o// mi phyed pa'i dad pa bzhi dang theg pa/
gsum dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la dgod par bya'o/ 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcugacig pa las/ klu skyabs su 'gro ba'i le'u bcug cig
pa'o// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i ste/ nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa ste ma'o//
@#// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan kun shes ko'u de rgyas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lag 'gro dag byin gyis brlab tu
gsol/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las bstan pa'i spyod pa dang 'brel ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yun ring por 'bar bar mdzad dug sel/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
ji srid du gleng bzhi pa 'dir mchod rten chen po 'di dag rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la man par brtson pa thams cad kyis stong par mgyur pa de srid du gleng bzhi pa 'dir chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di
rab tu spyod par 'gyur// mchod rten chen po gang dag ca na/ 'dzam bu gling 'dan mchod rten drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni/sngon chad sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub mas dpa' dang/
rang rgyal ba dang/ nyan thos mang po gnas gnas shing/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan yang gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ rjes sukhastanapachen po yun ring du gnas pa'i mdzad pa'i phyir/

ya drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten de sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chu lha'i lag tu yongs su gtad pa mdzad do// ngas kyang de nyid kyi lag tu yongasasu gtad de 'di yang
spro bar 'gyur zhing/ gang zag chos kyis gsapa rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la mngon par brtson padag yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// gang dag gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams laban bkur/
la mnApar khazhapa'i sbyin pa bo dang/ sbyin bdag de dag kyang yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po chu lhas gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ded banyan te/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba
kyi 'jig gis drang srong rlu bopa'i gnas kun rten 'di 'chang phyir yong su gongad lags so// gang dag gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mno par brtson pa chos kyisA gnas pa rnams kyang/ 'chang phyir yongs
( gtad lags so// ga dag bgang zagamanyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/ chos kyis gnas pa rnams la ramagro la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po// sbyin bdag de dag kyang de bzhin lags te/ji srid
du dam pa'i chos 'bar bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du/ bdag gis gnyis ka bsrungs lagaso/ da bzhan du deb chen gshegs pa gser thub kyi bar dang/ de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyi/
par yang/da' ches kyi tshul 'bar gyi par du gtad lagras so// de bzhin dud ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten nas/ gang zag mnyam ba nyapa la
mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnam sa kyi bar dang/ gang dag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur la mngon
