@# rnams la yang gnod pa'i bya/ de la rnam pa de dag gnyis ka la yang gnod par mi bya 'o// gang dag bdag la khros par gyur nas yang dag pa ma yin pa rjod par byed cing srog gi khacan
byed pas gnas pa tshangs bar spyod pa'i bar chad byed pa la 'jigs pa 'am/gus bar bya ba dang/ thun dga' kha'i tshig gis kyang dad sems yongs su 'as khar bya/ galas
lung nod pa dang/ khadan 'den bdang 'brel badra ba na ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing gus par bya'o// de ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par yang bya'o// deltar
la mkhastan par bya zhe na/ sems mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems rab tu dung ba nyid dang/ yang dag par 'du shes pa dang/ som nyi med pas lam nye bar bstan par bya'o// gal to
ba tsom med par gyur na des lam shes pa'i skyes bu dag las mnyananas lam nyo bar bstan par bya'o// chos bzhi podi dag dang ldan n byang chub sems dpa' myur du bun med pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// tshul bzhin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang// tshulakhazhin tshos nabyed cing// tshul
bzhin shan tu don sems la// chos rnams kun gyi b.rol phyin/ lus can rnams la wan don du// chos yongs su tshol ba na// mkhan po dag dang rta gnas ni// gusab kun
gyis bya ba yin// rtog tu byams pa la gnas nas// byas pa gzo dang byas pa tshor// ngo tsha khrel yod phun sum tshogs/// phrag dog tshul 'chos rnam
bar ng/ nad kha rnams ni gso khyodapa// rnyed dka' don chen 'du shes kyis// de dag 'du shes nyer bzhag nas// legs par bshad pa yongs su btsal// de dag thos/
sgyubs bder 'gyur dang/ shes rab rnon po'ang skye 'gyur zhang// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang/ thamasacad byams pas zhi khar 'gyur// dper na skyes bu khrus byas
tshul 'ga' yis 'phreng ba khyen pa na lag pa gnyis kyis yongs blangs nas/ spyi bo la ni 'jig pa ltar// de bzhin legs bshad zlos nas kyang// dga' ba'i sa mA
na skye gyur ba/ rgyal srid thob pa'i ng rdo lta bu ' dga' ba rnyed pam yin na// rtag tu de dag chos smra la// mchog tu bla mar bya ba yin// chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyalamtshan
chos ni dgra bcom rgyal mtshan yin// sangs rgyas chos rnams sbesanas kyang// bslab pa dag la ba gnas shing/ tshul khrims thos pas nges 'byung ste// dperan pa ra ngo'i
zla babazhin// mi rmongs zhesdad med pa yis// lam mchog dgan khasten pa dang// byis pa gang la gusakhacasapa'i// lta ba'i gnas kyang rnam par song// sang gas mngos pa'i
zla bzhin du// zil gyis mthun pas chos rnams 'chad// rlung gis smin gyi tshogs bzhin du// mu stegs can dris zil gyis mnan/ sa la sbyin gyi tshogs bzhin du// chos kyis/
yongasasu tshal par byed// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni// sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du se// sems rtse gcig mnyamub zhag pas// de dag rnam rtog spyod yul min/ da
dadag khre ba lhur ma len// 'byar ba la pad agazhasos// dus dang dus man rnam shes shing// zhogs pa yis rnam par 'dren// rtag tu bzod stobs la dga' rnams/ gos
ba'i las rnams byed par 'gyur// mkhasatang mthu la brtan pa dang// chos shes pa la mkhas pa dang/ dpa' zhing sems stobs che ba ste// rlung gis chad pa'i rdulakhazhan du//
sdug can rnams ni zil gyis gnon// phyogs rnams dag tu gsal gnas pa// nyi ma 'char ba ji bzhin no// mkhasal de drug rang donal/ chod dusmob rjed mi byed/ 'jig rten nam
la phan pa'i phyir// bsam gtana mngon shes dag la mkhas// de dag rnam pa 'di 'dra bas// bdud kyi steng na gnas pa yin// sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir// 'jig na
mar me khyed cing rgyu/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa sgrub pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gus pas tshul khrims srung zhing so sor thar
pa la khyad du mi gsod pa dang/ gus pas khyams pa sgom par byed cing gnod sems la sbyor ba yang song kharabyed pa dang/ thams cad
skyed par yang khyedakhadang/ dag kha'i chos thamasacad lagacas pa mi 'dor ba ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bazod bslab pa yin no/
b+hA1 bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs sa/ ston pas gzhan yaja 'daskadacasabaka stsal to// de dag sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i/
ga tshul khrims ma nyams marul srung// tshul khrims phung bo dag pa la// dga' ba 'khar skyabar 'gyur// chos rnams mang botshol khyad cang// blosapa mang la legs nas ni// grang
gis tshom gcod byed pa'i// das de'i shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// skye dang 'chi ba'i rgyun dag las/ 'di dag ji ltar dgrol bya zhes// ltasamed phan pa'i sems dag gas//
dam pa'i chos kyang ston bar byed// gnod sems don dumag nyer bas// byams pa'i sems kyang ston par byed// gnod sems don du mganyer bas/ byams kha'asams kyang
sgom par byed// 'jigs pa dang phan pa'i sems// bdag dang sems can mnyam pa nyid// byang chub lakhartan zil gnon pa'i// brtson padag kyang legs par rtsom// gang dag
0/byang chub la rten pa'i// dag khra'i chos rnams tshol ba dang// bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa dang// spang bar bya ba lang rnam par spong// ji ltar spang bya spangs pa yis/ myur dum na
'da' bar gyur// dgon kha'i gnas la'angon phyogs dang// gnod pa dag la rgyab kyis phyogs// thos pa tsho la tshon padag go 'phang mchogani rtogs bar 'gyu'o// dge slong
dge slong ma rnams dang// dag bsnyen de bzhin dag bsten ma// thams cad dang ni de dag gis// 'dras pa rnam par snang bar bya// byis pa'i lam la rten pa yi// rmongs pa kun kyang
skyabasamed de// gang zhig chos la rton pa dang// de dag sangs rgyas mchog tu gzhol/ ]ma gang sems can don dag 'apag/ sangs rgyas pa dang ma len no// g.yomad chos la 'dod
pa dag/ byang chub lanarab tu dang// sangs rgyus dag tume lta khab/ mi rnams mtshan nyid gsum gsungs te// ga yodang chos ni 'dod pa dang// snyoms las dag la rtag dga' kha'o//
'dod chags zhes ng nga rgyal dang// de bzhin sdig pa bsasanas// blo ldan brtson 'grus ldan 'gyur// byang chub lanib gus gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
lanas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang/ lha dang/ midang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten la ri ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
(la mngon par khasodad// byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa'i chos bzhi sgrub ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// byang chub sems dpa' sa sar
sa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shAdzAn dang/ zhu chen gyi lo bdag slong shAkya blo gros dang/ dge slong dag pa'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ga
'a/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gong thag byA ka ra NanA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'bags po re blang ru lung bstan pa sa bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo/ khamakho gcig go kha com ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ lha'i yang lha
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bskal bgrangs med pa gsum nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rnam par smin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bar s te/ 'dzamabu'i gling ga ljong
kyi yul gzhan du 'dul ba'i sems can yod sasu smin par mdzad nas/ yul yangs pa can gyi phyogs thub pa drang srong chen po'i gnas rgyal po'i khab na byang chub sems dpa' semA
dpa' chen po 'phags pa byams pa lasogs pa byang chub sems dapa'i du ma dang/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcudang/
tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha du ma dang/ lha'i rgyal po nyan thos kyi bu la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong bdu mdang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po dumadang/ gnod sbyin mthu chen lomang/
bodra/dri zu'i rgyal bo gtsug phud lnga lasogs pa dri zamang lod// mi 'am ci'argyal ba yid 'ong lasogasalami 'am ci du ma dang/ rgyal pogazugasacan snying po lasogasakha 'ag
bu'i gang ga la'i rgyal po mang bo'i 'khor du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs go// de nas de'i tsho lha'i lang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ phyi ma'i dusakyi yuladag bal rjes sudagong
shing mngon sum du mdzad nas/ 'khor mang po la bka' stsal la/ rigs kyi bu khyud phyogs legasan/ ri glang ru dang nye ba chu bo ge ma'i 'graman/ thub pa drang srong chen po'i pho brang
mtshod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha zhes bya ba zhig yod// der gdon mizab bya dgos pa'i 'phrin las shig yod pasad bshags pa'i dus la bab go/ de nas de'i tshelha'i yang lha
sangs rgyas bcomoldan 'das 'khor khal bo dang nam mkha' la 'thags// dri za'i rgyal pogatsug phud ldab lasogasal dri bgrangasamed pan/ mnan lha'il mo sna tshogs
byed/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi 'am ci du ma ni steng nas mchod pa'i las byed cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs dang/ lha'i skad yid du 'ong/
'a@#// bas bstod bzhin du/ 'khor de dag dang/ mchod ba de dag dang bcas te/ ri glang rug la bder gshegs so// gshegs nas lha'i yang lha/ sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das khazhing sa bzhin du/ zhal byang phyogs su mtshochen po yun ring po nas/ rgya mtsho ltar 'dug pa lagakhrigs te/ sku drang por bsrangasanas/ de bzhin gshegs
ba 'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya phrag brgya stong dum la snyoms por zhugs te/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas/ bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa smon lam dang/bsod nams mngon
du mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ri glang ru dang/ yul dag kha dang/ gsar kyi dkyil 'khor nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar dubyin gyis brlab
bsrang kha dang gtsang pa dang/ bkra shisatang ]mtshams pa dang/ bzlasakharjod dang/ yul dge ba mdzad do// de nas de'i tshelha'i yang lha sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
kyis 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsalapa/ ri glang ru khacom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sAl gan d+hadang bcas/ yul dag pa dang bcas pa 'di na/bstsal pa
bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi phyag mtshan dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ thun mong ma yin pa dang/ dben pa yin te/ rgyudes n yul 'di na dag pa zhes bya'o//
yul der so so nas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag bskyed bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal po dang/ chos dad ldan pa'i dad pa can dod/ sbyin bdag dang/ li thams cad 'byung bar lung
bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka'astsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis kyang ma'ongs pa'i dus 'byung ba'i yul 'dir
ci nas kyang/ sems can rnams dam pa chen po myur du thob par 'gyur bdang/ ting 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis rlobs shig// de nas ti ri tshe bcom ldan 'das/ mtsha la
nas cung zad cig sur bskyedad de'i mod la ri glang ru'i snying dugadan khri bshams pa la skyil krung bcas te bzhugs nas/ zhal nub phyogs sukhacom ldan 'das kyi yokhrang Achod rtan ma
ga labaganagazin bde lags su gzigs s// de nas de'i 'dzig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'idrang srong
mang kho dang thabs cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// lha gang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sA luganad+ha la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs
su song/ sa rta sa rgyus khatsam ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khodod// de nas de'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//
kyis 'khor phal po che 'dus par mkhyen nas/ 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bsal pa bzang po 'di lasngon sangs rgyas latsem ldan la/
bzhi byung ste/ de dag gis kyang mchod rtan go ma sA la gnad+ha yul dang bcasapar byin gyis brlabs so/ bskal pa bzang po red nyid la ma 'os pa'i dus na sangs rgyas steng//
gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas te 'dir gshegs nas// mchod rten go ma sa la gan d+ha yul dang bcas par byin gyis rub cing/ mtshams
gcad pa dang/ bkra shis padag bar mdzad par 'gyur go da yang da ltar byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab pas rgyun gyis rlob par mdzad de// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba dang/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med par snyoms par zhugs
sa/ de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang/ bsam gtanapa rnams yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mathu chen gyis kyang/ sangs rgyas
'od srungs kyi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs// ul khyud bor gyur pa'i tshabadag ga gzugs brnyanakhyed par 'gyur bar sa gzhi de khyon gyis brlabs// do bzhin du smon lam chen pos gan
pa byang chub sems dwab 'a 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang/ ri glang ru la gtsug lag khang slong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der/ bsnyen pa byed pa rnams
'grub par 'gyur par byin gyisabarlabasaso// de bzhin du nam mkha' ltar stobs dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying bos kyang/ gtsug lag khang 'jig tshog
sbyong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur kha'i sagazhi de mchod gnas su 'gyur bar byen gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dapa' 'phags pa spyan
ras ga zigs dbang phyug gis kyang/ gtsug lag khang 'od can zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sugazhi dar dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byen gyis brlabasas// de bzhin du rta
tu byams khadang ldanob byang chub sems dpa' byamasakhasakyang/ gtsug lag khang gis mo nya zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'is gzhi der bdag nyid bzhugs bar byin gyis brlabs so//
de bzhin du spyod pa shin tu rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying bos kyang/ gtsug lag khang ye shes zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyurab 'is gzhi da phyag bya bar 'os par
byung bar 'gyur bar byan gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du gdul ba'i skye bo rnams grol bar mdzad pa la grags thog sam mnga' ba byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal pos kyang/
gtsug lag khang ba natse zhes bya ba 'byung bar gyur ba'i sa gzhi der da sagrub 'grubapar byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du rdzaphrulachen po dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems// gcug lag khang nang
dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang/ gtsug lag khang dge 'dun skyong zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grubapar 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabasaso// de bzhin du sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag dang/ dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis kyang la yul gang dang gang du gtsug lag khang dang/ skyed mos tshal dang dgon
pa' ga nas 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i sa gzhi spams cad dper na zla ba nya ba laskar ma'i tshogs rnams kyis yongasas bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang dag pa la rgyal khazhin du mdzes
dang yid du 'ong ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dga' dga' ltar 'dug par byin gyis brlabs so// yang de'i tsho'i glang ru la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angos bzhugs pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ dgu'artsom pa chen po rnams kyis 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs du ma bkye bas/ li yul thams cad snang ba chen pos
khyab par byas so// des skad cig de nyid la mtsho chen po da 'anang nas pad+masum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum bya bar gyur to/ pad+ma re re'i steng na yang/ sangs rgyas dang//
byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs 'od dad bcas pa bzhugs pa snang bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe lha rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ka'imtshan ma mthong nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ rigs kyi bumatsho'i nang nas pad+ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub samu
dpa'i sku gzugs dang bcas takhyung ba 'di na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yul 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ yul 'di nyid du pad+ma jo snyad pa'i dgon pa'i gnas dang gtsug
lag khango na gaN+Di rdung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gnas gang dang gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams 'od zer rnam pa sna tsho/
'gyod cing/ yulabyin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi de dag dang/ de bzhin du ngas de bzhinal/ shebasapa'i pho brang mchod rtan go masA la gnad+ha yul dal pa dang bcas pa khyen
las kharlabs pa'i sa gzhi 'dan/ dad pa can gyi sbyin bdag rnams kyis sosonas sangs rgyus lasogs pa'i gzugasabartan byed par 'gyur zhing/ gnas de dang de/
dag tu khosnyen pabyas na/ ci dang ci 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas yin no// yang de'i tsho lha rnams stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
u@#// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'di dus ji tsam zhig na byung bar 'gyur kha/ su zhig gis 'byin par bgyid pa lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da lta na
dgen kha chab chen po' gter lags nasu zhig gis ji ltar 'khyen pa bka'astsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang mya ngan las 'du
nas le brgya lon pa'i tshi/ rgya'i yu 'durgya'i rgyal pocha yang zhes bya ba bu stong tshad khar btog ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te[ ]bu re re la yul der gsar du tshol du bcug go/phyis nub phyog
lags nas/ ri glang ru dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten ge ma sA la gan d+hA yod pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa du mas byin gyis babs bar bas pa zhig yod do zhes byis
nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag la bu gcig lodan/ sangs rgyas phal po chos khyenagyis brlabs pa'i gnas der yul 'dabs su gzhug go snyam du bsams nas// de'i tshe rgya'i
rgya la bos rnam thos kyi bu la bu gcig khaslangs so// rnam thos kyi lus kyang 'dzam bu'agling 'di na/ rgyal pomyang n med ces bya ba'i bu zhig btsas ba phyin te/ bu du na gzugs
pazad 'a/ dbyibs mdzes pa/ bstan sdug gzhig yin go/ bu de'i zho dus las nu ma zhig byung ba dang/ bude sngon gyi bsod nams dang dag ba'irtsakha'i mthus/
nu ma de lan bar byed pas/ san pu de 'amangs las numan zhes bya'o// bu de myur bar skyes nas kha rgyal pos rgyal srid kyi dbang ni bskur/ nor mang po'i byin//
blon bo phal bo chan lus kyi ram gro par bskosanas/ rgyal po salasanumanu/ blon patshonapo 'dzad sha zhes bya ba la sogs kha dmag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgyu'i yul nas byung ste/
yul 'dir 'dakhar 'gyur ro/ 'ongasanas 'dir yul 'debs par 'gyur te/ rgyal pos lasanumanu dus yul khaskyob pa'i phyir/ rgyu des n yul 'di'i mingan sa las nu ma
nu'i yul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dus dkatshan nub phyogs logs na rgya gar gyi ma phal po 'dir 'od khar 'gyur te/ rgyal pos las zhumanu' 'bangs su mched kyis 'al
zhang/ chu srid gcig par dum par 'gyur nas/ rgya'akhron po chen ba 'dzad sho la sogs pas remagyis rgyu dang/ rgya gar gyi grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal 'debu
bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rgyal pos lasanutshanud/ mi rabs du ma'i bar du/ yul 'di'i rgyal po khyad par 'gyur ro// rgyal bo de rnams kyis kyang/ rams
gyis so so nas/ yul 'dir dgon pa'i gnas dang/ gtsug lag khang byas nas/ zhing chu dang/ 'bangos dang/ zhal ta byed pa yang 'bul zhing/ la la ni bdag 'di
kyang rab tu 'byung bar byed do// la lan bu dang bu mo rab tu 'byung bar byed do// la la zhi 'bangs las grangs med pa zhig lab tu 'byung bar gnang bar byed do//
ya yul 'da'i mkhyang chub sems dpa'i rigs can mang po zhig 'byung ste/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum las dul ba'i rtsa ba sogs shing/ khasod nams bya ba'i dngos bo byed par 'gyur
ro// da ltar na yul 'dani rgyal pos lasanu ma nus lul gtong ba'i tshul lta bu s 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yul 'di nas sargyas 'byung bar ra 'tsho yang 'byung na sangs rgyas M
par 'gyur ro/[0f10]ca'i phyir yul gzhan dang gzhan dgan zhig nas/ yun ringam zhib tu stong zhang dgon pa la 'dul ga la/ yul dag banas nigs rgyas 'byung bar ro'i tshe ma rnams kyis
brgyan cing mdzes par 'gyur zhin 'di ltar yul 'di na thub pa drang srong chen pa'i gnas de bzhinakhagshegs pa'i mchod rten go ma sA la lo nang+ha zhes bya ba'i ri glang ru dang
nya ba chu bo go ma'i 'graman yid ba'i phyir ro// mchod rten 'di mdo sde'i nang nas ni/ ming gom sA la gan d+ha zhes khya'o/ 'jig rten mal gyi tha snyad du chu bo goma'i 'gran zhes
bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar ji srid du mtshon na chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya ba dang/ 'od srungs kyi mchod rten 'di ga nyis rgyas shing mchod gnas su khyed pa de srid dun/
yul dag ba zhes bya ba rgyas shing bzang bor 'gyur ro// nam mtshod rten 'dig nyis rgud pa de 'tsha/ su la yang rgud cing stongs par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe 'khor du du 'dus pa'i lha/
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i gsung du thos nas/ mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang ri glad du la dod pa dang/ gus pa chen po nyid/ sas
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas/ spyan sngar 'di skad du bdag cag kyang dus de ni yul 'darab samathon por skyes nas/ bde bar gsheg
ba'i bstan pa srung zhing/ lul chos kyi bka' khrims m nyams par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab go/ de nas d 'i tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i rgyal po rnam
thos kyi bu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes can zhes bya ba dang/ lhami pham pa zhes bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po khyam tshag cesakhya ba dang/ lha nam
mkha'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ lha gsar gyi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang/ lhame lcags kyu can zhes bya bdang/ lhamo gnas can zhes bya ba rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
kyi bu khyed rnams la mchod rten gom sA lagan d+ha dang/ ri klong du yul dang bcas pa dang/ nga'i bstan pa dang/ sras rnams yongs su gtad kyis/ yongs susung btang/ skyob pa dang/mchod
kha gnas su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul 'di'i rgyal bo dang/ tshul 'dzin pa'i blon pod sbyin bdag chos dang mthun pa rnams kyang yongs su gtad kyis de bzhin du skyes shig/
ri glang ru lung bstan pa'i mde'ang yongs su gtad kyis 'phel zhing rgyas par gyis shig/ gangag tsha lula'adam 'am/ chu 'am/ parol gyi dumag gas nyin cad 'bongs bar rgyugan/ mdo 'di
bklag pa dang/ kha ton dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsam pa dang/ bsgom pa byas nadus na yul de la gnod pa zhi khar 'gyur go// ma 'ongasAtA'i dus nasems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par sman
sa yul 'dir sum pa rnams dang/ bod rnams 'dakhar 'gyur gyis/ do'atshamado 'ad lhogs shig dang/ mdo bodi tshesazhu mdo'ang 'a'athudang/ lha rnams kyi byin gyis/ da pamed pa/
de rnams yul 'jig par mabyed cing/ yad kyang 'gyod par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs ba'i dusan yul 'di rgya rnams kyang 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshig 'di lcogs shig dang/ mdo
rgyu'adi thosanas de dag dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// dad pa'i stobs kyis yul ma 'jig cing/ phyir zhing bsrung ba dang/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang byed khar 'gyur te/ rgyu des ni/
mdo 'di ni yul la phan 'dogs ba khyod la lanano/ mdo 'di ni phan yon gzhan mang mang du yod de/ yun thung dus ni brjod par mi nus so// de'i phyir mdo 'od khyed rnams la longs//
su gtad do/ de nas de 'i tshi rnam shes kyi bu lasogs pa lnga rnams dang/ klu'i rgyal po dang/ lha mod dag 'khor dang bcas te langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ldan
sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thalam sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi bka' spyi bos len par 'tshal
lang gsolal/ ston pakhacom ldan 'das kyis 'di skadabaka'asalakhabazhin dumachod rten gom laganats+tshe dang/ ri glang ru lu la dang khacas pa thams cad yongs su bsrung bar
'tshal bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang/ chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po dang/ ba tu 'byung ba dang/ chos dang mthun par yul 'dzin pa dang/ chos dang thun
ba desbyin bdag dang/ gang zhig bsod nams byakha'i dngos po bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung bar na 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'dasaji srid du yul
'ded dkon mchog gsum chod gnas su bgyid pa dang/ yul 'dzin pas kyang chos dang mthun bar yul skyong zhing/ chos dang chomathun ba'i sems can rnams kyi bgon mibagyad
ba de srid du/ bdag cag gis yong sasubasrung bar rngo thogaste/ mdo 'di yang lo yul du yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ li yul nas nyi 'og tugyur
[sj]@#// pa'i rgyal bo dang/ zho po rnams la mdo 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi li yul gyi ched du/ ri glang ru las bshad pa yin no zhes rnar grogs par bgyid/ sug par/
thob par 'gyi 1 sems bsgyur khar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dasanam yula'ar dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas su mi 'byed ced/ chos dang ma mthun pa rnams kyi mgon lhag par bgyid
h+phu bde'i tshe/ sems bsgyur babadag cag rnams kyi gzi brjod dang/ mthu stobs nyams par 'gyur bas yul 'di'i ched dang bsrung bar na rngo ma thog go/ datsa'aslad du zhe na/ bdag cag rnamA
kyi mthu stobs dang/ gozi brjidan bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang/ chos dang mthun par yul chos khazhin du skyong btAng/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus
'phel bar 'gyur ba lags so/ danas de'i tshagangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs nas/ ri glang ru'i stangag 'gram nas mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+hagang na bde legs/
su gzigs nas/ yang nas yang dude bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten gomasA la gnad+hadang/ riglang ru dang/ yul dang bcas pa lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar dubyin
gyis brlabs nas// la yul thams cad dang/ mtsho'inang na gnas pa'i sems can grangs mad pa rnams la 'od zer dang/ thugs rje chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ 'od/
chas zer de dang/ thugs rje chen po des chun gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sdug bsngal ni zhe bar gyur/ khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa dang ni bral te/ byams pa'i sems dang
ldan par gyur cing/ lha'i bde ba dang ldan nas skad cag de nyid la/ sems can ng drug las grangs med pa zhig tsha 'phos nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ sangs rgyas
nyid du 'gyur ba'i sa bon red cad byang chub lasaphyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas de'i tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha rnams la nagasum gyikhar du bos nas/ 'di skad ces bka'
tsal te// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam bcas pa rnams ni brtson 'grus med par che 'grub bo// rigs kyi khungs khasalapa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du dka' ba spyad pa'i bstan pa
'ad dang/ mchod rten go cha sA la gan ng+ha yul dang bcas pa khyed rnams la yongs su gtad kyis yongs su srungs shig/ khyed rnams las gang zhag gis nga rjes su dran zhing gzungs yod pa dang/
khastan pa bsrung bdes na bsnyen pa 'dil rab tu byung ba rnams yongs su srung bar gyisashas// de ma slad du zhen/ mi khyim pa la la zhig lokhargya'i bar du nyin re zhing dag ba'i rtsakha bsodran ms
chen bo khyed laM/ 'ga' zhig nyin gcig rab tu byung zhes bstan pa la gsan/sngam pas phyama'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang mi chog go/ datsa'asad dun na/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'ag byam
snyed thams cad kyang sngar khyim gyi gnas sbyangs te rab tu byung nas/ spyod lam de nyid kyis byang chub chen po brnyes so// nga yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzog
te dus bcu brnyes nas srid btso ma'i tsho/ nam phyed nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste(nags tshal du gshegs so// nags tshal nasakhazhon pa rgyal po yabakyi thog tu bkri nas// rang
ga skar la gris bregs/ nga'i gos gya mal rin thang med pa sngon bde dag las tshos gis dur smrig tukharjes so// ngas gosarAtshan nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
skyabs su song nas/rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam bzung ba dang lhathams cad nga la phyag 'tshal/ skyabs su song nas phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo// nga yang spyod lam de nyid kyis rang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas b.ris so// de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pan dam khayin par shes par bya'o// rab tu byung ba na bsod nams dang ldan par shes par bya'o//
'jig rtan n rab tu byung bas slob pa ma gtogs par khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis dgra bcom pa 'amA/ rang sangs rgyus sam blon med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa na sus kyang ma thos
ma mthong ngo// rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam 'don 'jig rten na lha lasogasapams cad kyi mchod gnas yin no// de nas de'i tshe lha dang lham de dag thams cad stan las langs te/
dbyangs gcig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin
'tshal zhing/ bsams bzhin dubaka' las 'gal bar ma 'tshal yod// yul 'dir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang de bzhin la//ba/sa pa'i spyod yul mchod rgyun dad bsdus pa yang kun
tu bsrung ba dang/bskyob pa dang/ rjes su gzung bar 'tshal gyis/ brtsem ldan 'das kyis kyang/bdagacag rnams l ma ba nga du gsol/da 'o slad du zhi na/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshed pa'i dusan
can gyi parlabs brlabs pa'i yul 'dir dgramang po dang/ ma dud pa dang phyir rgol ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa laM dad pa'i khyad par mi rid cing/ bstan pagazhag pa'i slad du 'tshon pa/
dag 'byung pa'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dasakyis lhade dag la legaso zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa rnams legs lags// ngas kyang yul 'dabyin gyisabarlabs zin te/ byin gyis
brlabs bde nyid kyis mtshams gcad pa yang yin no// ma 'ongs pa rtsod pa'i dusan/ yul 'dakazhim pa'i phyir/ sum pa'idapag phal po che dang drug rus sna tshogs dang dor dang/ gzhan
pung dod pa med pa dag 'ong par bsgyur te/de'i tshe yul la gzhan dang gzhan dag nas// da bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bar n can gyisakharabs pa dag yul 'dir gshegs nas// ra la sa tshams/
[h]@#// bsrung bar mdzad de/bsod nams kyi stobs des na yul 'di gtanarlag par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bar n de dag gi phyi bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' dang/ lha dang klu dang/
mthu stobs dang ldan pa mang bo dag 'ong zhang/ ul du gnod pa rnams zlog par byed/ dgra rnams kyis yul ma tshoms par byed do/ dge ba can zhes bya ba'i mkhar nas de bzhin gshigs
rgyu pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzugs bar n gshegs nas/nub phyogs mkha' kungasheng du bzhugs shing/ yul gyi sa mtshams srudabar 'gyur ro// byang phyogs yul shan zha zhes
byu bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bar nashen zhu zhes bya ba sa'i 'og nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yul gyi sa mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bar n ka 'u lang
! zhes bya ba gshegs nas//shar phyogs yul phyi ma zhes bya ba'i mkhar dupa zhugs shing yul gyis mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bar n phye se zhes bya bar gshegs ms/
byang phyogs kyi ri glang ru la 'od srungs kyi mchod rten gyi drud du bzhugs shing/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang/ yul gyi sa mtshams
srung bar 'gyur ro// mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba'i nang na/ tshong dus kyi sna 'di ze zhes bya bar de bzhinagshegs pa'i gzugs bar n rgyal po'i pho brang gnas zhes bya bar bzhugs shing/ mkha'

dge ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa mtshams srung bar 'gyur go/ sa gzhi rta ra zhes bya ba gang du rgyal po yo 'al zhes bya ba mkhar brtsigs pa'i gros rudang ra 'gyur ba dar dang zhin shagasang 'a ba phrug 5
bar n cu gon pa na zhes bya ba bzhugs shing mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba yul dang bcas pa'os mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang dani dzu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa mar me na dzad pa
gzugs bar n tho'i kod du byas pa gshegs par 'gyur de/gzugs bar nang ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi thor khod du byas pa/ thams cad kyi thog mar 'byud nga an no// gzugs brnyan de li rnams
kyis mtshan 'khor ba'i mar me mdzad ces bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur de/ den li yul gyi gzugs bar n tho'i kong du byed pa thams cad kyi dper 'gyur zhing bde bar gshegs pa yul dang bcas
pa yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi gzugs brnyan yul 'di'i dbus su gshegs nus/ phyogs bcu'i mtshams gcod par mdzad de/ jisrid
dude bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bar n phyogs phyogs na bzhugs pa de dag mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du/ yul 'di rlag par mi 'gyur ro// ul 'di nas skyes pa ri mi 'am// yul gzhan
nas skyes pa 'i mi la la zhigade bzhin gshags pa'i gzugs bar n de dag la sAng thag pa nas dad pa dang/ gus pa dang/ rab tu dang bar byed cing/ 'di sAm du bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs
ban 'di dag ni/ yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gshegs so snyam du yang sems na/ gzugs bar n de dag kyang sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin du don mdzad par 'gyur ro// de'i
slad du zhi na/gzugs brnyanadi dag nga dang 'dra bar dus gsum du thogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang yul 'dir nga'i gzugs brnyan chen po shing rtas 'dren

ba byas te/ mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba'i nang dugazhag nas mchod pa'i gnas chen por byed par 'gyur ro// de nas yul 'di'i phyogs dang phyogs mtshams nas/tshong dbon chen po rnams 'ong bar gyur zhing/

gnodapa rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yul 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugasabastan nyis brgya rtsabargyad 'od srungs kyi mchod rten dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang

cho 'phrul chen po ston cing sems can rnams kyi sdig pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba dang/ gnod pa sel ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// yul 'dir gnod pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ skyag pa 'ga' zhig byung na/yul 'di'i
chedadu phyogs ltar sbyor ba byas te/ rgyal ba dang/ blon po rnams yul 'dzin gang zhig 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/bde bar gshags pa'i bstan pa las bsod nams skye bar 'dod na/gtsug lag

khang tsar ma zhes bya ba'i bsod nams bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/yul 'di'i mi rnams kyi dad pa yang dag pa'i lta bani dang po gtsug lag khang de nas skye bar 'gyur// nam zhig li'i rgyal po dang/ blon po dang//

tsa yul 'dzin pa rnams la gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs shig byung na/ ri glang ru la sngon ya nga bgada' rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang nasazhugs su zhugs pa'i sa gzhi de la bskor bar byago/ tshul 'di'i sems can rnams
las mi dgebabashags bar 'dod na/ mchod rtego masA la gnatsA'i gamadubashag par bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa bzhin du gang dgagis bskor ba'am/ me

togagam pajug pa 'am/ dbyangs sam 'ol mo'i sgras mchod pa byas na/ mtshams med pa lnga yang nyams dmas par 'gyuranagazhan lta smos kyang ci dgos yul 'di'i rgyal po dang blon po dang/ yul 'dzin pa 'am/

gang zhig brtul bzhugs chen po'i sdom pa len pa 'dod ba des/ri glang ru gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bar n phyi se zhes bya ba dang/ 'od srungs kyi mchod rten yod pa de'i dge 'dun la mchod par bya'o/de ci'i/

phyi ra zhe na/ yul 'di'i spyodang yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni/de nas 'byung bar 'a gyur ba'i phyir ro/ ul 'di'i mi la la zhigachad pa chen bo zhagi la thug na/des ri gung ru la gnas

pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su 'grob byas te/des na tshang pa chen po de las thar bar 'gyur ro// dpa'i phyir zhe na/gnas de na thar pa thob stong phrag duma'i mtha'i bar du gnas shing mi stongs pa'i bya'i

te/rgyu des bar glang ru dang/ mchod tshonago masA la gnad tshul dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chad khyu yin no//de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas phungachub sems dpa' nyi
[4]@#// khri lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das dang nab de logs su thal mo sbya ra ba btud de/ dbyangs gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang thabs
sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa spyodalam dang/ tshul 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/bsrung bar bgyi zhing/ ji sridadu bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gnas shing/ rgyal po

ts+tso nga/blon po la sogs pa/ mi tshul khrims dang ldan pa dad pa can dang/ yul chos dang mthun par bgyid pa mchis pa de sridadu yongs su migatang zhing khul 'di'i dus dus su spyod lam dang cha lugs ci dang
rilta bu s sems can mang po'i bsonams chen pa longasasu smin par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas nyid dusems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang/ bsam gtan dang/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'grub dang/

sangs rgyas ting 'as phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba blangs pa'isadadu/kha cig gis ni rgyal rigs yongs su gzung bar bgyi/kha cig gis ni bar du byung ba dang/ khyim pa gzhan gyi cha lugs yongs
su gzung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu lugs golags no/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis 'di lta ra bskalar bzad po'i lhongs rgyas tham rta cad kyi spyod yul dad/ yul

! 'di gang du sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid las phyir ma ldog par 'gyur bar de lta bu chu gang thob cig/ yang de'i tshe lha rnam shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dad mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha thams cad
kyis bcom ldan lag 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam kyis yul 'di srung ba'i slad du mu thu bstang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ mthus
bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i yul 'di kun tu bsrung zhing yal bar ma gtang ba'i slad du/ brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs kyis 'bad pa'
'tshal lo gal te yul 'di'i dru gu la sogs pa gtum po dad pa mamachis pa rnams dang/ hor dang/ sumapa'i ngam ga dag mchi bar 'gyur na/ de dag phan tshun nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang/ de dag gi 'khor
nang mi mthun par 'gyur ba dang/ 'gum par 'gyur bar bgyi'o//yang na de dgaci nas kyang 'dir mi mchi zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzag mi nus par bgyi nga'i slad du/gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur

bgyi 'o//gal te rgya'i dmag dug du mchis pa 'a gyur na/ de dag gi sems dang par bgyi zhing slar yul 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang/ phyis yul 'di'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po bgyi dadu stsal to//

nam zhig yul 'di'i sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid pa de'i tshe na yang phyir dad par bgyi zhing mang ba de yang lo du chud par bgyid du sul to//gang gi tshe de dag ma 'ongs par dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad la

dbang 'tshal zhing mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ semA can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnamA la 'tsho ba de'i tshe ni/ bdag cag gi 'a khor gnod sbyin dang pa can dang/ dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig dbang bskur te/ bkye nas
0[]/ yul der ci nas kyang yun ring mo zhig gi bar du rgud par bgyi zhing/ yul 'di 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ ba rol gyi dmag mi mtshibar bgyid du stsal le

a la yul gyi nor rdzas de dag gis 'tshal ba rnams kyang bkra mi shis par bgyi zhing/ gang dngagang duphyin pa'i yul de thams cad du yang sman yon mi thogasangashing 'khrug par bgyi'o// dedag go la'adzin
tshub dang dmag dbon yang rgyud par bgyi'o// bod kyi dmag rnams la yang de bzhin du rag par bgyi ste// gang gi tshe dedag chos dang 'thun par yul 'di la dzan cing srung nan bdag cag rnams kyis kyang/
de dag yongs su bskyang zhing rgyur bar 'gyur bar bgyi'o// nam zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig pa dang/ tshul gyi ma le gnod par bgyi dab po'i tshin/ dmag rnams nang 'khrug 'byung
bdang/ dmag gi dpon yang tshe thung du rgud par bgyi ste/ rgyas par na snga ma bzhin no// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di'i rgyal po dang/ blon po sums gya gyu can/bsod nams chung ba dang/ dad pa yod
pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la 'jol nyog tu rlom zhing/ yul gyi rtsis mgo dang 'gal bar bgyid pa// nor rdzas ma brtags pas go 'phang 'tshol ba/ sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams
la sun 'khyen du rgol ba/ ngo med pa dang na 'dus can/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ngoms ma myong ba/ rab tu byung ba dag gis sems skyo ba la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/de dag ni bdag cag gis kyad/
0 yul 'di nas dbyung zhing yul ngan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu spyags par bgyis te/ tshul delta bu s yul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang/ bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma rtsod pa'i jusan
yul 'digazhig por brtson pa'i sems can bdud kyi phyogs sdig pa bgyid pa// mthu stobs dang ldan ng/ yul dag tu sems can rnams kyi dadapa zlog par bgyidapa/ sems gdug ring bslang
ba/lha dang daklu dang/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dum zhig 'byungaba' 'gyur la/de dag kyang bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur/de'abadag cag gis thabs ji ltar 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

sul pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed yodigyo bar ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ gling bzhi pa 'din byang chub sems dba' rnams dang/ lha mkhru stobs che ba dang/ klu dang gnod sbyin s thob ba dumazhig nas ba de dga'
sems 'ajam bos mchodapa chen po byas te/mchod rtenago ma sAl gan d+hadang/ gtsug lag khang tsaram la sogs pa yulabyin gyis brlabs pa rnams su/ theg pachon po'i sde snodashig 'ad kyis rol tu
pa dang/ 'dus pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas phal po che dang/ dkon mchog brtsegs pa la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i sde mang po ltogs shig dang/ khul so so nas byang chub sems dpa' s 'acung la sogs
bdang/ mthu stobs chiba'i sems can de dag yul 'dir 'ongs nas/chos ro gnas shing/dus gsum dugatogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig la mi 'galakhabyed/bsam pabazang
[f ]// po'i sas rgyas rnams kyi spyodaul dang/ yul mang srung bar byed/ tshul 'di'i mi dang bstan pa yang srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ ul dge ba 'di'i rgyal

bom phu chung bar 'gyur te/mthu chung ba des na rang gi mthu stobs kyis yul ma thub pas/ rgyal po dad pa can gzhan 'di lta ste/ bod kyi rgyal po dang/ rgyu'i rgyal bo la sogs pa la skyabs btsal nas yul srung

bar khyed/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ rgyudang bod kyi yul dudakon mchog gsum gnas shing/ mchoda gnas chen por byed pa dang/ yul de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas su 'gyur

zhing/ sems can de dag kyang byang chub chen po'i lag tshol ba'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bar 'gyur te/de dag gi mthu stobs kyis li yul gyi mi dang/ dkon mchog

gsum rlag par mi 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis kyang bod dang rgya'i rgyal po dang/ blon po dag ga re nas kyang mchod rten go ma sA la gan drudang/ yul dgo ba 'a dil mo byed par 'gyur ba dang/ yul 'di

bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dgo ba rgya chen po byed par 'gyur ba dang/ yul 'di'i ma rig da pa med pa'i yul gzhan du 'khyams pa rnams kyang grug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba'i rang gi yul dubaskyal nas phyir

yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang/ bsod nams la dga' bar 'gyur bar sems sgyur cig dang/ dge ba'i rtsab de'i stobs kyis/ skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyi ngag pa'i rtsa ba dang/ mdangs dang gzi brjid dang/ 'khor 'phel
bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas nyidadu yang nye bar 'gyur gyis/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs ba rnams kyi gdam ngag la byas pa gzo bar gyis shig/ 'di ltar yul 'di'i sems can rnams ni phyin/

mi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ldan ng/ sIng rje dang ldan pa// bden pa dang ldan pa gtong yong ba/ phrag dog dang/ khon du 'dzin pa rnam par spangs ba byas ba gzab 'chos dga' ba/ yang dag pa'i lta

ba can/ log pa'i lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa// sems 'jam par 'gyur te/ rgya des nadage ba rnams zhes bya'o// yul 'di mkhar yang mi byams pa dang/ 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ mchod sman
dang/ gtsug lag khang du sems brgyan par ra gyur te/ de'i phyir mkhar go ba can zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yul gzhan ngag nas/ sems can dad pa med// snga 'khon du 'dzin pa drag yul 'dir 'ongs pa kun//
yul 'di'i rdul gyis reg cing/ yul 'das 'khrungs pa 'tshob la las spyongan dedag thams cad kyi sems bsgyuran/sems 'jam pa dang/ byams pa'i bas mar dang/ khro bdang/ khonadu 'dzin pa spangs pa

dang dad pa dang/ yang yul 'dir sdig pa mi byed pa ra 'gyur te/ yul 'di ni yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis la nagasum gyi bar du byin gyisabarlabs nas/

'od zer thugs rje chen po dang bcas te bkye ba des/ tshuna gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su dag pa dang/ bde pa dang ldan ra byas nas chu'i nang nas slar 'thon te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
#// zhing thams cad du khyab par gyur to//yang 'od ze de dag slar log nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yulabyin gyis brlabs pa dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis yul byin/
gyis brlabs pa dang/ mtsho'i nang nas byung ba'i pad+mo'i steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i gzugs bar nabazhugs bde dang de dag gi 'od zer dang 'dres nas nam mkha' las 'phags te/ steng gi nam/

tsho mkha' khengs par gyur cing/ li yul thams cad du lha'i me tog gi char phab bo// lha'i me tog de dag phan tshun du reg pa las chos kyi sgo mo 'di lta ste// sangs rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi mtshan

dang/ yang dag nga 'i lta ba dang/ shes rab dang/ tshul khrims dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyad pa dang/ smon lam dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ sems can

yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ ge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi bo rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong pa dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ khams gsum gyi srid las nges par 'byin pa dang/ rnam

par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ 'du byed 'jig pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhug pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhadang/ dbang po yongs su dag pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos mtha' dag gi sgra 'byin par 'a rgyur ro/ gzhan sems yongs su dag pa dang/ byang chub kyi

00 lanalag dang/ 'ang gas pa'i lam dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ arang stobs dang thugs dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ the tshom sel ba dang/ sangs rgyas nyid las mi ldog pa dang

ting nge 'dzin dang/ mngon par rtogs pa dang/ ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang/ ma 'dres ba dang/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ smyu gabasngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ stong pa dang/ ma byas pa dang/ [.]

skyes pa dang phyin cim log pa dang dbangadag pa'i mtha' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po khongos su rtogs pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtogs pa dang/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so so'ang gso rig pa'i spyod

yul dang/ skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang/ sgrub dang/ sdug pa dang bral ba dang/ mi sdug pa dang phradapa dang/ 'dod pagatsam ste ma red pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang phung po lnga po dag la sems can med/

dang gso ba dang/ gang zag dang/ srog med pa dang/ chos bden pa skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ rtag pa med pa/chad pa med pa//'ong ba med pa/'gro ba med pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang/ byin gyis brlabs

dang/ 'gro ba lnga po dag 'khrul pa rmi lam lta ba dang/ 'khor ba'i 'du byed btson ra lta bu dang/ sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ chu zla dang/ brag cha lta bu zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dad pa dang/ mngon par rtogs

pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ dgag bcu'i las kyi lam dang/ 'khor bas skyo bar gyur pa dad/ de lta bu la sogs pa sgra brgya stong du ma byung bar gyur to//'khor 'dus pa mang po dedag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs
[F ]// phyogs nas lhags pa de dag thams cad sa la gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang/ gnod sbyin thams cad sems de mtshar du gyur nas rangs pa skyes te/chos kyi sgo/

sgra de dag la yid mi phyed pa 'gyur to//de nas de'i tsho 'khor de ngag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du cho 'phrul chen po 'a di lta bu bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dang la chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag ni/ ul dge ba
nas skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched de/ 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi ched du yang lhag par byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo mo 'dris na de byang chub sems ngang 'a rnams tshegs chung

du dang/ 'bad pa chung dus/ dbang po dang/ shes pa yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing chos kyi sgo mo de dang de dag kyang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo de dag ni byis pa chung du yan chad
chos mngon par rtogs par 'gyur zhing/ rtsed mor yang chos kyi sgo mi 'di dag smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag dbang po yongs su ltas nas/chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas// dekhazhin gshegA
pa pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rna ba rnam pa'i dag nga sa chos mang dag pa ma nor ba mang thos par 'gyur/de dag 'khor ba nas 'du byed dang/ chos thams cad las kyang sems rnam par
grol bar gyur te/ sems de lta bu des na/ yul dgon pa byin gyis brlabs pa 'di'i/dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa 'am/ yang na ri glang ru la de dag thams cad dngos grub thob par gyur te/ bdud/
sdig can gyis kyang glags mi red na/ gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ lha rnams kyis 'khor gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ mi'am ci chad pas bcad par gyur na yang/ mchod rten

go ma sA la gan dra dang/ ri glang ru la 'khras na/ de dag gis mi mthong par 'gyur ro// brgya la mthong na yang sems zhi bor 'gyur te/ rgyu des na ri glang ru dang mchodartenag ma sA la gan d+ha na mtshamA
gcad pa dang/ gtsang byed dang/ skyabs dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no// mchod rten ge ma sA la gan dra dang/ 'a glanga'u
dang/ ul dge ba dang/ mkhar dge ba can dang/ dgon pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i ming thos nas/ dad pa skyes pa tsam gyis kyang sdig pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das

kyis/ tshe dang ldan rangashA ri'i bu dang/ rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ gos kyi du khyed gnyis sod la/ mtsho chen po 'di'i sha'i 'a brel te/ byang phyogs su gyi'o rtsad po'i nang du tho la/ chu la gnas pa'i
sems can rnams la ma gnod par srung ba dang/ ul 'di mtshams mngon par gyis shig/ de nas nyan thos chen po shAri'i bu dang/ rnam thos kyi dus de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/rdzu 'phrul
gyis nas mkha' las ga'i ri gang na ba de phebs su chas te/ shA ri'i bus ni ga na 'khar gsilathogs/ rnam thos kyi bus ni lag na mdung thogs te/ shA ri'i cing skam

sa pas blangs te/ nub phyogs logs su bzhag nas srol chen po gted de/ mtshe srog chags dang chas gyi sho rtsadangu'i nang du pho ste/ tshul de lta bas mchod rten go ma sA la gan drudang ri glang rudad li
ul de mngon par byas so// de sa btsem ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang

byang chub sems dang ba'i khri drang srong dang bcas pa dang/ rnam thos kyi bu dang/ khyim tshatshig la sogs po lha chen po brgyad/ 'khor sum khri lnga stong lnga brgyudang bcas pal/ mchod rten go ma sa la
gan d+hu la sogs pa yongs su gtang de/ lha de dag gis kyang de bzhin du mnos so// btsom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa ri glang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mad rdzogs so//
